2466 intpol_met_space_3d(met0, array0, p, lon, lat, &var0, ci, cw, init);
2467 intpol_met_space_3d(met1, array1, p, lon, lat, &var1, ci, cw, 0);
2468
2469 /* Get weighting factor... */
2470 const double wt = (met1->time - ts) / (met1->time - met0->time);
2471
2472 /* Interpolate... */
2473 *var = wt * (var0 - var1) + var1;
2474}
2475
2476/*****************************************************************************/
2477
2478void intpol_met_time_3d_ml(
2479 const met_t *met0,
2480 float zs0[EX][EY][EP],
2481 float array0[EX][EY][EP],
2482 const met_t *met1,
2483 float zs1[EX][EY][EP],
2484 float array1[EX][EY][EP],
2485 const double ts,
2486 const double p,
2487 const double lon,
2488 const double lat,
2489 double *var) {
2490
2491 double var0, var1;
2492
2493 /* Spatial interpolation... */
2494 intpol_met_space_3d_ml(met0, zs0, array0, p, lon, lat, &var0);
2495 intpol_met_space_3d_ml(met1, zs1, array1, p, lon, lat, &var1);
2496
2497 /* Interpolate... */
2498 *var = LIN(met0->time, var0, met1->time, var1, ts);
2499}
2500
2501/*****************************************************************************/
2502
2503void intpol_met_time_2d(
2504 const met_t *met0,
2505 float array0[EX][EY],
2506 const met_t *met1,
2507 float array1[EX][EY],
2508 const double ts,
2509 const double lon,
2510 const double lat,
2511 double *var,
2512 int *ci,
2513 double *cw,
2514 const int init) {
2515
2516 double var0, var1;
2517
2518 /* Spatial interpolation... */
2519 intpol_met_space_2d(met0, array0, lon, lat, &var0, ci, cw, init);
2520 intpol_met_space_2d(met1, array1, lon, lat, &var1, ci, cw, 0);
2521
2522 /* Get weighting factor... */
2523 const double wt = (met1->time - ts) / (met1->time - met0->time);
2524
2525 /* Interpolate... */
2526 if (isfinite(var0) && isfinite(var1))
2527 *var = wt * (var0 - var1) + var1;
2528 else if (wt < 0.5)
2529 *var = var1;
2530 else
2531 *var = var0;
2532}
2533
2534/*****************************************************************************/
2535
2536void intpol_tropo_3d(
2537 const double time0,
2538 float array0[EX][EY],
2539 const double time1,
2540 float array1[EX][EY],
2541 const double lons[EX],
2542 const double lats[EY],
2543 const int nlon,
2544 const int nlat,
2545 const double time,
2546 const double lon,
2547 const double lat,
2548 const int method,
2549 double *var,
2550 double *sigma) {
2551
2552 double mean = 0;
2553
2554 int n = 0;
2555
2556 /* Check longitude and latitude... */
2557 double lon2, lat2;
2558 intpol_check_lon_lat(lons, nlon, lats, nlat, lon, lat, &lon2, &lat2);
2559
2560 /* Get indices... */
2561 const int ix = locate_reg(lons, (int) nlon, lon2);
2562 const int iy = locate_irr(lats, (int) nlat, lat2);
2563
2564 /* Calculate standard deviation... */
2565 *sigma = 0;
2566 for (int dx = 0; dx < 2; dx++)
2567 for (int dy = 0; dy < 2; dy++) {
2568 if (isfinite(array0[ix + dx][iy + dy])) {
2569 mean += array0[ix + dx][iy + dy];
2570 *sigma += SQR(array0[ix + dx][iy + dy]);
2571 n++;
2572 }
2573 if (isfinite(array1[ix + dx][iy + dy])) {
2574 mean += array1[ix + dx][iy + dy];
2575 *sigma += SQR(array1[ix + dx][iy + dy]);
2576 n++;
2577 }
2578 }
2579 if (n > 0)
2580 *sigma = sqrt(MAX(*sigma / n - SQR(mean / n), 0.0));
2581
2582 /* Linear interpolation... */
2583 if (method == 1 && isfinite(array0[ix][iy])
2584 && isfinite(array0[ix][iy + 1])
2585 && isfinite(array0[ix + 1][iy])
2586 && isfinite(array0[ix + 1][iy + 1])
2587 && isfinite(array1[ix][iy])
2588 && isfinite(array1[ix][iy + 1])
2589 && isfinite(array1[ix + 1][iy])
2590 && isfinite(array1[ix + 1][iy + 1])) {
2591
2592 const double aux00 = LIN(lons[ix], array0[ix][iy],
2593 lons[ix + 1], array0[ix + 1][iy], lon2);
2594 const double aux01 = LIN(lons[ix], array0[ix][iy + 1],
2595 lons[ix + 1], array0[ix + 1][iy + 1], lon2);
2596 const double aux0 = LIN(lats[iy], aux00, lats[iy + 1], aux01, lat2);
2597
2598 const double aux10 = LIN(lons[ix], array1[ix][iy],
2599 lons[ix + 1], array1[ix + 1][iy], lon2);
2600 const double aux11 = LIN(lons[ix], array1[ix][iy + 1],
2601 lons[ix + 1], array1[ix + 1][iy + 1], lon2);
2602 const double aux1 = LIN(lats[iy], aux10, lats[iy + 1], aux11, lat2);
2603
2604 *var = LIN(time0, aux0, time1, aux1, time);
2605 }
2606
2607 /* Nearest neighbor interpolation... */
2608 else {
2609 const double aux00 = NN(lons[ix], array0[ix][iy],
2610 lons[ix + 1], array0[ix + 1][iy], lon2);
2611 const double aux01 = NN(lons[ix], array0[ix][iy + 1],
2612 lons[ix + 1], array0[ix + 1][iy + 1], lon2);
2613 const double aux0 = NN(lats[iy], aux00, lats[iy + 1], aux01, lat2);
2614
2615 const double aux10 = NN(lons[ix], array1[ix][iy],
2616 lons[ix + 1], array1[ix + 1][iy], lon2);
2617 const double aux11 = NN(lons[ix], array1[ix][iy + 1],
2618 lons[ix + 1], array1[ix + 1][iy + 1], lon2);
2619 const double aux1 = NN(lats[iy], aux10, lats[iy + 1], aux11, lat2);
2620
2621 *var = NN(time0, aux0, time1, aux1, time);
2622 }
2623}
2624
2625/*****************************************************************************/
2626
2627void jsec2time(
2628 const double jsec,
2629 int *year,
2630 int *mon,
2631 int *day,
2632 int *hour,
2633 int *min,
2634 int *sec,
2635 double *remain) {
2636
2637 struct tm t0, *t1;
2638
2639 t0.tm_year = 100;
2640 t0.tm_mon = 0;
2641 t0.tm_mday = 1;
2642 t0.tm_hour = 0;
2643 t0.tm_min = 0;
2644 t0.tm_sec = 0;
2645
2646 const time_t jsec0 = (time_t) jsec + timegm(&t0);
2647 t1 = gmtime(&jsec0);
2648
2649 *year = t1->tm_year + 1900;
2650 *mon = t1->tm_mon + 1;
2651 *day = t1->tm_mday;
2652 *hour = t1->tm_hour;
2653 *min = t1->tm_min;
2654 *sec = t1->tm_sec;
2655 *remain = jsec - floor(jsec);
2656}
2657
2658/*****************************************************************************/
2659
2660double kernel_weight(
2661 const double kz[EP],
2662 const double kw[EP],
2663 const int nk,
2664 const double p) {
2665
2666 /* Check number of data points... */
2667 if (nk < 2)
2668 return 1.0;
2669
2670 /* Get altitude... */
2671 const double z = Z(p);
2672
2673 /* Get weighting factor... */
2674 if (z < kz[0])
2675 return kw[0];
2676 else if (z > kz[nk - 1])
2677 return kw[nk - 1];
2678 else {
2679 const int idx = locate_irr(kz, nk, z);
2680 return LIN(kz[idx], kw[idx], kz[idx + 1], kw[idx + 1], z);
2681 }
2682}
2683
2684/*****************************************************************************/
2685
2686double lapse_rate(
2687 const double t,
2688 const double h2o) {
2689
2690 /*
2691 Calculate moist adiabatic lapse rate [K/km] from temperature [K]
2692 and water vapor volume mixing ratio [1].
2693
2694 Reference: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lapse_rate
2695 */
2696
2697 const double a = RA * SQR(t), r = SH(h2o) / (1. - SH(h2o));
2698
2699 return 1e3 * G0 * (a + LV * r * t) / (CPD * a + SQR(LV) * r * EPS);
2700}
2701
2702/*****************************************************************************/
2703
2704void level_definitions(
2705 ctl_t *ctl) {
2706
2707 if (0 == ctl->met_press_level_def) {
2708
2709 ctl->met_np = 138;
2710
2711 const double press[138] = {
2712 0.0200, 0.0310, 0.0467, 0.0683, 0.0975, 0.1361, 0.1861, 0.2499,
2713 0.3299, 0.4288, 0.5496, 0.6952, 0.8690, 1.0742, 1.3143, 1.5928, 1.9134,
2714 2.2797, 2.6954, 3.1642, 3.6898, 4.2759, 4.9262, 5.6441, 6.4334, 7.2974,
2715 8.2397, 9.2634, 10.3720, 11.5685, 12.8561, 14.2377, 15.7162, 17.2945,
2716 18.9752, 20.7610, 22.6543, 24.6577, 26.7735, 29.0039, 31.3512, 33.8174,
2717 36.4047, 39.1149, 41.9493, 44.9082, 47.9915, 51.1990, 54.5299, 57.9834,
2718 61.5607, 65.2695, 69.1187, 73.1187, 77.2810, 81.6182, 86.1450, 90.8774,
2719 95.8280, 101.0047, 106.4153, 112.0681, 117.9714, 124.1337, 130.5637,
2720 137.2703, 144.2624, 151.5493, 159.1403, 167.0450, 175.2731, 183.8344,
2721 192.7389, 201.9969, 211.6186, 221.6146, 231.9954, 242.7719, 253.9549,
2722 265.5556, 277.5852, 290.0548, 302.9762, 316.3607, 330.2202, 344.5663,
2723 359.4111, 374.7666, 390.6450, 407.0583, 424.0190, 441.5395, 459.6321,
2724 478.3096, 497.5845, 517.4198, 537.7195, 558.3430, 579.1926, 600.1668,
2725 621.1624, 642.0764, 662.8084, 683.2620, 703.3467, 722.9795, 742.0855,
2726 760.5996, 778.4661, 795.6396, 812.0847, 827.7756, 842.6959, 856.8376,
2727 870.2004, 882.7910, 894.6222, 905.7116, 916.0815, 925.7571, 934.7666,
2728 943.1399, 950.9082, 958.1037, 964.7584, 970.9046, 976.5737, 981.7968,
2729 986.6036, 991.0230, 995.0824, 998.8081, 1002.2250, 1005.3562, 1008.2239,
2730 1010.8487, 1013.2500, 1044.45
2731 };
2732
2733 for (int ip = 0; ip < ctl->met_np; ip++)
2734 ctl->met_p[ctl->met_np - ip - 1] = press[ip];
2735
2736 } else if (1 == ctl->met_press_level_def) {
2737
2738 ctl->met_np = 92;
2739
2740 const double press[92] = {
2741 0.0200, 0.0398, 0.0739, 0.1291, 0.2141, 0.3395, 0.5175, 0.7617,
2742 1.0872, 1.5099, 2.0464, 2.7136, 3.5282, 4.5069, 5.6652, 7.0181,
2743 8.5795, 10.3617, 12.3759, 14.6316, 17.1371, 19.8987, 22.9216, 26.2090,
2744 29.7630, 33.5843, 37.6720, 42.0242, 46.6378, 51.5086, 56.6316, 61.9984,
2745 67.5973, 73.4150, 79.4434, 85.7016, 92.2162, 99.0182, 106.1445,
2746 113.6382,
2747 121.5502, 129.9403, 138.8558, 148.3260, 158.3816, 169.0545, 180.3786,
2748 192.3889, 205.1222, 218.6172, 232.9140, 248.0547, 264.0833, 281.0456,
2749 298.9895, 317.9651, 338.0245, 359.2221, 381.6144, 405.2606, 430.2069,
2750 456.4813, 483.8505, 512.0662, 540.8577, 569.9401, 599.0310, 627.9668,
2751 656.6129, 684.8491, 712.5573, 739.5739, 765.7697, 791.0376, 815.2774,
2752 838.3507, 860.1516, 880.6080, 899.6602, 917.2205, 933.2247, 947.6584,
2753 960.5245, 971.8169, 981.5301, 989.7322, 996.8732, 1002.8013,
2754 1007.4431, 1010.8487, 1013.2500, 1044.45
2755 };
2756
2757 for (int ip = 0; ip < ctl->met_np; ip++)
2758 ctl->met_p[ctl->met_np - ip - 1] = press[ip];
2759
2760 } else if (2 == ctl->met_press_level_def) {
2761
2762 ctl->met_np = 60;
2763
2764 const double press[60] = {
2765 0.01, 0.1361, 0.2499, 0.4288, 0.6952, 1.0742,
2766 2.2797, 3.1642, 4.2759, 7.2974, 9.2634, 11.5685, 14.2377, 20.761,
2767 24.6577, 33.8174, 39.1149, 51.199, 57.9834, 73.1187, 81.6182,
2768 90.8774, 101.005, 112.068, 124.134, 137.27, 151.549, 167.045, 183.834,
2769 201.997, 221.615, 242.772, 265.556, 290.055, 316.361, 344.566, 374.767,
2770 407.058, 441.539, 478.31, 517.42, 558.343, 600.167, 683.262, 722.979,
2771 760.6, 795.64, 827.776, 856.838, 882.791, 905.712, 925.757, 943.14,
2772 958.104, 972.495, 986.886, 1001.28, 1015.67, 1030.06, 1044.45
2773 };
2774
2775 for (int ip = 0; ip < ctl->met_np; ip++)
2776 ctl->met_p[ctl->met_np - ip - 1] = press[ip];
2777
2778 } else if (3 == ctl->met_press_level_def) {
2779
2780 ctl->met_np = 147;
2781
2782 const double press[147] = {
2783 0.0200, 0.0310, 0.0467, 0.0683, 0.0975, 0.1361, 0.1861, 0.2499,
2784 0.3299, 0.4288, 0.5496, 0.6952, 0.8690, 1.0742, 1.3143, 1.5928, 1.9134,
2785 2.2797, 2.6954, 3.1642, 3.6898, 4.2759, 4.9262, 5.6441, 6.4334, 7.2974,
2786 8.2397, 9.2634, 10.3720, 11.5685, 12.8561, 14.2377, 15.7162, 17.2945,
2787 18.9752, 20.7610, 22.6543, 24.6577, 26.7735, 29.0039, 31.3512, 33.8174,
2788 36.4047, 39.1149, 41.9493, 44.9082, 47.9915, 51.1990, 54.5299, 57.9834,
2789 61.5607, 65.2695, 69.1187, 73.1187, 77.2810, 81.6182, 86.1450, 90.8774,
2790 95.8280, 101.0047, 106.4153, 112.0681, 117.9714, 124.1337, 130.5637,
2791 137.2703, 144.2624, 151.5493, 159.1403, 167.0450, 175.2731, 183.8344,
2792 192.7389, 201.9969, 211.6186, 221.6146, 231.9954, 242.7719, 253.9549,
2793 265.5556, 277.5852, 290.0548, 302.9762, 316.3607, 330.2202, 344.5663,
2794 359.4111, 374.7666, 390.6450, 407.0583, 424.0190, 441.5395, 459.6321,
2795 478.3096, 497.5845, 517.4198, 537.7195, 558.3430, 579.1926, 600.1668,
2796 621.1624, 642.0764, 662.8084, 683.2620, 703.3467, 722.9795, 742.0855,
2797 760.5996, 778.4661, 795.6396, 812.0847, 827.7756, 842.6959, 856.8376,
2798 870.2004, 882.7910, 894.6222, 905.7116, 916.0815, 925.7571, 934.7666,
2799 943.1399, 950.9082, 958.1037, 964.7584, 970.9046, 976.5737, 981.7968,
2800 986.6036, 991.0230, 995.0824, 998.8081, 1002.2250, 1005.3562, 1008.2239,
2801 1010.8487, 1013.25, 1016.37, 1019.49, 1022.61, 1025.73, 1028.85,
2802 1031.97,
2803 1035.09, 1038.21, 1041.33, 1044.45
2804 };
2805
2806 for (int ip = 0; ip < ctl->met_np; ip++)
2807 ctl->met_p[ctl->met_np - ip - 1] = press[ip];
2808
2809 } else if (4 == ctl->met_press_level_def) {
2810
2811 ctl->met_np = 101;
2812
2813 const double press[101] = {
2814 0.0200, 0.0398, 0.0739, 0.1291, 0.2141, 0.3395, 0.5175, 0.7617,
2815 1.0872, 1.5099, 2.0464, 2.7136, 3.5282, 4.5069, 5.6652, 7.0181,
2816 8.5795, 10.3617, 12.3759, 14.6316, 17.1371, 19.8987, 22.9216, 26.2090,
2817 29.7630, 33.5843, 37.6720, 42.0242, 46.6378, 51.5086, 56.6316, 61.9984,
2818 67.5973, 73.4150, 79.4434, 85.7016, 92.2162, 99.0182, 106.1445,
2819 113.6382,
2820 121.5502, 129.9403, 138.8558, 148.3260, 158.3816, 169.0545, 180.3786,
2821 192.3889, 205.1222, 218.6172, 232.9140, 248.0547, 264.0833, 281.0456,
2822 298.9895, 317.9651, 338.0245, 359.2221, 381.6144, 405.2606, 430.2069,
2823 456.4813, 483.8505, 512.0662, 540.8577, 569.9401, 599.0310, 627.9668,
2824 656.6129, 684.8491, 712.5573, 739.5739, 765.7697, 791.0376, 815.2774,
2825 838.3507, 860.1516, 880.6080, 899.6602, 917.2205, 933.2247, 947.6584,
2826 960.5245, 971.8169, 981.5301, 989.7322, 996.8732, 1002.8013,
2827 1007.4431, 1010.8487, 1013.25, 1016.37, 1019.49, 1022.61, 1025.73,
2828 1028.85, 1031.97,
2829 1035.09, 1038.21, 1041.33, 1044.45
2830 };
2831
2832 for (int ip = 0; ip < ctl->met_np; ip++)
2833 ctl->met_p[ctl->met_np - ip - 1] = press[ip];
2834
2835 } else if (5 == ctl->met_press_level_def) {
2836
2837 ctl->met_np = 62;
2838
2839 const double press[62] = {
2840 0.01, 0.1361, 0.2499, 0.4288, 0.6952, 1.0742,
2841 2.2797, 3.1642, 4.2759, 7.2974, 9.2634, 11.5685, 14.2377, 20.761,
2842 24.6577, 33.8174, 39.1149, 51.199, 57.9834, 73.1187, 81.6182,
2843 90.8774, 101.005, 112.068, 124.134, 137.27, 151.549, 167.045, 183.834,
2844 201.997, 221.615, 242.772, 265.556, 290.055, 316.361, 344.566, 374.767,
2845 407.058, 441.539, 478.31, 517.42, 558.343, 600.167, 683.262, 722.979,
2846 760.6, 795.64, 827.776, 856.838, 882.791, 905.712, 925.757, 943.14,
2847 958.104, 972.495, 986.886, 1001.28, 1015.67, 1030.06, 1034.86, 1039.65,
2848 1044.45
2849 };
2850
2851 for (int ip = 0; ip < ctl->met_np; ip++)
2852 ctl->met_p[ctl->met_np - ip - 1] = press[ip];
2853
2854 } else if (6 == ctl->met_press_level_def) {
2855
2856 ctl->met_np = 137;
2857
2858 const double press[137] = {
2859 0.01, 0.02, 0.031, 0.0467, 0.0683, 0.0975, 0.1361, 0.1861,
2860 0.2499, 0.3299, 0.4288, 0.5496, 0.6952, 0.869, 1.0742,
2861 1.3143, 1.5928, 1.9134, 2.2797, 2.6954, 3.1642, 3.6898,
2862 4.2759, 4.9262, 5.6441, 6.4334, 7.2974, 8.2397, 9.2634,
2863 10.372, 11.5685, 12.8561, 14.2377, 15.7162, 17.2945, 18.9752,
2864 20.761, 22.6543, 24.6577, 26.7735, 29.0039, 31.3512, 33.8174,
2865 36.4047, 39.1149, 41.9493, 44.9082, 47.9915, 51.199, 54.5299,
2866 57.9834, 61.5607, 65.2695, 69.1187, 73.1187, 77.281, 81.6182,
2867 86.145, 90.8774, 95.828, 101.005, 106.415, 112.068, 117.971,
2868 124.134, 130.564, 137.27, 144.262, 151.549, 159.14, 167.045,
2869 175.273, 183.834, 192.739, 201.997, 211.619, 221.615, 231.995,
2870 242.772, 253.955, 265.556, 277.585, 290.055, 302.976, 316.361,
2871 330.22, 344.566, 359.411, 374.767, 390.645, 407.058, 424.019,
2872 441.539, 459.632, 478.31, 497.584, 517.42, 537.72, 558.343,
2873 579.193, 600.167, 621.162, 642.076, 662.808, 683.262, 703.347,
2874 722.979, 742.086, 760.6, 778.466, 795.64, 812.085, 827.776,
2875 842.696, 856.838, 870.2, 882.791, 894.622, 905.712, 916.081,
2876 925.757, 934.767, 943.14, 950.908, 958.104, 965.299, 972.495,
2877 979.69, 986.886, 994.081, 1001.28, 1008.47, 1015.67, 1022.86,
2878 1030.06, 1037.25, 1044.45
2879 };
2880
2881 for (int ip = 0; ip < ctl->met_np; ip++)
2882 ctl->met_p[ctl->met_np - ip - 1] = press[ip];
2883
2884 } else if (7 == ctl->met_press_level_def) {
2885
2886 ctl->met_np = 59;
2887
2888 const double press[59] = {
2889 0.1, 0.2, 0.3843, 0.6365, 0.9564, 1.3448, 1.8058, 2.3478,
2890 2.985, 3.7397, 4.6462, 5.7565, 7.1322, 8.8366, 10.9483,
2891 13.5647, 16.8064, 20.8227, 25.7989, 31.9642, 39.6029, 49.0671,
2892 60.1802, 73.0663, 87.7274, 104.229, 122.614, 142.902, 165.089,
2893 189.147, 215.025, 242.652, 272.059, 303.217, 336.044, 370.407,
2894 406.133, 443.009, 480.791, 519.209, 557.973, 596.777, 635.306,
2895 673.24, 710.263, 746.063, 780.346, 812.83, 843.263, 871.42,
2896 897.112, 920.189, 940.551, 958.148, 975.744, 993.341, 1010.94,
2897 1028.53, 1046.13
2898 };
2899
2900 for (int ip = 0; ip < ctl->met_np; ip++)
2901 ctl->met_p[ctl->met_np - ip - 1] = press[ip];
2902
2903 } else {
2904 ERRMSG("Use 0 for l137, 1 for l91, 2 for l60 or values between 3 and 7.");
2905 }
2906
2907 if (ctl->met_np > EP) {
2908 ERRMSG("Recompile with larger EP to use this pressure level definition.");
2909 }
2910}
2911
2912/*****************************************************************************/
2913
2914int locate_irr(
2915 const double *xx,
2916 const int n,
2917 const double x) {
2918
2919 int ilo = 0;
2920 int ihi = n - 1;
2921 int i = (ihi + ilo) >> 1;
2922
2923 if (xx[i] < xx[i + 1])
2924 while (ihi > ilo + 1) {
2925 i = (ihi + ilo) >> 1;
2926 if (xx[i] > x)
2927 ihi = i;
2928 else
2929 ilo = i;
2930 } else
2931 while (ihi > ilo + 1) {
2932 i = (ihi + ilo) >> 1;
2933 if (xx[i] <= x)
2934 ihi = i;
2935 else
2936 ilo = i;
2937 }
2938
2939 return ilo;
2940}
2941
2942/*****************************************************************************/
2943
2944int locate_irr_float(
2945 const float *xx,
2946 const int n,
2947 const double x,
2948 const int ig) {
2949
2950 int ilo = 0;
2951 int ihi = n - 1;
2952 int i = (ihi + ilo) >> 1;
2953
2954 if (x >= xx[ig] && x < xx[ig + 1])
2955 return ig;
2956
2957 if (xx[i] < xx[i + 1])
2958 while (ihi > ilo + 1) {
2959 i = (ihi + ilo) >> 1;
2960 if (xx[i] > x)
2961 ihi = i;
2962 else
2963 ilo = i;
2964 } else
2965 while (ihi > ilo + 1) {
2966 i = (ihi + ilo) >> 1;
2967 if (xx[i] <= x)
2968 ihi = i;
2969 else
2970 ilo = i;
2971 }
2972
2973 return ilo;
2974}
2975
2976/*****************************************************************************/
2977
2978int locate_reg(
2979 const double *xx,
2980 const int n,
2981 const double x) {
2982
2983 /* Calculate index... */
2984 const int i = (int) ((x - xx[0]) / (xx[1] - xx[0]));
2985
2986 /* Check range... */
2987 if (i < 0)
2988 return 0;
2989 else if (i > n - 2)
2990 return n - 2;
2991 else
2992 return i;
2993}
2994
2995/*****************************************************************************/
2996
2997void locate_vert(
2998 float profiles[EX][EY][EP],
2999 const int np,
3000 const int lon_ap_ind,
3001 const int lat_ap_ind,
3002 const double height_ap,
3003 int *ind) {
3004
3005 ind[0] = locate_irr_float(profiles[lon_ap_ind][lat_ap_ind],
3006 np, height_ap, 0);
3007 ind[1] = locate_irr_float(profiles[lon_ap_ind + 1][lat_ap_ind],
3008 np, height_ap, ind[0]);
3009 ind[2] = locate_irr_float(profiles[lon_ap_ind][lat_ap_ind + 1],
3010 np, height_ap, ind[1]);
3011 ind[3] = locate_irr_float(profiles[lon_ap_ind + 1][lat_ap_ind + 1],
3012 np, height_ap, ind[2]);
3013}
3014
3015/*****************************************************************************/
3016
3017void module_advect(
3018 const ctl_t *ctl,
3019 const cache_t *cache,
3020 met_t *met0,
3021 met_t *met1,
3022 atm_t *atm) {
3023
3024 /* Set timer... */
3025 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_ADVECT", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
3026
3027 /* Use omega vertical velocity... */
3028 if (ctl->advect_vert_coord == 0 || ctl->advect_vert_coord == 2) {
3029
3030 /* Loop over particles... */
3031 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1, "acc data present(ctl,cache,met0,met1,atm)") {
3032
3033 /* Init... */
3034 INTPOL_INIT;
3035 double dts, u[4], um = 0, v[4], vm = 0, w[4], wm = 0,
3036 x[3] = { 0, 0, 0 };
3037
3038 /* Loop over integration nodes... */
3039 for (int i = 0; i < ctl->advect; i++) {
3040
3041 /* Set position... */
3042 if (i == 0) {
3043 dts = 0.0;
3044 x[0] = atm->lon[ip];
3045 x[1] = atm->lat[ip];
3046 x[2] = atm->p[ip];
3047 } else {
3048 dts = (i == 3 ? 1.0 : 0.5) * cache->dt[ip];
3049 x[0] = atm->lon[ip] + DX2DEG(dts * u[i - 1] / 1000., atm->lat[ip]);
3050 x[1] = atm->lat[ip] + DY2DEG(dts * v[i - 1] / 1000.);
3051 x[2] = atm->p[ip] + dts * w[i - 1];
3052 }
3053 const double tm = atm->time[ip] + dts;
3054
3055 /* Interpolate meteo data on pressure levels... */
3056 if (ctl->advect_vert_coord == 0) {
3057 intpol_met_time_3d(met0, met0->u, met1, met1->u,
3058 tm, x[2], x[0], x[1], &u[i], ci, cw, 1);
3059 intpol_met_time_3d(met0, met0->v, met1, met1->v,
3060 tm, x[2], x[0], x[1], &v[i], ci, cw, 0);
3061 intpol_met_time_3d(met0, met0->w, met1, met1->w,
3062 tm, x[2], x[0], x[1], &w[i], ci, cw, 0);
3063 }
3064
3065 /* Interpolate meteo data on model levels... */
3066 else {
3067 intpol_met_time_3d_ml(met0, met0->pl, met0->ul,
3068 met1, met1->pl, met1->ul,
3069 tm, x[2], x[0], x[1], &u[i]);
3070 intpol_met_time_3d_ml(met0, met0->pl, met0->vl,
3071 met1, met1->pl, met1->vl,
3072 tm, x[2], x[0], x[1], &v[i]);
3073 intpol_met_time_3d_ml(met0, met0->pl, met0->wl,
3074 met1, met1->pl, met1->wl,
3075 tm, x[2], x[0], x[1], &w[i]);
3076 }
3077
3078 /* Get mean wind... */
3079 double k = 1.0;
3080 if (ctl->advect == 2)
3081 k = (i == 0 ? 0.0 : 1.0);
3082 else if (ctl->advect == 4)
3083 k = (i == 0 || i == 3 ? 1.0 / 6.0 : 2.0 / 6.0);
3084 um += k * u[i];
3085 vm += k * v[i];
3086 wm += k * w[i];
3087 }
3088
3089 /* Set new position... */
3090 atm->time[ip] += cache->dt[ip];
3091 atm->lon[ip] += DX2DEG(cache->dt[ip] * um / 1000.,
3092 (ctl->advect == 2 ? x[1] : atm->lat[ip]));
3093 atm->lat[ip] += DY2DEG(cache->dt[ip] * vm / 1000.);
3094 atm->p[ip] += cache->dt[ip] * wm;
3095 }
3096 }
3097
3098 /* Use zetadot vertical velocity... */
3099 else if (ctl->advect_vert_coord == 1) {
3100
3101 /* Loop over particles... */
3102 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1, "acc data present(ctl,cache,met0,met1,atm)") {
3103
3104 /* Convert pressure to zeta... */
3105 INTPOL_INIT;
3106 intpol_met_4d_coord(met0, met0->pl, met0->zetal, met1,
3107 met1->pl, met1->zetal, atm->time[ip], atm->p[ip],
3108 atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip],
3109 &atm->q[ctl->qnt_zeta][ip], ci, cw, 1);
3110
3111 /* Init... */
3112 double dts, u[4], um = 0, v[4], vm = 0, zeta_dot[4],
3113 zeta_dotm = 0, x[3] = { 0, 0, 0 };
3114
3115 /* Loop over integration nodes... */
3116 for (int i = 0; i < ctl->advect; i++) {
3117
3118 /* Set position... */
3119 if (i == 0) {
3120 dts = 0.0;
3121 x[0] = atm->lon[ip];
3122 x[1] = atm->lat[ip];
3123 x[2] = atm->q[ctl->qnt_zeta][ip];
3124 } else {
3125 dts = (i == 3 ? 1.0 : 0.5) * cache->dt[ip];
3126 x[0] = atm->lon[ip] + DX2DEG(dts * u[i - 1] / 1000., atm->lat[ip]);
3127 x[1] = atm->lat[ip] + DY2DEG(dts * v[i - 1] / 1000.);
3128 x[2] = atm->q[ctl->qnt_zeta][ip] + dts * zeta_dot[i - 1];
3129 }
3130 const double tm = atm->time[ip] + dts;
3131
3132 /* Interpolate meteo data... */
3133 intpol_met_4d_coord(met0, met0->zetal, met0->ul, met1, met1->zetal,
3134 met1->ul, tm, x[2], x[0], x[1], &u[i], ci, cw, 1);
3135 intpol_met_4d_coord(met0, met0->zetal, met0->vl, met1, met1->zetal,
3136 met1->vl, tm, x[2], x[0], x[1], &v[i], ci, cw, 0);
3137 intpol_met_4d_coord(met0, met0->zetal, met0->zeta_dotl, met1,
3138 met1->zetal, met1->zeta_dotl, tm, x[2], x[0],
3139 x[1], &zeta_dot[i], ci, cw, 0);
3140
3141 /* Get mean wind... */
3142 double k = 1.0;
3143 if (ctl->advect == 2)
3144 k = (i == 0 ? 0.0 : 1.0);
3145 else if (ctl->advect == 4)
3146 k = (i == 0 || i == 3 ? 1.0 / 6.0 : 2.0 / 6.0);
3147 um += k * u[i];
3148 vm += k * v[i];
3149 zeta_dotm += k * zeta_dot[i];
3150 }
3151
3152 /* Set new position... */
3153 atm->time[ip] += cache->dt[ip];
3154 atm->lon[ip] += DX2DEG(cache->dt[ip] * um / 1000.,
3155 (ctl->advect == 2 ? x[1] : atm->lat[ip]));
3156 atm->lat[ip] += DY2DEG(cache->dt[ip] * vm / 1000.);
3157 atm->q[ctl->qnt_zeta][ip] += cache->dt[ip] * zeta_dotm;
3158
3159 /* Convert zeta to pressure... */
3160 intpol_met_4d_coord(met0, met0->zetal, met0->pl, met1, met1->zetal,
3161 met1->pl, atm->time[ip],
3162 atm->q[ctl->qnt_zeta][ip], atm->lon[ip],
3163 atm->lat[ip], &atm->p[ip], ci, cw, 1);
3164 }
3165 }
3166}
3167
3168/*****************************************************************************/
3169
3170void module_advect_init(
3171 const ctl_t *ctl,
3172 const cache_t *cache,
3173 met_t *met0,
3174 met_t *met1,
3175 atm_t *atm) {
3176
3177 /* Check parameters... */
3178 if (ctl->advect_vert_coord != 1)
3179 return;
3180
3181 /* Set timer... */
3182 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_ADVECT_INIT", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
3183
3184 /* Loop over particles... */
3185 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 0, "acc data present(ctl,met0,met1,atm)") {
3186
3187 /* Initialize pressure consistent with zeta... */
3188 INTPOL_INIT;
3189 intpol_met_4d_coord(met0, met0->zetal, met0->pl, met1, met1->zetal,
3190 met1->pl, atm->time[ip], atm->q[ctl->qnt_zeta][ip],
3191 atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip], &atm->p[ip], ci, cw, 1);
3192 }
3193}
3194
3195/*****************************************************************************/
3196
3197void module_bound_cond(
3198 const ctl_t *ctl,
3199 const cache_t *cache,
3200 const clim_t *clim,
3201 met_t *met0,
3202 met_t *met1,
3203 atm_t *atm) {
3204
3205 /* Set timer... */
3206 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_BOUND_COND", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
3207
3208 /* Check quantity flags... */
3209 if (ctl->qnt_m < 0 && ctl->qnt_vmr < 0 && ctl->qnt_Cccl4
3210 && ctl->qnt_Cccl3f < 0 && ctl->qnt_Cccl2f2 < 0
3211 && ctl->qnt_Cn2o < 0 && ctl->qnt_Csf6 < 0 && ctl->qnt_aoa < 0)
3212 return;
3213
3214 /* Loop over particles... */
3215 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1,
3216 "acc data present(ctl,cache,clim,met0,met1,atm)") {
3217
3218 /* Check latitude and pressure range... */
3219 if (atm->lat[ip] < ctl->bound_lat0 || atm->lat[ip] > ctl->bound_lat1
3220 || atm->p[ip] > ctl->bound_p0 || atm->p[ip] < ctl->bound_p1)
3221 continue;
3222
3223 /* Check surface layer... */
3224 if (ctl->bound_dps > 0 || ctl->bound_dzs > 0
3225 || ctl->bound_zetas > 0 || ctl->bound_pbl) {
3226
3227 /* Get surface pressure... */
3228 double ps;
3229 INTPOL_INIT;
3230 INTPOL_2D(ps, 1);
3231
3232 /* Check pressure... */
3233 if (ctl->bound_dps > 0 && atm->p[ip] < ps - ctl->bound_dps)
3234 continue;
3235
3236 /* Check height... */
3237 if (ctl->bound_dzs > 0 && Z(atm->p[ip]) > Z(ps) + ctl->bound_dzs)
3238 continue;
3239
3240 /* Check zeta range... */
3241 if (ctl->bound_zetas > 0) {
3242 double t;
3243 INTPOL_3D(t, 1);
3244 if (ZETA(ps, atm->p[ip], t) > ctl->bound_zetas)
3245 continue;
3246 }
3247
3248 /* Check planetary boundary layer... */
3249 if (ctl->bound_pbl) {
3250 double pbl;
3251 INTPOL_2D(pbl, 0);
3252 if (atm->p[ip] < pbl)
3253 continue;
3254 }
3255 }
3256
3257 /* Set mass and volume mixing ratio... */
3258 if (ctl->qnt_m >= 0 && ctl->bound_mass >= 0)
3259 atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip] =
3260 ctl->bound_mass + ctl->bound_mass_trend * atm->time[ip];
3261 if (ctl->qnt_vmr >= 0 && ctl->bound_vmr >= 0)
3262 atm->q[ctl->qnt_vmr][ip] =
3263 ctl->bound_vmr + ctl->bound_vmr_trend * atm->time[ip];
3264
3265 /* Set CFC-10 volume mixing ratio... */
3266 if (ctl->qnt_Cccl4 >= 0 && ctl->clim_ccl4_timeseries[0] != '-')
3267 atm->q[ctl->qnt_Cccl4][ip] = clim_ts(&clim->ccl4, atm->time[ip]);
3268
3269 /* Set CFC-11 volume mixing ratio... */
3270 if (ctl->qnt_Cccl3f >= 0 && ctl->clim_ccl3f_timeseries[0] != '-')
3271 atm->q[ctl->qnt_Cccl3f][ip] = clim_ts(&clim->ccl3f, atm->time[ip]);
3272
3273 /* Set CFC-12 volume mixing ratio... */
3274 if (ctl->qnt_Cccl2f2 >= 0 && ctl->clim_ccl2f2_timeseries[0] != '-')
3275 atm->q[ctl->qnt_Cccl2f2][ip] = clim_ts(&clim->ccl2f2, atm->time[ip]);
3276
3277 /* Set N2O volume mixing ratio... */
3278 if (ctl->qnt_Cn2o >= 0 && ctl->clim_n2o_timeseries[0] != '-')
3279 atm->q[ctl->qnt_Cn2o][ip] = clim_ts(&clim->n2o, atm->time[ip]);
3280
3281 /* Set SF6 volume mixing ratio... */
3282 if (ctl->qnt_Csf6 >= 0 && ctl->clim_sf6_timeseries[0] != '-')
3283 atm->q[ctl->qnt_Csf6][ip] = clim_ts(&clim->sf6, atm->time[ip]);
3284
3285 /* Set age of air... */
3286 if (ctl->qnt_aoa >= 0)
3287 atm->q[ctl->qnt_aoa][ip] = atm->time[ip];
3288 }
3289}
3290
3291/*****************************************************************************/
3292
3293void module_chem_grid(
3294 const ctl_t *ctl,
3295 met_t *met0,
3296 met_t *met1,
3297 atm_t *atm,
3298 const double tt) {
3299
3300 /* Check quantities... */
3301 if (ctl->qnt_m < 0 || ctl->qnt_Cx < 0)
3302 return;
3303 if (ctl->molmass <= 0)
3304 ERRMSG("Molar mass is not defined!");
3305
3306 /* Set timer... */
3307 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_CHEM_GRID", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
3308
3309 /* Allocate... */
3310 const int ensemble_mode = (ctl->nens > 0);
3311 const int np = atm->np;
3312 const int nz = ctl->chemgrid_nz;
3313 const int nx = ctl->chemgrid_nx;
3314 const int ny = ctl->chemgrid_ny;
3315 const int ngrid = nx * ny * nz;
3316 const int nens = ensemble_mode ? ctl->nens : 1;
3317
3318 double *restrict const z = (double *) malloc((size_t) nz * sizeof(double));
3319 double *restrict const press =
3320 (double *) malloc((size_t) nz * sizeof(double));
3321 double *restrict const mass =
3322 (double *) calloc((size_t) ngrid * (size_t) nens, sizeof(double));
3323 double *restrict const area =
3324 (double *) malloc((size_t) ny * sizeof(double));
3325 double *restrict const lon =
3326 (double *) malloc((size_t) nx * sizeof(double));
3327 double *restrict const lat =
3328 (double *) malloc((size_t) ny * sizeof(double));
3329
3330 int *restrict const ixs = (int *) malloc((size_t) np * sizeof(int));
3331 int *restrict const iys = (int *) malloc((size_t) np * sizeof(int));
3332 int *restrict const izs = (int *) malloc((size_t) np * sizeof(int));
3333
3334 /* Set grid box size... */
3335 const double dz = (ctl->chemgrid_z1 - ctl->chemgrid_z0) / nz;
3336 const double dlon = (ctl->chemgrid_lon1 - ctl->chemgrid_lon0) / nx;
3337 const double dlat = (ctl->chemgrid_lat1 - ctl->chemgrid_lat0) / ny;
3338
3339 /* Set vertical coordinates... */
3340#ifdef _OPENACC
3341#pragma acc enter data create(ixs[0:np],iys[0:np],izs[0:np],z[0:nz],press[0:nz],mass[0:ngrid*nens],area[0:ny],lon[0:nx],lat[0:ny])
3342#pragma acc data present(ctl,met0,met1,atm,ixs,iys,izs,z,press,mass,area,lon,lat)
3343#pragma acc parallel loop independent gang vector
3344#else
3345#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
3346#endif
3347 for (int iz = 0; iz < nz; iz++) {
3348 z[iz] = ctl->chemgrid_z0 + dz * (iz + 0.5);
3349 press[iz] = P(z[iz]);
3350 }
3351
3352 /* Set time interval for output... */
3353 const double t0 = tt - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
3354 const double t1 = tt + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
3355
3356 /* Get indices... */
3357#ifdef _OPENACC
3358#pragma acc parallel loop independent gang vector
3359#else
3360#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
3361#endif
3362 for (int ip = 0; ip < np; ip++) {
3363 ixs[ip] = (int) ((atm->lon[ip] - ctl->chemgrid_lon0) / dlon);
3364 iys[ip] = (int) ((atm->lat[ip] - ctl->chemgrid_lat0) / dlat);
3365 izs[ip] = (int) ((Z(atm->p[ip]) - ctl->chemgrid_z0) / dz);
3366 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1
3367 || ixs[ip] < 0 || ixs[ip] >= nx
3368 || iys[ip] < 0 || iys[ip] >= ny || izs[ip] < 0 || izs[ip] >= nz)
3369 izs[ip] = -1;
3370 }
3371
3372 /* Set horizontal coordinates... */
3373#ifdef _OPENACC
3374#pragma acc parallel loop independent gang vector
3375#else
3376#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
3377#endif
3378 for (int ix = 0; ix < nx; ix++)
3379 lon[ix] = ctl->chemgrid_lon0 + dlon * (ix + 0.5);
3380
3381#ifdef _OPENACC
3382#pragma acc parallel loop independent gang vector
3383#else
3384#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
3385#endif
3386 for (int iy = 0; iy < ny; iy++) {
3387 lat[iy] = ctl->chemgrid_lat0 + dlat * (iy + 0.5);
3388 area[iy] = dlat * dlon * SQR(RE * M_PI / 180.) * cos(DEG2RAD(lat[iy]));
3389 }
3390
3391 /* Get mass per grid box... */
3392#ifdef _OPENACC
3393#pragma acc parallel loop independent gang vector
3394#endif
3395 for (int ip = 0; ip < np; ip++) {
3396 if (izs[ip] >= 0) {
3397 int mass_idx = ARRAY_3D(ixs[ip], iys[ip], ny, izs[ip], nz);
3398 if (ensemble_mode) {
3399 const int ens = (int) atm->q[ctl->qnt_ens][ip];
3400 mass_idx += ens * ngrid;
3401 }
3402#ifdef _OPENACC
3403#pragma acc atomic update
3404#endif
3405 mass[mass_idx] += atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip];
3406 }
3407 }
3408
3409 /* Assign grid data to air parcels ... */
3410#ifdef _OPENACC
3411#pragma acc parallel loop independent gang vector
3412#else
3413#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
3414#endif
3415 for (int ip = 0; ip < np; ip++)
3416 if (izs[ip] >= 0) {
3417
3418 /* Interpolate temperature... */
3419 double temp;
3420 INTPOL_INIT;
3421 intpol_met_time_3d(met0, met0->t, met1, met1->t, tt,
3422 press[izs[ip]],
3423 lon[ixs[ip]], lat[iys[ip]], &temp, ci, cw, 1);
3424
3425 /* Set mass... */
3426 int mass_idx = ARRAY_3D(ixs[ip], iys[ip], ny, izs[ip], nz);
3427 if (ensemble_mode) {
3428 const int ens = (int) atm->q[ctl->qnt_ens][ip];
3429 mass_idx += ens * ngrid;
3430 }
3431
3432 /* Calculate volume mixing ratio... */
3433 const double m = mass[mass_idx];
3434 atm->q[ctl->qnt_Cx][ip] = MA / ctl->molmass * m
3435 / (RHO(press[izs[ip]], temp) * area[iys[ip]] * dz * 1e9);
3436 }
3437
3438 /* Free... */
3439#ifdef _OPENACC
3440#pragma acc exit data delete(ixs,iys,izs,z,press,mass,area,lon,lat)
3441#endif
3442 free(mass);
3443 free(lon);
3444 free(lat);
3445 free(area);
3446 free(z);
3447 free(press);
3448 free(ixs);
3449 free(iys);
3450 free(izs);
3451}
3452
3453/*****************************************************************************/
3454
3455void module_chem_init(
3456 const ctl_t *ctl,
3457 const cache_t *cache,
3458 const clim_t *clim,
3459 met_t *met0,
3460 met_t *met1,
3461 atm_t *atm) {
3462
3463 /* Set timer... */
3464 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_CHEM_INIT", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
3465
3466 /* Loop over particles... */
3467 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 0,
3468 "acc data present(ctl,cache,clim,met0,met1,atm)") {
3469
3470 /* Set H2O and O3 using meteo data... */
3471 INTPOL_INIT;
3472 if (ctl->qnt_Ch2o >= 0) {
3473 double h2o;
3474 INTPOL_3D(h2o, 1);
3475 SET_ATM(qnt_Ch2o, h2o);
3476 }
3477 if (ctl->qnt_Co3 >= 0) {
3478 double o3;
3479 INTPOL_3D(o3, 1);
3480 SET_ATM(qnt_Co3, o3);
3481 }
3482
3483 /* Set radical species... */
3484 SET_ATM(qnt_Coh, clim_oh(ctl, clim, atm->time[ip],
3485 atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip], atm->p[ip]));
3486 SET_ATM(qnt_Cho2, clim_zm(&clim->ho2, atm->time[ip],
3487 atm->lat[ip], atm->p[ip]));
3488 SET_ATM(qnt_Ch2o2, clim_zm(&clim->h2o2, atm->time[ip],
3489 atm->lat[ip], atm->p[ip]));
3490 SET_ATM(qnt_Co1d, clim_zm(&clim->o1d, atm->time[ip],
3491 atm->lat[ip], atm->p[ip]));
3492 }
3493}
3494
3495/*****************************************************************************/
3496
3497void module_convection(
3498 const ctl_t *ctl,
3499 cache_t *cache,
3500 met_t *met0,
3501 met_t *met1,
3502 atm_t *atm) {
3503
3504 /* Set timer... */
3505 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_CONVECTION", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
3506
3507 /* Create random numbers... */
3508 module_rng(ctl, cache->rs, (size_t) atm->np, 0);
3509
3510 /* Loop over particles... */
3511 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1, "acc data present(ctl,cache,met0,met1,atm)") {
3512
3513 /* Interpolate surface pressure... */
3514 double ps;
3515 INTPOL_INIT;
3516 INTPOL_2D(ps, 1);
3517
3518 /* Initialize pressure range for vertical mixing... */
3519 double pbot = ps, ptop = ps;
3520
3521 /* Mixing in the PBL... */
3522 if (ctl->conv_mix_pbl) {
3523
3524 /* Interpolate PBL... */
3525 double pbl;
3526 INTPOL_2D(pbl, 0);
3527
3528 /* Set pressure range... */
3529 ptop = pbl - ctl->conv_pbl_trans * (ps - pbl);
3530 }
3531
3532 /* Convective mixing... */
3533 if (ctl->conv_cape >= 0) {
3534
3535 /* Interpolate CAPE, CIN, and equilibrium level... */
3536 double cape, cin, pel;
3537 INTPOL_2D(cape, 0);
3538 INTPOL_2D(cin, 0);
3539 INTPOL_2D(pel, 0);
3540
3541 /* Set pressure range... */
3542 if (isfinite(cape) && cape >= ctl->conv_cape
3543 && (ctl->conv_cin <= 0 || (isfinite(cin) && cin >= ctl->conv_cin)))
3544 ptop = GSL_MIN(ptop, pel);
3545 }
3546
3547 /* Apply vertical mixing... */
3548 if (ptop != pbot && atm->p[ip] >= ptop) {
3549
3550 /* Get density range... */
3551 double tbot, ttop;
3552 intpol_met_time_3d(met0, met0->t, met1, met1->t, atm->time[ip],
3553 pbot, atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip], &tbot, ci, cw, 1);
3554 intpol_met_time_3d(met0, met0->t, met1, met1->t, atm->time[ip], ptop,
3555 atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip], &ttop, ci, cw, 1);
3556 const double rhobot = pbot / tbot;
3557 const double rhotop = ptop / ttop;
3558
3559 /* Get new density... */
3560 const double rho = rhobot + (rhotop - rhobot) * cache->rs[ip];
3561
3562 /* Get pressure... */
3563 atm->p[ip] = LIN(rhobot, pbot, rhotop, ptop, rho);
3564 }
3565 }
3566}
3567
3568/*****************************************************************************/
3569
3570#ifdef DD
3571void module_dd(
3572 ctl_t *ctl,
3573 atm_t *atm,
3574 cache_t *cache,
3575 dd_t *dd,
3576 met_t **met) {
3577
3578 /* Initialize particles locally... */
3579 int nparticles = 0;
3580 particle_t *particles;
3581 ALLOC(particles, particle_t, DD_NPART);
3582
3583 /* Assign particles to new subdomains... */
3584 dd_assign_rect_subdomains_atm(atm, ctl, dd, 0);
3585
3586 /* Sorting particles according to location and target rank... */
3587 dd_sort(ctl, *met, atm, dd, &nparticles, &dd->rank);
3588
3589 /* Transform from struct of array to array of struct... */
3590 dd_atm2particles(atm, particles, ctl, &nparticles, cache, dd->rank);
3591
3592 /********************* CPU region start ***********************************/
3593
3594 /* Perform the communication... */
3595 dd_communicate_particles(particles, &nparticles, dd->MPI_Particle,
3596 dd->neighbours, ctl->dd_nbr_neighbours, *ctl);
3597
3598 /********************* CPU region end *************************************/
3599
3600 /* Transform from array of struct to struct of array... */
3601 dd_particles2atm(atm, particles, ctl, &nparticles, cache);
3602
3603 /* Free local particle array... */
3604 free(particles);
3605}
3606#endif
3607
3608/*****************************************************************************/
3609
3610void module_decay(
3611 const ctl_t *ctl,
3612 const cache_t *cache,
3613 const clim_t *clim,
3614 atm_t *atm) {
3615
3616 /* Set timer... */
3617 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_DECAY", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
3618
3619 /* Check quantity flags... */
3620 if (ctl->qnt_m < 0 && ctl->qnt_vmr < 0)
3621 ERRMSG("Module needs quantity mass or volume mixing ratio!");
3622
3623 /* Loop over particles... */
3624 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1, "acc data present(ctl,cache,clim,atm)") {
3625
3626 /* Get weighting factor... */
3627 const double w = tropo_weight(clim, atm, ip);
3628
3629 /* Set lifetime... */
3630 const double tdec = w * ctl->tdec_trop + (1 - w) * ctl->tdec_strat;
3631
3632 /* Calculate exponential decay... */
3633 const double aux = exp(-cache->dt[ip] / tdec);
3634 if (ctl->qnt_m >= 0) {
3635 if (ctl->qnt_mloss_decay >= 0)
3636 atm->q[ctl->qnt_mloss_decay][ip]
3637 += atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip] * (1 - aux);
3638 atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip] *= aux;
3639 if (ctl->qnt_loss_rate >= 0)
3640 atm->q[ctl->qnt_loss_rate][ip] += 1. / tdec;
3641 }
3642 if (ctl->qnt_vmr >= 0)
3643 atm->q[ctl->qnt_vmr][ip] *= aux;
3644 }
3645}
3646
3647/*****************************************************************************/
3648
3649void module_diff_meso(
3650 const ctl_t *ctl,
3651 cache_t *cache,
3652 met_t *met0,
3653 met_t *met1,
3654 atm_t *atm) {
3655
3656 /* Set timer... */
3657 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_DIFF_MESO", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
3658
3659 /* Create random numbers... */
3660 module_rng(ctl, cache->rs, 3 * (size_t) atm->np, 1);
3661
3662 /* Loop over particles... */
3663 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1, "acc data present(ctl,cache,met0,met1,atm)") {
3664
3665 /* Get indices... */
3666 const int ix = locate_reg(met0->lon, met0->nx, atm->lon[ip]);
3667 const int iy = locate_irr(met0->lat, met0->ny, atm->lat[ip]);
3668 const int iz = locate_irr(met0->p, met0->np, atm->p[ip]);
3669
3670 /* Get standard deviations of local wind data... */
3671 float umean = 0, usig = 0, vmean = 0, vsig = 0, wmean = 0, wsig = 0;
3672 for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
3673 for (int j = 0; j < 2; j++)
3674 for (int k = 0; k < 2; k++) {
3675 umean += met0->u[ix + i][iy + j][iz + k];
3676 usig += SQR(met0->u[ix + i][iy + j][iz + k]);
3677 vmean += met0->v[ix + i][iy + j][iz + k];
3678 vsig += SQR(met0->v[ix + i][iy + j][iz + k]);
3679 wmean += met0->w[ix + i][iy + j][iz + k];
3680 wsig += SQR(met0->w[ix + i][iy + j][iz + k]);
3681
3682 umean += met1->u[ix + i][iy + j][iz + k];
3683 usig += SQR(met1->u[ix + i][iy + j][iz + k]);
3684 vmean += met1->v[ix + i][iy + j][iz + k];
3685 vsig += SQR(met1->v[ix + i][iy + j][iz + k]);
3686 wmean += met1->w[ix + i][iy + j][iz + k];
3687 wsig += SQR(met1->w[ix + i][iy + j][iz + k]);
3688 }
3689 usig = usig / 16.f - SQR(umean / 16.f);
3690 usig = (usig > 0 ? sqrtf(usig) : 0);
3691 vsig = vsig / 16.f - SQR(vmean / 16.f);
3692 vsig = (vsig > 0 ? sqrtf(vsig) : 0);
3693 wsig = wsig / 16.f - SQR(wmean / 16.f);
3694 wsig = (wsig > 0 ? sqrtf(wsig) : 0);
3695
3696 /* Set temporal correlations for mesoscale fluctuations... */
3697 const double r = 1 - 2 * fabs(cache->dt[ip]) / ctl->dt_met;
3698 const double r2 = sqrt(1 - r * r);
3699
3700 /* Calculate horizontal mesoscale wind fluctuations... */
3701 if (ctl->turb_mesox > 0) {
3702 cache->uvwp[ip][0] =
3703 (float) (r * cache->uvwp[ip][0] +
3704 r2 * cache->rs[3 * ip] * ctl->turb_mesox * usig);
3705 atm->lon[ip] +=
3706 DX2DEG(cache->uvwp[ip][0] * cache->dt[ip] / 1000., atm->lat[ip]);
3707
3708 cache->uvwp[ip][1] =
3709 (float) (r * cache->uvwp[ip][1] +
3710 r2 * cache->rs[3 * ip + 1] * ctl->turb_mesox * vsig);
3711 atm->lat[ip] += DY2DEG(cache->uvwp[ip][1] * cache->dt[ip] / 1000.);
3712 }
3713
3714 /* Calculate vertical mesoscale wind fluctuations... */
3715 if (ctl->turb_mesoz > 0) {
3716 cache->uvwp[ip][2] =
3717 (float) (r * cache->uvwp[ip][2] +
3718 r2 * cache->rs[3 * ip + 2] * ctl->turb_mesoz * wsig);
3719 atm->p[ip] += cache->uvwp[ip][2] * cache->dt[ip];
3720 }
3721 }
3722}
3723
3724/*****************************************************************************/
3725
3726void module_diff_pbl(
3727 const ctl_t *ctl,
3728 cache_t *cache,
3729 met_t *met0,
3730 met_t *met1,
3731 atm_t *atm) {
3732
3733 /* Set timer... */
3734 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_DIFF_PBL", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
3735
3736 /* Create random numbers... */
3737 module_rng(ctl, cache->rs, 3 * (size_t) atm->np, 1);
3738
3739 /* Loop over particles... */
3740 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1, "acc data present(ctl,cache,met0,met1,atm)") {
3741
3742 double dsigw_dz = 0.0, sig_u = 0.25, sig_w = 0.1,
3743 tau_u = 300., tau_w = 100.;
3744
3745 /* Get surface and PBL pressure... */
3746 double pbl, ps;
3747 INTPOL_INIT;
3748 INTPOL_2D(ps, 1);
3749 INTPOL_2D(pbl, 0);
3750
3751 /* Boundary layer... */
3752 if (atm->p[ip] >= pbl) {
3753
3754 /* Calculate heights... */
3755 const double p = MIN(atm->p[ip], ps);
3756 const double zs = Z(ps);
3757 const double z = 1e3 * (Z(p) - zs);
3758 const double zi = 1e3 * (Z(pbl) - zs);
3759 const double zratio = z / zi;
3760
3761 /* Calculate friction velocity... */
3762 double ess, nss, h2o, t;
3763 INTPOL_2D(ess, 0);
3764 INTPOL_2D(nss, 0);
3765 INTPOL_3D(t, 1);
3766 INTPOL_3D(h2o, 0);
3767 const double rho = RHO(p, TVIRT(t, h2o));
3768 const double tau = sqrt(SQR(ess) + SQR(nss));
3769 const double ustar = sqrt(tau / rho);
3770
3771 /* Get surface sensible heat flux... */
3772 double shf;
3773 INTPOL_2D(shf, 1);
3774
3775 /* Stable or neutral conditions... */
3776 if (shf <= 0) {
3777
3778 /* Calcalute turbulent velocity variances... */
3779 sig_u = 1e-2 + 2.0 * ustar * (1.0 - zratio);
3780 sig_w = 1e-2 + 1.3 * ustar * (1.0 - zratio);
3781
3782 /* Calculate derivative dsig_w/dz... */
3783 dsigw_dz = -1.3 * ustar / zi;
3784
3785 /* Calcalute Lagrangian timescales... */
3786 tau_u = 0.07 * zi / sig_u * sqrt(zratio);
3787 tau_w = 0.1 * zi / sig_w * pow(zratio, 0.8);
3788 }
3789
3790 /* Unstable conditions... */
3791 else {
3792
3793 /* Convective velocity... */
3794 const double wstar =
3795 pow(G0 / THETAVIRT(p, t, h2o) * shf / (rho * CPD) * zi, 1. / 3.);
3796
3797 /* Calcalute turbulent velocity variances... */
3798 sig_u = 1e-2
3799 + sqrt(0.4 * SQR(wstar) + (5.0 - 4.0 * zratio) * SQR(ustar));
3800 sig_w = 1e-2 + sqrt(1.2 * SQR(wstar) * (1.0 - 0.9 * zratio)
3801 * pow(zratio, 2.0 / 3.0)
3802 + (1.8 - 1.4 * zratio) * SQR(ustar));
3803
3804 /* Calculate derivative dsig_w/dz... */
3805 dsigw_dz = 0.5 / sig_w / zi * (-1.4 * SQR(ustar) + SQR(wstar)
3806 * (0.8 *
3807 pow(MAX(zratio, 1e-3), -1.0 / 3.0)
3808 - 1.8 * pow(zratio, 2.0 / 3.0)));
3809
3810 /* Calculate Lagrangian timescales... */
3811 const double C0 = 3.0; // TODO: typically 3...6, NAME model uses 3?
3812 const double eps =
3813 (1.5 - 1.2 * pow(zratio, 1.0 / 3.0)) * SQR(wstar) * wstar / zi
3814 + SQR(ustar) * ustar * (1.0 - 0.8 * zratio) / (KARMAN * z);
3815 tau_u = 2 * SQR(sig_u) / (C0 * eps);
3816 tau_w = 2 * SQR(sig_w) / (C0 * eps);
3817 }
3818 }
3819
3820 /* Set minimum values... */
3821 sig_u = MAX(sig_u, 0.25);
3822 sig_w = MAX(sig_w, 0.1);
3823 tau_u = MAX(tau_u, 300.);
3824 tau_w = MAX(tau_w, 100.);
3825
3826 /* Update perturbations... */
3827 const double ru = exp(-fabs(cache->dt[ip]) / tau_u);
3828 const double ru2 = sqrt(1.0 - SQR(ru));
3829 cache->uvwp[ip][0]
3830 = (float) (cache->uvwp[ip][0] * ru + ru2 * cache->rs[3 * ip]);
3831 cache->uvwp[ip][1]
3832 = (float) (cache->uvwp[ip][1] * ru + ru2 * cache->rs[3 * ip + 1]);
3833
3834 const double rw = exp(-fabs(cache->dt[ip]) / tau_w);
3835 const double rw2 = sqrt(1.0 - SQR(rw));
3836 cache->uvwp[ip][2]
3837 = (float) (cache->uvwp[ip][2] * rw + rw2 * cache->rs[3 * ip + 2]
3838 + sig_w * dsigw_dz * cache->dt[ip]); // TODO: check approx for density correction?
3839
3840 /* Calculate new air parcel position... */
3841 atm->lon[ip] +=
3842 DX2DEG(cache->uvwp[ip][0] * cache->dt[ip] / 1000., atm->lat[ip]);
3843 atm->lat[ip] += DY2DEG(cache->uvwp[ip][1] * cache->dt[ip] / 1000.);
3844 atm->p[ip] +=
3845 DZ2DP(cache->uvwp[ip][2] * cache->dt[ip] / 1000., atm->p[ip]);
3846 }
3847}
3848
3849/*****************************************************************************/
3850
3851void module_diff_turb(
3852 const ctl_t *ctl,
3853 cache_t *cache,
3854 const clim_t *clim,
3855 met_t *met0,
3856 met_t *met1,
3857 atm_t *atm) {
3858
3859 /* Set timer... */
3860 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_DIFF_TURB", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
3861
3862 /* Create random numbers... */
3863 module_rng(ctl, cache->rs, 3 * (size_t) atm->np, 1);
3864
3865 /* Loop over particles... */
3866 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1,
3867 "acc data present(ctl,cache,clim,met0,met1,atm)") {
3868
3869 /* Get PBL and surface pressure... */
3870 double pbl, ps;
3871 INTPOL_INIT;
3872 INTPOL_2D(pbl, 1);
3873 INTPOL_2D(ps, 0);
3874
3875 /* Get weighting factors... */
3876 const double wpbl = pbl_weight(ctl, atm, ip, pbl, ps);
3877 const double wtrop = tropo_weight(clim, atm, ip) * (1.0 - wpbl);
3878 const double wstrat = 1.0 - wpbl - wtrop;
3879
3880 /* Set diffusivity... */
3881 const double dx = wpbl * ctl->turb_dx_pbl + wtrop * ctl->turb_dx_trop
3882 + wstrat * ctl->turb_dx_strat;
3883 const double dz = wpbl * ctl->turb_dz_pbl + wtrop * ctl->turb_dz_trop
3884 + wstrat * ctl->turb_dz_strat;
3885
3886 /* Horizontal turbulent diffusion... */
3887 if (dx > 0) {
3888 const double sigma = sqrt(2.0 * dx * fabs(cache->dt[ip])) / 1000.;
3889 atm->lon[ip] += DX2DEG(cache->rs[3 * ip] * sigma, atm->lat[ip]);
3890 atm->lat[ip] += DY2DEG(cache->rs[3 * ip + 1] * sigma);
3891 }
3892
3893 /* Vertical turbulent diffusion... */
3894 if (dz > 0) {
3895 const double sigma = sqrt(2.0 * dz * fabs(cache->dt[ip])) / 1000.;
3896 atm->p[ip] += DZ2DP(cache->rs[3 * ip + 2] * sigma, atm->p[ip]);
3897 }
3898 }
3899}
3900
3901/*****************************************************************************/
3902
3903void module_dry_depo(
3904 const ctl_t *ctl,
3905 const cache_t *cache,
3906 met_t *met0,
3907 met_t *met1,
3908 atm_t *atm) {
3909
3910 /* Set timer... */
3911 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_DRY_DEPO", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
3912
3913 /* Check quantity flags... */
3914 if (ctl->qnt_m < 0 && ctl->qnt_vmr < 0)
3915 ERRMSG("Module needs quantity mass or volume mixing ratio!");
3916
3917 /* Loop over particles... */
3918 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1, "acc data present(ctl,cache,met0,met1,atm)") {
3919
3920 /* Get surface pressure... */
3921 double ps;
3922 INTPOL_INIT;
3923 INTPOL_2D(ps, 1);
3924
3925 /* Check whether particle is above the surface layer... */
3926 if (atm->p[ip] < ps - ctl->dry_depo_dp)
3927 continue;
3928
3929 /* Set depth of surface layer... */
3930 const double dz = 1000. * (Z(ps - ctl->dry_depo_dp) - Z(ps));
3931
3932 /* Calculate sedimentation velocity for particles... */
3933 double v_dep;
3934 if (ctl->qnt_rp > 0 && ctl->qnt_rhop > 0) {
3935
3936 /* Get temperature... */
3937 double t;
3938 INTPOL_3D(t, 1);
3939
3940 /* Set deposition velocity... */
3941 v_dep = sedi(atm->p[ip], t, atm->q[ctl->qnt_rp][ip],
3942 atm->q[ctl->qnt_rhop][ip]);
3943 }
3944
3945 /* Use explicit sedimentation velocity for gases... */
3946 else
3947 v_dep = ctl->dry_depo_vdep;
3948
3949 /* Calculate loss of mass based on deposition velocity... */
3950 const double aux = exp(-cache->dt[ip] * v_dep / dz);
3951 if (ctl->qnt_m >= 0) {
3952 if (ctl->qnt_mloss_dry >= 0)
3953 atm->q[ctl->qnt_mloss_dry][ip]
3954 += atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip] * (1 - aux);
3955 atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip] *= aux;
3956 if (ctl->qnt_loss_rate >= 0)
3957 atm->q[ctl->qnt_loss_rate][ip] += v_dep / dz;
3958 }
3959 if (ctl->qnt_vmr >= 0)
3960 atm->q[ctl->qnt_vmr][ip] *= aux;
3961 }
3962}
3963
3964/*****************************************************************************/
3965
3966void module_h2o2_chem(
3967 const ctl_t *ctl,
3968 const cache_t *cache,
3969 const clim_t *clim,
3970 met_t *met0,
3971 met_t *met1,
3972 atm_t *atm) {
3973
3974 /* Set timer... */
3975 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_H2O2_CHEM", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
3976
3977 /* Check quantity flags... */
3978 if (ctl->qnt_m < 0 && ctl->qnt_vmr < 0)
3979 ERRMSG("Module needs quantity mass or volume mixing ratio!");
3980
3981 /* Parameter of SO2 correction... */
3982 const double a = 3.12541941e-06;
3983 const double b = -5.72532259e-01;
3984 const double low = pow(1. / a, 1. / b);
3985
3986 /* Loop over particles... */
3987 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1, "acc data present(ctl,cache,met0,met1,atm)") {
3988
3989 /* Check whether particle is inside cloud... */
3990 double lwc, rwc;
3991 INTPOL_INIT;
3992 INTPOL_3D(lwc, 1);
3993 INTPOL_3D(rwc, 0);
3994 if (!(lwc > 0 || rwc > 0))
3995 continue;
3996
3997 /* Get temperature... */
3998 double t;
3999 INTPOL_3D(t, 0);
4000
4001 /* Get molecular density... */
4002 const double M = MOLEC_DENS(atm->p[ip], t);
4003
4004 /* Reaction rate (Berglen et al., 2004)... */
4005 const double k = 9.1e7 * exp(-29700. / RI * (1. / t - 1. / 298.15)); /* (Maass, 1999), unit: M^(-2) */
4006
4007 /* Henry constant of SO2... */
4008 const double H_SO2 =
4009 1.3e-2 * exp(2900. * (1. / t - 1. / 298.15)) * RI * t;
4010 const double K_1S = 1.23e-2 * exp(2.01e3 * (1. / t - 1. / 298.15)); /* unit: mol/L */
4011
4012 /* Henry constant of H2O2... */
4013 const double H_h2o2 =
4014 8.3e2 * exp(7600. * (1. / t - 1. / 298.15)) * RI * t;
4015
4016 /* Correction factor for high SO2 concentration
4017 (if qnt_Cx is defined, the correction is switched on)... */
4018 double cor = 1.0;
4019 if (ctl->qnt_Cx >= 0)
4020 cor = atm->q[ctl->qnt_Cx][ip] >
4021 low ? a * pow(atm->q[ctl->qnt_Cx][ip], b) : 1;
4022
4023 const double h2o2 = H_h2o2
4024 * clim_zm(&clim->h2o2, atm->time[ip], atm->lat[ip], atm->p[ip])
4025 * M * cor * 1000. / AVO; /* unit: mol/L */
4026
4027 /* Volume water content in cloud [m^3 m^(-3)]... */
4028 const double rho_air = atm->p[ip] / (RI * t) * MA / 10.;
4029 const double CWC = (lwc + rwc) * rho_air / 1e3;
4030
4031 /* Calculate exponential decay (Rolph et al., 1992)... */
4032 const double rate_coef = k * K_1S * h2o2 * H_SO2 * CWC;
4033 const double aux = exp(-cache->dt[ip] * rate_coef);
4034 if (ctl->qnt_m >= 0) {
4035 if (ctl->qnt_mloss_h2o2 >= 0)
4036 atm->q[ctl->qnt_mloss_h2o2][ip] += atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip] * (1 - aux);
4037 atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip] *= aux;
4038 if (ctl->qnt_loss_rate >= 0)
4039 atm->q[ctl->qnt_loss_rate][ip] += rate_coef;
4040 }
4041 if (ctl->qnt_vmr >= 0)
4042 atm->q[ctl->qnt_vmr][ip] *= aux;
4043 }
4044}
4045
4046/*****************************************************************************/
4047
4048void module_isosurf_init(
4049 const ctl_t *ctl,
4050 cache_t *cache,
4051 met_t *met0,
4052 met_t *met1,
4053 atm_t *atm) {
4054
4055 double t;
4056
4057 /* Set timer... */
4058 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_ISOSURF_INIT", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
4059
4060 /* Save pressure... */
4061 if (ctl->isosurf == 1) {
4062 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 0, "acc data present(cache,atm)") {
4063 cache->iso_var[ip] = atm->p[ip];
4064 }
4065 }
4066
4067 /* Save density... */
4068 else if (ctl->isosurf == 2) {
4069 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 0, "acc data present(cache,met0,met1,atm)") {
4070 INTPOL_INIT;
4071 INTPOL_3D(t, 1);
4072 cache->iso_var[ip] = atm->p[ip] / t;
4073 }
4074 }
4075
4076 /* Save potential temperature... */
4077 else if (ctl->isosurf == 3) {
4078 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 0, "acc data present(cache,met0,met1,atm)") {
4079 INTPOL_INIT;
4080 INTPOL_3D(t, 1);
4081 cache->iso_var[ip] = THETA(atm->p[ip], t);
4082 }
4083 }
4084
4085 /* Read balloon pressure data... */
4086 else if (ctl->isosurf == 4) {
4087
4088 /* Write info... */
4089 LOG(1, "Read balloon pressure data: %s", ctl->balloon);
4090
4091 /* Open file... */
4092 FILE *in;
4093 if (!(in = fopen(ctl->balloon, "r")))
4094 ERRMSG("Cannot open file!");
4095
4096 /* Read pressure time series... */
4097 char line[LEN];
4098 while (fgets(line, LEN, in))
4099 if (sscanf(line, "%lg %lg", &(cache->iso_ts[cache->iso_n]),
4100 &(cache->iso_ps[cache->iso_n])) == 2)
4101 if ((++cache->iso_n) > NP)
4102 ERRMSG("Too many data points!");
4103
4104 /* Check number of points... */
4105 if (cache->iso_n < 1)
4106 ERRMSG("Could not read any data!");
4107
4108 /* Close file... */
4109 fclose(in);
4110
4111 /* Update of cache data on device... */
4112 mptrac_update_device(NULL, cache, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
4113 }
4114}
4115
4116/*****************************************************************************/
4117
4118void module_isosurf(
4119 const ctl_t *ctl,
4120 const cache_t *cache,
4121 met_t *met0,
4122 met_t *met1,
4123 atm_t *atm) {
4124
4125 /* Set timer... */
4126 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_ISOSURF", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
4127
4128 /* Loop over particles... */
4129 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 0, "acc data present(ctl,cache,met0,met1,atm)") {
4130
4131 /* Init... */
4132 double t;
4133 INTPOL_INIT;
4134
4135 /* Restore pressure... */
4136 if (ctl->isosurf == 1)
4137 atm->p[ip] = cache->iso_var[ip];
4138
4139 /* Restore density... */
4140 else if (ctl->isosurf == 2) {
4141 INTPOL_3D(t, 1);
4142 atm->p[ip] = cache->iso_var[ip] * t;
4143 }
4144
4145 /* Restore potential temperature... */
4146 else if (ctl->isosurf == 3) {
4147 INTPOL_3D(t, 1);
4148 atm->p[ip] = 1000. * pow(cache->iso_var[ip] / t, -1. / 0.286);
4149 }
4150
4151 /* Interpolate pressure... */
4152 else if (ctl->isosurf == 4) {
4153 if (atm->time[ip] <= cache->iso_ts[0])
4154 atm->p[ip] = cache->iso_ps[0];
4155 else if (atm->time[ip] >= cache->iso_ts[cache->iso_n - 1])
4156 atm->p[ip] = cache->iso_ps[cache->iso_n - 1];
4157 else {
4158 const int idx =
4159 locate_irr(cache->iso_ts, cache->iso_n, atm->time[ip]);
4160 atm->p[ip] =
4161 LIN(cache->iso_ts[idx], cache->iso_ps[idx], cache->iso_ts[idx + 1],
4162 cache->iso_ps[idx + 1], atm->time[ip]);
4163 }
4164 }
4165 }
4166}
4167
4168/*****************************************************************************/
4169
4170#ifdef KPP
4171void module_kpp_chem(
4172 ctl_t *ctl,
4173 cache_t *cache,
4174 clim_t *clim,
4175 met_t *met0,
4176 met_t *met1,
4177 atm_t *atm) {
4178
4179 /* Set timer... */
4180 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_KPP_CHEM", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
4181
4182 const int nvar = NVAR, nfix = NFIX, nreact = NREACT;
4183 double rtol[1] = { 1.0e-3 };
4184 double atol[1] = { 1.0 };
4185
4186 /* Loop over particles... */
4187#ifdef _OPENACC
4188#pragma acc data copy(rtol,atol,nvar,nfix,nreact)
4189#endif
4190 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1,
4191 "acc data present(ctl,cache,clim,met0,met1,atm) ") {
4192
4193 /* Initialize... */
4194 double var[nvar], fix[nfix], rconst[nreact];
4195 for (int i = 0; i < nvar; i++)
4196 var[i] = 0.0;
4197 for (int i = 0; i < nfix; i++)
4198 fix[i] = 0.0;
4199 for (int i = 0; i < nreact; i++)
4200 rconst[i] = 0.0;
4201 kpp_chem_initialize(ctl, clim, met0, met1, atm, var, fix, rconst, ip);
4202
4203 /* Integrate... */
4204 double rpar[20];
4205 int ipar[20];
4206 for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
4207 ipar[i] = 0;
4208 rpar[i] = 0.0;
4209 }
4210 ipar[0] = 0; /* 0: F=F(y), i.e. independent of t (autonomous); 0:F=F(t,y), i.e. depends on t (non-autonomous) */
4211 ipar[1] = 1; /* 0: NVAR-dimentional vector of tolerances; 1:scalar tolerances */
4212 ipar[3] = 4; /* choice of the method:Rodas3 */
4213 Rosenbrock(var, fix, rconst, 0, ctl->dt_kpp,
4214 atol, rtol, &FunTemplate, &JacTemplate, rpar, ipar);
4215
4216 /* Save results.. */
4217 kpp_chem_output2atm(atm, ctl, met0, met1, var, ip);
4218 }
4219}
4220#endif
4221
4222/*****************************************************************************/
4223
4224void module_meteo(
4225 const ctl_t *ctl,
4226 const cache_t *cache,
4227 const clim_t *clim,
4228 met_t *met0,
4229 met_t *met1,
4230 atm_t *atm) {
4231
4232 /* Set timer... */
4233 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_METEO", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
4234
4235 /* Check quantity flags... */
4236 if (ctl->qnt_tsts >= 0)
4237 if (ctl->qnt_tice < 0 || ctl->qnt_tnat < 0)
4238 ERRMSG("Need T_ice and T_NAT to calculate T_STS!");
4239
4240 /* Loop over particles... */
4241 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 0,
4242 "acc data present(ctl,cache,clim,met0,met1,atm)") {
4243
4244 double ps, ts, zs, us, vs, ess, nss, shf, lsm, sst, pbl, pt, pct, pcb,
4245 cl, plcl, plfc, pel, cape, cin, o3c, pv, t, tt, u, v, w, h2o, h2ot,
4246 o3, lwc, rwc, iwc, swc, cc, z, zt;
4247
4248 /* Interpolate meteo data... */
4249 INTPOL_INIT;
4250 INTPOL_TIME_ALL(atm->time[ip], atm->p[ip], atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip]);
4251
4252 /* Set quantities... */
4253 SET_ATM(qnt_ps, ps);
4254 SET_ATM(qnt_ts, ts);
4255 SET_ATM(qnt_zs, zs);
4256 SET_ATM(qnt_us, us);
4257 SET_ATM(qnt_vs, vs);
4258 SET_ATM(qnt_ess, ess);
4259 SET_ATM(qnt_nss, nss);
4260 SET_ATM(qnt_shf, shf);
4261 SET_ATM(qnt_lsm, lsm);
4262 SET_ATM(qnt_sst, sst);
4263 SET_ATM(qnt_pbl, pbl);
4264 SET_ATM(qnt_pt, pt);
4265 SET_ATM(qnt_tt, tt);
4266 SET_ATM(qnt_zt, zt);
4267 SET_ATM(qnt_h2ot, h2ot);
4268 SET_ATM(qnt_zg, z);
4269 SET_ATM(qnt_p, atm->p[ip]);
4270 SET_ATM(qnt_t, t);
4271 SET_ATM(qnt_rho, RHO(atm->p[ip], t));
4272 SET_ATM(qnt_u, u);
4273 SET_ATM(qnt_v, v);
4274 SET_ATM(qnt_w, w);
4275 SET_ATM(qnt_h2o, h2o);
4276 SET_ATM(qnt_o3, o3);
4277 SET_ATM(qnt_lwc, lwc);
4278 SET_ATM(qnt_rwc, rwc);
4279 SET_ATM(qnt_iwc, iwc);
4280 SET_ATM(qnt_swc, swc);
4281 SET_ATM(qnt_cc, cc);
4282 SET_ATM(qnt_pct, pct);
4283 SET_ATM(qnt_pcb, pcb);
4284 SET_ATM(qnt_cl, cl);
4285 SET_ATM(qnt_plcl, plcl);
4286 SET_ATM(qnt_plfc, plfc);
4287 SET_ATM(qnt_pel, pel);
4288 SET_ATM(qnt_cape, cape);
4289 SET_ATM(qnt_cin, cin);
4290 SET_ATM(qnt_o3c, o3c);
4291 SET_ATM(qnt_hno3,
4292 clim_zm(&clim->hno3, atm->time[ip], atm->lat[ip], atm->p[ip]));
4293 SET_ATM(qnt_oh, clim_oh(ctl, clim, atm->time[ip],
4294 atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip], atm->p[ip]));
4295 SET_ATM(qnt_h2o2, clim_zm(&clim->h2o2, atm->time[ip],
4296 atm->lat[ip], atm->p[ip]));
4297 SET_ATM(qnt_ho2, clim_zm(&clim->ho2, atm->time[ip],
4298 atm->lat[ip], atm->p[ip]));
4299 SET_ATM(qnt_o1d, clim_zm(&clim->o1d, atm->time[ip],
4300 atm->lat[ip], atm->p[ip]));
4301 SET_ATM(qnt_vh, sqrt(u * u + v * v));
4302 SET_ATM(qnt_vz, -1e3 * H0 / atm->p[ip] * w);
4303 SET_ATM(qnt_psat, PSAT(t));
4304 SET_ATM(qnt_psice, PSICE(t));
4305 SET_ATM(qnt_pw, PW(atm->p[ip], h2o));
4306 SET_ATM(qnt_sh, SH(h2o));
4307 SET_ATM(qnt_rh, RH(atm->p[ip], t, h2o));
4308 SET_ATM(qnt_rhice, RHICE(atm->p[ip], t, h2o));
4309 SET_ATM(qnt_theta, THETA(atm->p[ip], t));
4310 SET_ATM(qnt_zeta, atm->q[ctl->qnt_zeta][ip]);
4311 SET_ATM(qnt_zeta_d, ZETA(ps, atm->p[ip], t));
4312 SET_ATM(qnt_zeta_dot, atm->q[ctl->qnt_zeta_dot][ip]);
4313 SET_ATM(qnt_tvirt, TVIRT(t, h2o));
4314 SET_ATM(qnt_lapse, lapse_rate(t, h2o));
4315 SET_ATM(qnt_pv, pv);
4316 SET_ATM(qnt_tdew, TDEW(atm->p[ip], h2o));
4317 SET_ATM(qnt_tice, TICE(atm->p[ip], h2o));
4318 SET_ATM(qnt_tnat,
4319 nat_temperature(atm->p[ip], h2o,
4320 clim_zm(&clim->hno3, atm->time[ip],
4321 atm->lat[ip], atm->p[ip])));
4322 SET_ATM(qnt_tsts,
4323 0.5 * (atm->q[ctl->qnt_tice][ip] + atm->q[ctl->qnt_tnat][ip]));
4324 }
4325}
4326
4327/*****************************************************************************/
4328
4329void module_mixing(
4330 const ctl_t *ctl,
4331 const clim_t *clim,
4332 atm_t *atm,
4333 const double t) {
4334
4335 /* Set timer... */
4336 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_MIXING", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
4337
4338 /* Allocate... */
4339 const int np = atm->np;
4340 int *restrict const ixs = (int *) malloc((size_t) np * sizeof(int));
4341 int *restrict const iys = (int *) malloc((size_t) np * sizeof(int));
4342 int *restrict const izs = (int *) malloc((size_t) np * sizeof(int));
4343
4344 /* Set grid box size... */
4345 const double dz = (ctl->mixing_z1 - ctl->mixing_z0) / ctl->mixing_nz;
4346 const double dlon = (ctl->mixing_lon1 - ctl->mixing_lon0) / ctl->mixing_nx;
4347 const double dlat = (ctl->mixing_lat1 - ctl->mixing_lat0) / ctl->mixing_ny;
4348
4349 /* Set time interval... */
4350 const double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
4351 const double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
4352
4353 /* Get indices... */
4354#ifdef _OPENACC
4355#pragma acc enter data create(ixs[0:np],iys[0:np],izs[0:np])
4356#pragma acc data present(ctl,clim,atm,ixs,iys,izs)
4357#pragma acc parallel loop independent gang vector
4358#else
4359#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
4360#endif
4361 for (int ip = 0; ip < np; ip++) {
4362 ixs[ip] = (int) ((atm->lon[ip] - ctl->mixing_lon0) / dlon);
4363 iys[ip] = (int) ((atm->lat[ip] - ctl->mixing_lat0) / dlat);
4364 izs[ip] = (int) ((Z(atm->p[ip]) - ctl->mixing_z0) / dz);
4365 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1
4366 || ixs[ip] < 0 || ixs[ip] >= ctl->mixing_nx
4367 || iys[ip] < 0 || iys[ip] >= ctl->mixing_ny
4368 || izs[ip] < 0 || izs[ip] >= ctl->mixing_nz)
4369 izs[ip] = -1;
4370 }
4371
4372 /* Calculate interparcel mixing... */
4373 const int use_ensemble = (ctl->nens > 0);
4374
4375 const int quantities[] = {
4376 ctl->qnt_m, ctl->qnt_vmr, ctl->qnt_Ch2o, ctl->qnt_Co3,
4377 ctl->qnt_Cco, ctl->qnt_Coh, ctl->qnt_Ch, ctl->qnt_Cho2,
4378 ctl->qnt_Ch2o2, ctl->qnt_Co1d, ctl->qnt_Co3p, ctl->qnt_Cccl4,
4379 ctl->qnt_Cccl3f, ctl->qnt_Cccl2f2, ctl->qnt_Cn2o,
4380 ctl->qnt_Csf6, ctl->qnt_aoa
4381 };
4382 const int n_qnt = sizeof(quantities) / sizeof(quantities[0]);
4383
4384 for (int i = 0; i < n_qnt; i++)
4385 if (quantities[i] >= 0)
4386 module_mixing_help(ctl, clim, atm, ixs, iys, izs, quantities[i],
4387 use_ensemble);
4388
4389 /* Free... */
4390#ifdef _OPENACC
4391#pragma acc exit data delete(ixs,iys,izs)
4392#endif
4393 free(ixs);
4394 free(iys);
4395 free(izs);
4396}
4397
4398/*****************************************************************************/
4399
4400void module_mixing_help(
4401 const ctl_t *ctl,
4402 const clim_t *clim,
4403 atm_t *atm,
4404 const int *ixs,
4405 const int *iys,
4406 const int *izs,
4407 const int qnt_idx,
4408 const int use_ensemble) {
4409
4410 const int np = atm->np;
4411 const int ngrid = ctl->mixing_nx * ctl->mixing_ny * ctl->mixing_nz;
4412 const int nens = use_ensemble ? ctl->nens : 1;
4413 const int total_grid = ngrid * nens;
4414
4415 double *restrict const cmean =
4416 (double *) malloc((size_t) total_grid * sizeof(double));
4417 int *restrict const count =
4418 (int *) malloc((size_t) total_grid * sizeof(int));
4419
4420 /* Init... */
4421#ifdef _OPENACC
4422#pragma acc enter data create(cmean[0:total_grid],count[0:total_grid])
4423#pragma acc data present(ctl,clim,atm,ixs,iys,izs,cmean,count)
4424#pragma acc parallel loop independent gang vector
4425#else
4426#ifdef __NVCOMPILER
4427#pragma novector
4428#endif
4429#pragma omp parallel for
4430#endif
4431 for (int i = 0; i < total_grid; i++) {
4432 count[i] = 0;
4433 cmean[i] = 0.0;
4434 }
4435
4436 /* Loop over particles... */
4437#ifdef _OPENACC
4438#pragma acc parallel loop independent gang vector
4439#endif
4440 for (int ip = 0; ip < np; ip++)
4441 if (izs[ip] >= 0) {
4442 const int ens = use_ensemble ? (int) atm->q[ctl->qnt_ens][ip] : 0;
4443 const int idx =
4444 ens * ngrid + ARRAY_3D(ixs[ip], iys[ip], ctl->mixing_ny, izs[ip],
4445 ctl->mixing_nz);
4446#ifdef _OPENACC
4447#pragma acc atomic update
4448#endif
4449 cmean[idx] += atm->q[qnt_idx][ip];
4450#ifdef _OPENACC
4451#pragma acc atomic update
4452#endif
4453 count[idx]++;
4454 }
4455
4456 /* Compute means... */
4457#ifdef _OPENACC
4458#pragma acc parallel loop independent gang vector
4459#else
4460#ifdef __NVCOMPILER
4461#pragma novector
4462#endif
4463#pragma omp parallel for
4464#endif
4465 for (int i = 0; i < total_grid; i++)
4466 if (count[i] > 0)
4467 cmean[i] /= count[i];
4468
4469 /* Interparcel mixing... */
4470#ifdef _OPENACC
4471#pragma acc parallel loop independent gang vector
4472#else
4473#pragma omp parallel for
4474#endif
4475 for (int ip = 0; ip < np; ip++) {
4476 if (izs[ip] >= 0) {
4477 const int ens = use_ensemble ? (int) atm->q[ctl->qnt_ens][ip] : 0;
4478
4479 double mixparam = 1.0;
4480 if (ctl->mixing_trop < 1 || ctl->mixing_strat < 1) {
4481 const double w = tropo_weight(clim, atm, ip);
4482 mixparam = w * ctl->mixing_trop + (1.0 - w) * ctl->mixing_strat;
4483 }
4484
4485 const int idx =
4486 ens * ngrid + ARRAY_3D(ixs[ip], iys[ip], ctl->mixing_ny, izs[ip],
4487 ctl->mixing_nz);
4488 atm->q[qnt_idx][ip] += (cmean[idx] - atm->q[qnt_idx][ip]) * mixparam;
4489 }
4490 }
4491
4492 /* Free... */
4493#ifdef _OPENACC
4494#pragma acc exit data delete(cmean,count)
4495#endif
4496 free(cmean);
4497 free(count);
4498}
4499
4500/*****************************************************************************/
4501
4502void module_oh_chem(
4503 const ctl_t *ctl,
4504 const cache_t *cache,
4505 const clim_t *clim,
4506 met_t *met0,
4507 met_t *met1,
4508 atm_t *atm) {
4509
4510 /* Set timer... */
4511 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_OH_CHEM", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
4512
4513 /* Check quantity flags... */
4514 if (ctl->qnt_m < 0 && ctl->qnt_vmr < 0)
4515 ERRMSG("Module needs quantity mass or volume mixing ratio!");
4516
4517 /* Parameter of SO2 correction... */
4518 const double a = 4.71572206e-08;
4519 const double b = -8.28782867e-01;
4520 const double low = pow(1. / a, 1. / b);
4521
4522 /* Loop over particles... */
4523 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1,
4524 "acc data present(ctl,cache,clim,met0,met1,atm)") {
4525
4526 /* Get temperature... */
4527 double t;
4528 INTPOL_INIT;
4529 INTPOL_3D(t, 1);
4530
4531 /* Calculate molecular density... */
4532 const double M = MOLEC_DENS(atm->p[ip], t);
4533
4534 /* Use constant reaction rate... */
4535 double k = NAN;
4536 if (ctl->oh_chem_reaction == 1)
4537 k = ctl->oh_chem[0];
4538
4539 /* Calculate bimolecular reaction rate... */
4540 else if (ctl->oh_chem_reaction == 2)
4541 k = ctl->oh_chem[0] * exp(-ctl->oh_chem[1] / t);
4542
4543 /* Calculate termolecular reaction rate... */
4544 if (ctl->oh_chem_reaction == 3) {
4545
4546 /* Calculate rate coefficient for X + OH + M -> XOH + M
4547 (JPL Publication 19-05) ... */
4548 const double k0 =
4549 ctl->oh_chem[0] * (ctl->oh_chem[1] !=
4550 0 ? pow(298. / t, ctl->oh_chem[1]) : 1.);
4551 const double ki =
4552 ctl->oh_chem[2] * (ctl->oh_chem[3] !=
4553 0 ? pow(298. / t, ctl->oh_chem[3]) : 1.);
4554 const double c = log10(k0 * M / ki);
4555 k = k0 * M / (1. + k0 * M / ki) * pow(0.6, 1. / (1. + c * c));
4556 }
4557
4558 /* Correction factor for high SO2 concentration
4559 (if qnt_Cx is defined, the correction is switched on)... */
4560 double cor = 1;
4561 if (ctl->qnt_Cx >= 0)
4562 cor =
4563 atm->q[ctl->qnt_Cx][ip] >
4564 low ? a * pow(atm->q[ctl->qnt_Cx][ip], b) : 1;
4565
4566 /* Calculate exponential decay... */
4567 const double rate_coef =
4568 k * clim_oh(ctl, clim, atm->time[ip], atm->lon[ip],
4569 atm->lat[ip], atm->p[ip]) * M * cor;
4570 const double aux = exp(-cache->dt[ip] * rate_coef);
4571 if (ctl->qnt_m >= 0) {
4572 if (ctl->qnt_mloss_oh >= 0)
4573 atm->q[ctl->qnt_mloss_oh][ip]
4574 += atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip] * (1 - aux);
4575 atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip] *= aux;
4576 if (ctl->qnt_loss_rate >= 0)
4577 atm->q[ctl->qnt_loss_rate][ip] += rate_coef;
4578 }
4579 if (ctl->qnt_vmr >= 0)
4580 atm->q[ctl->qnt_vmr][ip] *= aux;
4581 }
4582}
4583
4584/*****************************************************************************/
4585
4586void module_position(
4587 const cache_t *cache,
4588 met_t *met0,
4589 met_t *met1,
4590 atm_t *atm) {
4591
4592 /* Set timer... */
4593 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_POSITION", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
4594
4595 /* Loop over particles... */
4596 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1, "acc data present(cache,met0,met1,atm)") {
4597
4598 /* Init... */
4599 double ps;
4600 INTPOL_INIT;
4601
4602 /* Calculate modulo... */
4603 atm->lon[ip] = FMOD(atm->lon[ip], 360.);
4604 atm->lat[ip] = FMOD(atm->lat[ip], 360.);
4605
4606 /* Check latitude... */
4607 while (atm->lat[ip] < -90 || atm->lat[ip] > 90) {
4608 if (atm->lat[ip] > 90) {
4609 atm->lat[ip] = 180 - atm->lat[ip];
4610 atm->lon[ip] += 180;
4611 }
4612 if (atm->lat[ip] < -90) {
4613 atm->lat[ip] = -180 - atm->lat[ip];
4614 atm->lon[ip] += 180;
4615 }
4616 }
4617
4618 /* Check longitude... */
4619 while (atm->lon[ip] < -180)
4620 atm->lon[ip] += 360;
4621 while (atm->lon[ip] >= 180)
4622 atm->lon[ip] -= 360;
4623
4624 /* Check pressure... */
4625 if (atm->p[ip] < met0->p[met0->np - 1]) {
4626 atm->p[ip] = met0->p[met0->np - 1];
4627 } else if (atm->p[ip] > 300.) {
4628 INTPOL_2D(ps, 1);
4629 if (atm->p[ip] > ps)
4630 atm->p[ip] = ps;
4631 }
4632 }
4633}
4634
4635/*****************************************************************************/
4636
4637void module_rng_init(
4638 const int ntask) {
4639
4640 /* Initialize GSL random number generators... */
4641 gsl_rng_env_setup();
4642 if (omp_get_max_threads() > NTHREADS)
4643 ERRMSG("Too many threads!");
4644 for (int i = 0; i < NTHREADS; i++) {
4645 rng[i] = gsl_rng_alloc(gsl_rng_default);
4646 gsl_rng_set(rng[i], gsl_rng_default_seed
4647 + (long unsigned) (ntask * NTHREADS + i));
4648 }
4649
4650 /* Initialize cuRAND random number generators... */
4651#ifdef CURAND
4652 if (curandCreateGenerator(&rng_curand, CURAND_RNG_PSEUDO_DEFAULT) !=
4653 CURAND_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4654 ERRMSG("Cannot create random number generator!");
4655 if (curandSetPseudoRandomGeneratorSeed(rng_curand, ntask) !=
4656 CURAND_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4657 ERRMSG("Cannot set seed for random number generator!");
4658 if (curandSetStream
4659 (rng_curand,
4660 (cudaStream_t) acc_get_cuda_stream(acc_async_sync)) !=
4661 CURAND_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4662 ERRMSG("Cannot set stream for random number generator!");
4663#endif
4664}
4665
4666/*****************************************************************************/
4667
4668void module_rng(
4669 const ctl_t *ctl,
4670 double *rs,
4671 const size_t n,
4672 const int method) {
4673
4674 /* Use GSL random number generators... */
4675 if (ctl->rng_type == 0) {
4676
4677 /* Uniform distribution... */
4678 if (method == 0) {
4679#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
4680 for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i)
4681 rs[i] = gsl_rng_uniform(rng[omp_get_thread_num()]);
4682 }
4683
4684 /* Normal distribution... */
4685 else if (method == 1) {
4686#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
4687 for (size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i)
4688 rs[i] = gsl_ran_gaussian_ziggurat(rng[omp_get_thread_num()], 1.0);
4689 }
4690
4691 /* Update of random numbers on device... */
4692#ifdef _OPENACC
4693 SELECT_TIMER("UPDATE_DEVICE", "MEMORY", NVTX_H2D);
4694#pragma acc update device(rs[:n])
4695#endif
4696 }
4697
4698 /* Use Squares random number generator (Widynski, 2022)... */
4699 else if (ctl->rng_type == 1) {
4700
4701 /* Set key (don't change this!)... */
4702 const uint64_t key = 0xc8e4fd154ce32f6d;
4703
4704 /* Uniform distribution... */
4705#ifdef _OPENACC
4706#pragma acc data present(rs)
4707#pragma acc parallel loop independent gang vector
4708#else
4709#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
4710#endif
4711 for (size_t i = 0; i < n + 1; ++i) {
4712 uint64_t r, t, x, y, z;
4713 y = x = (rng_ctr + i) * key;
4714 z = y + key;
4715 x = x * x + y;
4716 x = (x >> 32) | (x << 32);
4717 x = x * x + z;
4718 x = (x >> 32) | (x << 32);
4719 x = x * x + y;
4720 x = (x >> 32) | (x << 32);
4721 t = x = x * x + z;
4722 x = (x >> 32) | (x << 32);
4723 r = t ^ ((x * x + y) >> 32);
4724 rs[i] = (double) r / (double) UINT64_MAX;
4725 }
4726 rng_ctr += n + 1;
4727
4728 /* Normal distribution... */
4729 if (method == 1) {
4730#ifdef _OPENACC
4731#pragma acc parallel loop independent gang vector
4732#else
4733#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
4734#endif
4735 for (size_t i = 0; i < n; i += 2) {
4736 const double r = sqrt(-2.0 * log(rs[i]));
4737 const double phi = 2.0 * M_PI * rs[i + 1];
4738 rs[i] = r * cosf((float) phi);
4739 rs[i + 1] = r * sinf((float) phi);
4740 }
4741 }
4742 }
4743
4744 /* Use cuRAND random number generators... */
4745 else if (ctl->rng_type == 2) {
4746#ifdef CURAND
4747#pragma acc host_data use_device(rs)
4748 {
4749
4750 /* Uniform distribution... */
4751 if (method == 0) {
4752 if (curandGenerateUniformDouble(rng_curand, rs, (n < 4 ? 4 : n)) !=
4753 CURAND_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4754 ERRMSG("Cannot create random numbers!");
4755 }
4756
4757 /* Normal distribution... */
4758 else if (method == 1) {
4759 if (curandGenerateNormalDouble
4760 (rng_curand, rs, (n < 4 ? 4 : n), 0.0,
4761 1.0) != CURAND_STATUS_SUCCESS)
4762 ERRMSG("Cannot create random numbers!");
4763 }
4764 }
4765#else
4766 ERRMSG("MPTRAC was compiled without cuRAND!");
4767#endif
4768 }
4769}
4770
4771/*****************************************************************************/
4772
4773void module_sedi(
4774 const ctl_t *ctl,
4775 const cache_t *cache,
4776 met_t *met0,
4777 met_t *met1,
4778 atm_t *atm) {
4779
4780 /* Set timer... */
4781 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_SEDI", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
4782
4783 /* Loop over particles... */
4784 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1, "acc data present(ctl,cache,met0,met1,atm)") {
4785
4786 /* Get temperature... */
4787 double t;
4788 INTPOL_INIT;
4789 INTPOL_3D(t, 1);
4790
4791 /* Sedimentation velocity... */
4792 const double v_s = sedi(atm->p[ip], t, atm->q[ctl->qnt_rp][ip],
4793 atm->q[ctl->qnt_rhop][ip]);
4794
4795 /* Calculate pressure change... */
4796 atm->p[ip] += DZ2DP(v_s * cache->dt[ip] / 1000., atm->p[ip]);
4797 }
4798}
4799
4800/*****************************************************************************/
4801
4802void module_sort(
4803 const ctl_t *ctl,
4804 met_t *met0,
4805 atm_t *atm) {
4806
4807 /* Set timer... */
4808 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_SORT", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
4809
4810 /* Allocate... */
4811 const int np = atm->np;
4812 double *restrict const a = (double *) malloc((size_t) np * sizeof(double));
4813 int *restrict const p = (int *) malloc((size_t) np * sizeof(int));
4814 if (a == NULL || p == NULL)
4815 ERRMSG("Out of memory!");
4816
4817#ifdef _OPENACC
4818#pragma acc enter data create(a[0:np],p[0:np])
4819#pragma acc data present(ctl,met0,atm,a,p)
4820#endif
4821
4822 /* Get box index... */
4823#ifdef _OPENACC
4824#pragma acc parallel loop independent gang vector
4825#else
4826#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
4827#endif
4828 for (int ip = 0; ip < np; ip++) {
4829 a[ip] =
4830 (double) ((locate_reg(met0->lon, met0->nx, atm->lon[ip]) * met0->ny +
4831 locate_irr(met0->lat, met0->ny, atm->lat[ip]))
4832 * met0->np + locate_irr(met0->p, met0->np, atm->p[ip]));
4833 p[ip] = ip;
4834 }
4835
4836 /* Sorting... */
4837#ifdef THRUST
4838#ifdef _OPENACC
4839#pragma acc host_data use_device(a,p)
4840#endif
4841 thrustSortWrapper(a, np, p);
4842#else
4843#ifdef _OPENACC
4844 ERRMSG("GSL sort fallback not available on GPU, use THRUST!");
4845#endif
4846 gsl_sort_index((size_t *) p, a, 1, (size_t) np);
4847#endif
4848
4849 /* Sort data... */
4850 module_sort_help(atm->time, p, np);
4851 module_sort_help(atm->p, p, np);
4852 module_sort_help(atm->lon, p, np);
4853 module_sort_help(atm->lat, p, np);
4854 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
4855 module_sort_help(atm->q[iq], p, np);
4856
4857 /* Free... */
4858#ifdef _OPENACC
4859#pragma acc exit data delete(a,p)
4860#endif
4861 free(a);
4862 free(p);
4863}
4864
4865/*****************************************************************************/
4866
4867void module_sort_help(
4868 double *a,
4869 const int *p,
4870 const int np) {
4871
4872 /* Allocate... */
4873 double *restrict const help =
4874 (double *) malloc((size_t) np * sizeof(double));
4875 if (help == NULL)
4876 ERRMSG("Out of memory!");
4877
4878 /* Reordering of array... */
4879#ifdef _OPENACC
4880#pragma acc enter data create(help[0:np])
4881#pragma acc data present(a,p,help)
4882#pragma acc parallel loop independent gang vector
4883#else
4884#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
4885#endif
4886 for (int ip = 0; ip < np; ip++)
4887 help[ip] = a[p[ip]];
4888#ifdef _OPENACC
4889#pragma acc parallel loop independent gang vector
4890#else
4891#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
4892#endif
4893 for (int ip = 0; ip < np; ip++)
4894 a[ip] = help[ip];
4895
4896 /* Free... */
4897#ifdef _OPENACC
4898#pragma acc exit data delete(help)
4899#endif
4900 free(help);
4901}
4902
4903/*****************************************************************************/
4904
4905void module_timesteps(
4906 const ctl_t *ctl,
4907 cache_t *cache,
4908 met_t *met0,
4909 atm_t *atm,
4910 const double t) {
4911
4912 /* Set timer... */
4913 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_TIMESTEPS", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
4914
4915 const double latmin = gsl_stats_min(met0->lat, 1, (size_t) met0->ny),
4916 latmax = gsl_stats_max(met0->lat, 1, (size_t) met0->ny);
4917
4918 const int local =
4919 (fabs(met0->lon[met0->nx - 1] - met0->lon[0] - 360.0) >= 0.01);
4920
4921 /* Loop over particles... */
4922 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 0, "acc data present(ctl,cache,met0,atm)") {
4923
4924 /* Set time step for each air parcel... */
4925 if ((ctl->direction * (atm->time[ip] - ctl->t_start) >= 0
4926 && ctl->direction * (atm->time[ip] - ctl->t_stop) <= 0
4927 && ctl->direction * (atm->time[ip] - t) < 0))
4928 cache->dt[ip] = t - atm->time[ip];
4929 else
4930 cache->dt[ip] = 0.0;
4931
4932 /* Check horizontal boundaries of local meteo data... */
4933#ifndef DD
4934 int dd = 1;
4935#else
4936 int dd = 0;
4937#endif
4938 if (dd) {
4939 if (local && (atm->lon[ip] <= met0->lon[0]
4940 || atm->lon[ip] >= met0->lon[met0->nx - 1]
4941 || atm->lat[ip] <= latmin || atm->lat[ip] >= latmax))
4942 cache->dt[ip] = 0.0;
4943 } else {
4944 if ((int) atm->q[ctl->qnt_subdomain][ip] == -1)
4945 cache->dt[ip] = 0;
4946 }
4947 }
4948}
4949
4950/*****************************************************************************/
4951
4952void module_timesteps_init(
4953 ctl_t *ctl,
4954 const atm_t *atm) {
4955
4956 /* Set timer... */
4957 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_TIMESTEPS_INIT", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
4958
4959 /* Set start time... */
4960 if (ctl->direction == 1) {
4961 ctl->t_start = gsl_stats_min(atm->time, 1, (size_t) atm->np);
4962 if (ctl->t_stop > 1e99)
4963 ctl->t_stop = gsl_stats_max(atm->time, 1, (size_t) atm->np);
4964 } else {
4965 ctl->t_start = gsl_stats_max(atm->time, 1, (size_t) atm->np);
4966 if (ctl->t_stop > 1e99)
4967 ctl->t_stop = gsl_stats_min(atm->time, 1, (size_t) atm->np);
4968 }
4969
4970 /* Check time interval... */
4971 if (ctl->direction * (ctl->t_stop - ctl->t_start) <= 0)
4972 ERRMSG("Nothing to do! Check T_STOP and DIRECTION!");
