4973
4974 /* Round start time... */
4975 if (ctl->direction == 1)
4976 ctl->t_start = floor(ctl->t_start / ctl->dt_mod) * ctl->dt_mod;
4977 else
4978 ctl->t_start = ceil(ctl->t_start / ctl->dt_mod) * ctl->dt_mod;
4979}
4980
4981/*****************************************************************************/
4982
4983void module_tracer_chem(
4984 const ctl_t *ctl,
4985 const cache_t *cache,
4986 const clim_t *clim,
4987 met_t *met0,
4988 met_t *met1,
4989 atm_t *atm) {
4990
4991 /* Set timer... */
4992 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_TRACER_CHEM", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
4993
4994 /* Loop over particles... */
4995 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1,
4996 "acc data present(ctl,cache,clim,met0,met1,atm)") {
4997
4998 /* Get temperature... */
4999 double t;
5000 INTPOL_INIT;
5001 INTPOL_3D(t, 1);
5002
5003 /* Get molecular density... */
5004 const double M = MOLEC_DENS(atm->p[ip], t);
5005
5006 /* Get total column ozone... */
5007 double o3c;
5008 INTPOL_2D(o3c, 1);
5009
5010 /* Get solar zenith angle... */
5011 const double sza = sza_calc(atm->time[ip], atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip]);
5012
5013 /* Get O(1D) volume mixing ratio... */
5014 const double o1d =
5015 clim_zm(&clim->o1d, atm->time[ip], atm->lat[ip], atm->p[ip]);
5016
5017 /* Reactions for CFC-10... */
5018 if (ctl->qnt_Cccl4 >= 0) {
5019 const double K_o1d = ARRHENIUS(3.30e-10, 0, t) * o1d * M;
5020 const double K_hv = clim_photo(clim->photo.ccl4, &(clim->photo),
5021 atm->p[ip], sza, o3c);
5022 atm->q[ctl->qnt_Cccl4][ip] *= exp(-cache->dt[ip] * (K_hv + K_o1d));
5023 }
5024
5025 /* Reactions for CFC-11... */
5026 if (ctl->qnt_Cccl3f >= 0) {
5027 const double K_o1d = ARRHENIUS(2.30e-10, 0, t) * o1d * M;
5028 const double K_hv = clim_photo(clim->photo.ccl3f, &(clim->photo),
5029 atm->p[ip], sza, o3c);
5030 atm->q[ctl->qnt_Cccl3f][ip] *= exp(-cache->dt[ip] * (K_hv + K_o1d));
5031 }
5032
5033 /* Reactions for CFC-12... */
5034 if (ctl->qnt_Cccl2f2 >= 0) {
5035 const double K_o1d = ARRHENIUS(1.40e-10, -25, t) * o1d * M;
5036 const double K_hv = clim_photo(clim->photo.ccl2f2, &(clim->photo),
5037 atm->p[ip], sza, o3c);
5038 atm->q[ctl->qnt_Cccl2f2][ip] *= exp(-cache->dt[ip] * (K_hv + K_o1d));
5039 }
5040
5041 /* Reactions for N2O... */
5042 if (ctl->qnt_Cn2o >= 0) {
5043 const double K_o1d = ARRHENIUS(1.19e-10, -20, t) * o1d * M;
5044 const double K_hv = clim_photo(clim->photo.n2o, &(clim->photo),
5045 atm->p[ip], sza, o3c);
5046 atm->q[ctl->qnt_Cn2o][ip] *= exp(-cache->dt[ip] * (K_hv + K_o1d));
5047 }
5048 }
5049}
5050
5051/*****************************************************************************/
5052
5053void module_wet_depo(
5054 const ctl_t *ctl,
5055 const cache_t *cache,
5056 met_t *met0,
5057 met_t *met1,
5058 atm_t *atm) {
5059
5060 /* Set timer... */
5061 SELECT_TIMER("MODULE_WET_DEPO", "PHYSICS", NVTX_GPU);
5062
5063 /* Check quantity flags... */
5064 if (ctl->qnt_m < 0 && ctl->qnt_vmr < 0)
5065 ERRMSG("Module needs quantity mass or volume mixing ratio!");
5066
5067 /* Loop over particles... */
5068 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1, "acc data present(ctl,cache,met0,met1,atm)") {
5069
5070 /* Check whether particle is below cloud top... */
5071 double pct;
5072 INTPOL_INIT;
5073 INTPOL_2D(pct, 1);
5074 if (!isfinite(pct) || atm->p[ip] <= pct)
5075 continue;
5076
5077 /* Get cloud bottom pressure... */
5078 double pcb;
5079 INTPOL_2D(pcb, 0);
5080
5081 /* Estimate precipitation rate (Pisso et al., 2019)... */
5082 double cl;
5083 INTPOL_2D(cl, 0);
5084 const double Is =
5085 pow(1. / ctl->wet_depo_pre[0] * cl, 1. / ctl->wet_depo_pre[1]);
5086 if (Is < 0.01)
5087 continue;
5088
5089 /* Check whether particle is inside or below cloud... */
5090 double lwc, rwc, iwc, swc;
5091 INTPOL_3D(lwc, 1);
5092 INTPOL_3D(rwc, 0);
5093 INTPOL_3D(iwc, 0);
5094 INTPOL_3D(swc, 0);
5095 const int inside = (lwc > 0 || rwc > 0 || iwc > 0 || swc > 0);
5096
5097 /* Get temperature... */
5098 double t;
5099 INTPOL_3D(t, 0);
5100
5101 /* Calculate in-cloud scavenging coefficient... */
5102 double lambda = 0;
5103 if (inside) {
5104
5105 /* Calculate retention factor... */
5106 double eta;
5107 if (t > 273.15)
5108 eta = 1;
5109 else if (t <= 238.15)
5110 eta = ctl->wet_depo_ic_ret_ratio;
5111 else
5112 eta = LIN(273.15, 1, 238.15, ctl->wet_depo_ic_ret_ratio, t);
5113
5114 /* Use exponential dependency for particles (Bakels et al., 2024)... */
5115 if (ctl->wet_depo_ic_a > 0)
5116 lambda = ctl->wet_depo_ic_a * pow(Is, ctl->wet_depo_ic_b) * eta;
5117
5118 /* Use Henry's law for gases... */
5119 else if (ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] > 0) {
5120
5121 /* Get Henry's constant (Burkholder et al., 2019; Sander, 2023)... */
5122 double h = ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0]
5123 * exp(ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] * (1. / t - 1. / 298.15));
5124
5125 /* Use effective Henry's constant for SO2
5126 (Berglen, 2004; Simpson, 2012)... */
5127 if (ctl->wet_depo_so2_ph > 0) {
5128 const double H_ion = pow(10., -ctl->wet_depo_so2_ph);
5129 const double K_1 = 1.23e-2 * exp(2.01e3 * (1. / t - 1. / 298.15));
5130 const double K_2 = 6e-8 * exp(1.12e3 * (1. / t - 1. / 298.15));
5131 h *= (1. + K_1 / H_ion + K_1 * K_2 / SQR(H_ion));
5132 }
5133
5134 /* Estimate depth of cloud layer... */
5135 const double dz = 1e3 * (Z(pct) - Z(pcb));
5136
5137 /* Calculate scavenging coefficient... */
5138 lambda = h * RI * t * Is / 3.6e6 / dz * eta;
5139 }
5140 }
5141
5142 /* Calculate below-cloud scavenging coefficient... */
5143 else {
5144
5145 /* Calculate retention factor... */
5146 double eta;
5147 if (t > 270)
5148 eta = 1;
5149 else
5150 eta = ctl->wet_depo_bc_ret_ratio;
5151
5152 /* Use exponential dependency for particles (Bakels et al., 2024)... */
5153 if (ctl->wet_depo_bc_a > 0)
5154 lambda = ctl->wet_depo_bc_a * pow(Is, ctl->wet_depo_bc_b) * eta;
5155
5156 /* Use Henry's law for gases... */
5157 else if (ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] > 0) {
5158
5159 /* Get Henry's constant (Burkholder et al., 2019; Sander, 2023)... */
5160 const double h = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0]
5161 * exp(ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] * (1. / t - 1. / 298.15));
5162
5163 /* Estimate depth of cloud layer... */
5164 const double dz = 1e3 * (Z(pct) - Z(pcb));
5165
5166 /* Calculate scavenging coefficient... */
5167 lambda = h * RI * t * Is / 3.6e6 / dz * eta;
5168 }
5169 }
5170
5171 /* Calculate exponential decay of mass... */
5172 const double aux = exp(-cache->dt[ip] * lambda);
5173 if (ctl->qnt_m >= 0) {
5174 if (ctl->qnt_mloss_wet >= 0)
5175 atm->q[ctl->qnt_mloss_wet][ip]
5176 += atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip] * (1 - aux);
5177 atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip] *= aux;
5178 if (ctl->qnt_loss_rate >= 0)
5179 atm->q[ctl->qnt_loss_rate][ip] += lambda;
5180 }
5181 if (ctl->qnt_vmr >= 0)
5182 atm->q[ctl->qnt_vmr][ip] *= aux;
5183 }
5184}
5185
5186/*****************************************************************************/
5187
5188void mptrac_alloc(
5189 ctl_t **ctl,
5190 cache_t **cache,
5191 clim_t **clim,
5192 met_t **met0,
5193 met_t **met1,
5194 atm_t **atm,
5195 dd_t **dd) {
5196
5197 /* Initialize GPU... */
5198#ifdef _OPENACC
5199 SELECT_TIMER("ACC_INIT", "INIT", NVTX_GPU);
5200 int rank = 0;
5201#ifdef MPI
5202 MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank);
5203#endif
5204 if (acc_get_num_devices(acc_device_nvidia) <= 0)
5205 ERRMSG("Not running on a GPU device!");
5206 acc_set_device_num(rank % acc_get_num_devices(acc_device_nvidia),
5207 acc_device_nvidia);
5208 acc_device_t device_type = acc_get_device_type();
5209 acc_init(device_type);
5210#endif
5211
5212 /* Allocate... */
5213 SELECT_TIMER("ALLOC", "MEMORY", NVTX_CPU);
5214 ALLOC(*ctl, ctl_t, 1);
5215 ALLOC(*cache, cache_t, 1);
5216 ALLOC(*clim, clim_t, 1);
5217 ALLOC(*met0, met_t, 1);
5218 ALLOC(*met1, met_t, 1);
5219 ALLOC(*atm, atm_t, 1);
5220 ALLOC(*dd, dd_t, 1);
5221
5222 /* Create data region on GPU... */
5223#ifdef _OPENACC
5224 SELECT_TIMER("CREATE_DATA_REGION", "MEMORY", NVTX_GPU);
5225 ctl_t *ctlup = *ctl;
5226 cache_t *cacheup = *cache;
5227 clim_t *climup = *clim;
5228 met_t *met0up = *met0;
5229 met_t *met1up = *met1;
5230 atm_t *atmup = *atm;
5231#pragma acc enter data create(ctlup[:1],cacheup[:1],climup[:1],met0up[:1],met1up[:1],atmup[:1])
5232#ifdef DD
5233 dd_t *ddup = *dd;
5234#pragma acc enter data create(ddup[:1])
5235#endif
5236#endif
5237}
5238
5239/*****************************************************************************/
5240
5241void mptrac_free(
5242 ctl_t *ctl,
5243 cache_t *cache,
5244 clim_t *clim,
5245 met_t *met0,
5246 met_t *met1,
5247 atm_t *atm,
5248 dd_t *dd) {
5249
5250 /* Delete data region on GPU... */
5251#ifdef _OPENACC
5252 SELECT_TIMER("DELETE_DATA_REGION", "MEMORY", NVTX_GPU);
5253#pragma acc exit data delete (ctl,cache,clim,met0,met1,atm)
5254#endif
5255
5256 /* Free... */
5257 SELECT_TIMER("FREE", "MEMORY", NVTX_CPU);
5258 free(atm);
5259 free(ctl);
5260 free(cache);
5261 free(clim);
5262 free(met0);
5263 free(met1);
5264
5265 /* Free MPI datatype... */
5266#ifdef DD
5267 MPI_Type_free(&dd->MPI_Particle);
5268#endif
5269 free(dd);
5270}
5271
5272/*****************************************************************************/
5273
5274void mptrac_get_met(
5275 ctl_t *ctl,
5276 clim_t *clim,
5277 const double t,
5278 met_t **met0,
5279 met_t **met1,
5280 dd_t *dd) {
5281
5282 static int init;
5283
5284 met_t *mets;
5285
5286 char cachefile[LEN], cmd[2 * LEN], filename[LEN];
5287
5288 /* Set timer... */
5289 SELECT_TIMER("GET_MET", "INPUT", NVTX_READ);
5290
5291 /* Init... */
5292 if (t == ctl->t_start || !init) {
5293 init = 1;
5294
5295 /* Read meteo data... */
5296 get_met_help(ctl, t + (ctl->direction == -1 ? -1 : 0), -1,
5297 ctl->metbase, ctl->dt_met, filename);
5298 if (!mptrac_read_met(filename, ctl, clim, *met0, dd))
5299 ERRMSG("Cannot open file!");
5300
5301 get_met_help(ctl, t + (ctl->direction == 1 ? 1 : 0), 1,
5302 ctl->metbase, ctl->dt_met, filename);
5303 if (!mptrac_read_met(filename, ctl, clim, *met1, dd))
5304 ERRMSG("Cannot open file!");
5305
5306 /* Update GPU... */
5307 mptrac_update_device(NULL, NULL, NULL, met0, met1, NULL);
5308 SELECT_TIMER("GET_MET", "INPUT", NVTX_READ);
5309
5310 /* Caching... */
5311 if (ctl->met_cache && t != ctl->t_stop) {
5312 get_met_help(ctl, t + 1.1 * ctl->dt_met * ctl->direction,
5313 ctl->direction, ctl->metbase, ctl->dt_met, cachefile);
5314 sprintf(cmd, "cat %s > /dev/null &", cachefile);
5315 LOG(1, "Caching: %s", cachefile);
5316 if (system(cmd) != 0)
5317 WARN("Caching command failed!");
5318 }
5319 }
5320
5321 /* Read new data for forward trajectories... */
5322 if (t > (*met1)->time) {
5323
5324 /* Pointer swap... */
5325 mets = *met1;
5326 *met1 = *met0;
5327 *met0 = mets;
5328
5329 /* Read new meteo data... */
5330 get_met_help(ctl, t, 1, ctl->metbase, ctl->dt_met, filename);
5331 if (!mptrac_read_met(filename, ctl, clim, *met1, dd))
5332 ERRMSG("Cannot open file!");
5333
5334 /* Update GPU... */
5335 mptrac_update_device(NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, met1, NULL);
5336 SELECT_TIMER("GET_MET", "INPUT", NVTX_READ);
5337
5338 /* Caching... */
5339 if (ctl->met_cache && t != ctl->t_stop) {
5340 get_met_help(ctl, t + ctl->dt_met, 1, ctl->metbase, ctl->dt_met,
5341 cachefile);
5342 sprintf(cmd, "cat %s > /dev/null &", cachefile);
5343 LOG(1, "Caching: %s", cachefile);
5344 if (system(cmd) != 0)
5345 WARN("Caching command failed!");
5346 }
5347 }
5348
5349 /* Read new data for backward trajectories... */
5350 if (t < (*met0)->time) {
5351
5352 /* Pointer swap... */
5353 mets = *met1;
5354 *met1 = *met0;
5355 *met0 = mets;
5356
5357 /* Read new meteo data... */
5358 get_met_help(ctl, t, -1, ctl->metbase, ctl->dt_met, filename);
5359 if (!mptrac_read_met(filename, ctl, clim, *met0, dd))
5360 ERRMSG("Cannot open file!");
5361
5362 /* Update GPU... */
5363 mptrac_update_device(NULL, NULL, NULL, met0, NULL, NULL);
5364 SELECT_TIMER("GET_MET", "INPUT", NVTX_READ);
5365
5366 /* Caching... */
5367 if (ctl->met_cache && t != ctl->t_stop) {
5368 get_met_help(ctl, t - ctl->dt_met, -1, ctl->metbase, ctl->dt_met,
5369 cachefile);
5370 sprintf(cmd, "cat %s > /dev/null &", cachefile);
5371 LOG(1, "Caching: %s", cachefile);
5372 if (system(cmd) != 0)
5373 WARN("Caching command failed!");
5374 }
5375 }
5376
5377 /* Check that grids are consistent... */
5378 if ((*met0)->nx != 0 && (*met1)->nx != 0) {
5379 if ((*met0)->nx != (*met1)->nx
5380 || (*met0)->ny != (*met1)->ny || (*met0)->np != (*met1)->np)
5381 ERRMSG("Meteo grid dimensions do not match!");
5382 for (int ix = 0; ix < (*met0)->nx; ix++)
5383 if (fabs((*met0)->lon[ix] - (*met1)->lon[ix]) > 0.001)
5384 ERRMSG("Meteo grid longitudes do not match!");
5385 for (int iy = 0; iy < (*met0)->ny; iy++)
5386 if (fabs((*met0)->lat[iy] - (*met1)->lat[iy]) > 0.001)
5387 ERRMSG("Meteo grid latitudes do not match!");
5388 for (int ip = 0; ip < (*met0)->np; ip++)
5389 if (fabs((*met0)->p[ip] - (*met1)->p[ip]) > 0.001)
5390 ERRMSG("Meteo grid pressure levels do not match!");
5391 }
5392}
5393
5394/*****************************************************************************/
5395
5396void mptrac_init(
5397 ctl_t *ctl,
5398 cache_t *cache,
5399 clim_t *clim,
5400 atm_t *atm,
5401 const int ntask) {
5402
5403 /* Initialize timesteps... */
5404 module_timesteps_init(ctl, atm);
5405
5406 /* Initialize random number generator... */
5407 module_rng_init(ntask);
5408
5409 /* Update GPU memory... */
5410 mptrac_update_device(ctl, cache, clim, NULL, NULL, atm);
5411}
5412
5413/*****************************************************************************/
5414
5415int mptrac_read_atm(
5416 const char *filename,
5417 const ctl_t *ctl,
5418 atm_t *atm) {
5419
5420 int result;
5421
5422 /* Set timer... */
5423 SELECT_TIMER("READ_ATM", "INPUT", NVTX_READ);
5424
5425 /* Init... */
5426 atm->np = 0;
5427
5428 /* Write info... */
5429 LOG(1, "Read atmospheric data: %s", filename);
5430
5431 /* Read ASCII data... */
5432 if (ctl->atm_type == 0)
5433 result = read_atm_asc(filename, ctl, atm);
5434
5435 /* Read binary data... */
5436 else if (ctl->atm_type == 1)
5437 result = read_atm_bin(filename, ctl, atm);
5438
5439 /* Read netCDF data... */
5440 else if (ctl->atm_type == 2)
5441 result = read_atm_nc(filename, ctl, atm);
5442
5443 /* Read CLaMS data... */
5444 else if (ctl->atm_type == 3 || ctl->atm_type == 4)
5445 result = read_atm_clams(filename, ctl, atm);
5446
5447 /* Error... */
5448 else
5449 ERRMSG("Atmospheric data type not supported!");
5450
5451 /* Check result... */
5452 if (result != 1)
5453 return 0;
5454
5455 /* Check number of air parcels... */
5456 if (atm->np < 1)
5457 ERRMSG("Can not read any data!");
5458
5459 /* Write info... */
5460 double mini, maxi;
5461 LOG(2, "Number of particles: %d", atm->np);
5462 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, atm->time, 1, (size_t) atm->np);
5463 LOG(2, "Time range: %.2f ... %.2f s", mini, maxi);
5464 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, atm->p, 1, (size_t) atm->np);
5465 LOG(2, "Altitude range: %g ... %g km", Z(maxi), Z(mini));
5466 LOG(2, "Pressure range: %g ... %g hPa", maxi, mini);
5467 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, atm->lon, 1, (size_t) atm->np);
5468 LOG(2, "Longitude range: %g ... %g deg", mini, maxi);
5469 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, atm->lat, 1, (size_t) atm->np);
5470 LOG(2, "Latitude range: %g ... %g deg", mini, maxi);
5471 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
5472 char msg[5 * LEN];
5473 sprintf(msg, "Quantity %s range: %s ... %s %s",
5474 ctl->qnt_name[iq], ctl->qnt_format[iq],
5475 ctl->qnt_format[iq], ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
5476 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, atm->q[iq], 1, (size_t) atm->np);
5477 LOG(2, msg, mini, maxi);
5478 }
5479
5480 /* Return success... */
5481 return 1;
5482}
5483
5484/*****************************************************************************/
5485
5486void mptrac_read_clim(
5487 const ctl_t *ctl,
5488 clim_t *clim) {
5489
5490 /* Set timer... */
5491 SELECT_TIMER("READ_CLIM", "INPUT", NVTX_READ);
5492
5493 /* Init tropopause climatology... */
5494 clim_tropo_init(clim);
5495
5496 /* Read photolysis rates... */
5497 if (ctl->clim_photo[0] != '-')
5498 read_clim_photo(ctl->clim_photo, &clim->photo);
5499
5500 /* Read HNO3 climatology... */
5501 if (ctl->clim_hno3_filename[0] != '-')
5502 read_clim_zm(ctl->clim_hno3_filename, "HNO3", &clim->hno3);
5503
5504 /* Read OH climatology... */
5505 if (ctl->clim_oh_filename[0] != '-') {
5506 read_clim_zm(ctl->clim_oh_filename, "OH", &clim->oh);
5507 if (ctl->oh_chem_beta > 0)
5508 clim_oh_diurnal_correction(ctl, clim);
5509 }
5510
5511 /* Read H2O2 climatology... */
5512 if (ctl->clim_h2o2_filename[0] != '-')
5513 read_clim_zm(ctl->clim_h2o2_filename, "H2O2", &clim->h2o2);
5514
5515 /* Read HO2 climatology... */
5516 if (ctl->clim_ho2_filename[0] != '-')
5517 read_clim_zm(ctl->clim_ho2_filename, "HO2", &clim->ho2);
5518
5519 /* Read O(1D) climatology... */
5520 if (ctl->clim_o1d_filename[0] != '-')
5521 read_clim_zm(ctl->clim_o1d_filename, "O1D", &clim->o1d);
5522
5523 /* Read CFC-10 time series... */
5524 if (ctl->clim_ccl4_timeseries[0] != '-')
5525 read_clim_ts(ctl->clim_ccl4_timeseries, &clim->ccl4);
5526
5527 /* Read CFC-11 time series... */
5528 if (ctl->clim_ccl3f_timeseries[0] != '-')
5529 read_clim_ts(ctl->clim_ccl3f_timeseries, &clim->ccl3f);
5530
5531 /* Read CFC-12 time series... */
5532 if (ctl->clim_ccl2f2_timeseries[0] != '-')
5533 read_clim_ts(ctl->clim_ccl2f2_timeseries, &clim->ccl2f2);
5534
5535 /* Read N2O time series... */
5536 if (ctl->clim_n2o_timeseries[0] != '-')
5537 read_clim_ts(ctl->clim_n2o_timeseries, &clim->n2o);
5538
5539 /* Read SF6 time series... */
5540 if (ctl->clim_sf6_timeseries[0] != '-')
5541 read_clim_ts(ctl->clim_sf6_timeseries, &clim->sf6);
5542}
5543
5544/*****************************************************************************/
5545
5546void mptrac_read_ctl(
5547 const char *filename,
5548 int argc,
5549 char *argv[],
5550 ctl_t *ctl) {
5551
5552 /* Set timer... */
5553 SELECT_TIMER("READ_CTL", "INPUT", NVTX_READ);
5554
5555 /* Write info... */
5556 LOG(1, "\nMassive-Parallel Trajectory Calculations (MPTRAC)\n"
5557 "(executable: %s | version: %s | compiled: %s, %s)\n",
5558 argv[0], VERSION, __DATE__, __TIME__);
5559
5560 /* Initialize quantity indices... */
5561 ctl->qnt_idx = -1;
5562 ctl->qnt_ens = -1;
5563 ctl->qnt_stat = -1;
5564 ctl->qnt_m = -1;
5565 ctl->qnt_vmr = -1;
5566 ctl->qnt_rp = -1;
5567 ctl->qnt_rhop = -1;
5568 ctl->qnt_ps = -1;
5569 ctl->qnt_ts = -1;
5570 ctl->qnt_zs = -1;
5571 ctl->qnt_us = -1;
5572 ctl->qnt_vs = -1;
5573 ctl->qnt_ess = -1;
5574 ctl->qnt_nss = -1;
5575 ctl->qnt_shf = -1;
5576 ctl->qnt_lsm = -1;
5577 ctl->qnt_sst = -1;
5578 ctl->qnt_pbl = -1;
5579 ctl->qnt_pt = -1;
5580 ctl->qnt_tt = -1;
5581 ctl->qnt_zt = -1;
5582 ctl->qnt_h2ot = -1;
5583 ctl->qnt_zg = -1;
5584 ctl->qnt_p = -1;
5585 ctl->qnt_t = -1;
5586 ctl->qnt_rho = -1;
5587 ctl->qnt_u = -1;
5588 ctl->qnt_v = -1;
5589 ctl->qnt_w = -1;
5590 ctl->qnt_h2o = -1;
5591 ctl->qnt_o3 = -1;
5592 ctl->qnt_lwc = -1;
5593 ctl->qnt_rwc = -1;
5594 ctl->qnt_iwc = -1;
5595 ctl->qnt_swc = -1;
5596 ctl->qnt_cc = -1;
5597 ctl->qnt_pct = -1;
5598 ctl->qnt_pcb = -1;
5599 ctl->qnt_cl = -1;
5600 ctl->qnt_plcl = -1;
5601 ctl->qnt_plfc = -1;
5602 ctl->qnt_pel = -1;
5603 ctl->qnt_cape = -1;
5604 ctl->qnt_cin = -1;
5605 ctl->qnt_o3c = -1;
5606 ctl->qnt_hno3 = -1;
5607 ctl->qnt_oh = -1;
5608 ctl->qnt_h2o2 = -1;
5609 ctl->qnt_ho2 = -1;
5610 ctl->qnt_o1d = -1;
5611 ctl->qnt_mloss_oh = -1;
5612 ctl->qnt_mloss_h2o2 = -1;
5613 ctl->qnt_mloss_kpp = -1;
5614 ctl->qnt_mloss_wet = -1;
5615 ctl->qnt_mloss_dry = -1;
5616 ctl->qnt_mloss_decay = -1;
5617 ctl->qnt_loss_rate = -1;
5618 ctl->qnt_psat = -1;
5619 ctl->qnt_psice = -1;
5620 ctl->qnt_pw = -1;
5621 ctl->qnt_sh = -1;
5622 ctl->qnt_rh = -1;
5623 ctl->qnt_rhice = -1;
5624 ctl->qnt_theta = -1;
5625 ctl->qnt_zeta = -1;
5626 ctl->qnt_zeta_d = -1;
5627 ctl->qnt_zeta_dot = -1;
5628 ctl->qnt_tvirt = -1;
5629 ctl->qnt_lapse = -1;
5630 ctl->qnt_vh = -1;
5631 ctl->qnt_vz = -1;
5632 ctl->qnt_pv = -1;
5633 ctl->qnt_tdew = -1;
5634 ctl->qnt_tice = -1;
5635 ctl->qnt_tsts = -1;
5636 ctl->qnt_tnat = -1;
5637 ctl->qnt_Cx = -1;
5638 ctl->qnt_Ch2o = -1;
5639 ctl->qnt_Co3 = -1;
5640 ctl->qnt_Cco = -1;
5641 ctl->qnt_Coh = -1;
5642 ctl->qnt_Ch = -1;
5643 ctl->qnt_Cho2 = -1;
5644 ctl->qnt_Ch2o2 = -1;
5645 ctl->qnt_Co1d = -1;
5646 ctl->qnt_Co3p = -1;
5647 ctl->qnt_Cccl4 = -1;
5648 ctl->qnt_Cccl3f = -1;
5649 ctl->qnt_Cccl2f2 = -1;
5650 ctl->qnt_Cn2o = -1;
5651 ctl->qnt_Csf6 = -1;
5652 ctl->qnt_aoa = -1;
5653
5654#ifdef DD
5655 ctl->qnt_destination = -1;
5656 ctl->qnt_subdomain = -1;
5657#endif
5658
5659 /* Read quantities... */
5660 ctl->nq = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "NQ", -1, "0", NULL);
5661 if (ctl->nq > NQ)
5662 ERRMSG("Too many quantities!");
5663 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
5664
5665 /* Read quantity name and format... */
5666 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "QNT_NAME", iq, "", ctl->qnt_name[iq]);
5667 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "QNT_LONGNAME", iq, ctl->qnt_name[iq],
5668 ctl->qnt_longname[iq]);
5669 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "QNT_FORMAT", iq, "%g",
5670 ctl->qnt_format[iq]);
5671 if (strcasecmp(ctl->qnt_name[iq], "aoa") == 0)
5672 sprintf(ctl->qnt_format[iq], "%%.2f");
5673
5674 /* Try to identify quantity... */
5675 SET_QNT(qnt_idx, "idx", "particle index", "-")
5676 SET_QNT(qnt_ens, "ens", "ensemble index", "-")
5677 SET_QNT(qnt_stat, "stat", "station flag", "-")
5678 SET_QNT(qnt_m, "m", "mass", "kg")
5679 SET_QNT(qnt_vmr, "vmr", "volume mixing ratio", "ppv")
5680 SET_QNT(qnt_rp, "rp", "particle radius", "microns")
5681 SET_QNT(qnt_rhop, "rhop", "particle density", "kg/m^3")
5682 SET_QNT(qnt_ps, "ps", "surface pressure", "hPa")
5683 SET_QNT(qnt_ts, "ts", "surface temperature", "K")
5684 SET_QNT(qnt_zs, "zs", "surface height", "km")
5685 SET_QNT(qnt_us, "us", "surface zonal wind", "m/s")
5686 SET_QNT(qnt_vs, "vs", "surface meridional wind", "m/s")
5687 SET_QNT(qnt_ess, "ess", "eastward turbulent surface stress", "N/m^2")
5688 SET_QNT(qnt_nss, "nss", "northward turbulent surface stress", "N/m^2")
5689 SET_QNT(qnt_shf, "shf", "surface sensible heat flux", "W/m^2")
5690 SET_QNT(qnt_lsm, "lsm", "land-sea mask", "1")
5691 SET_QNT(qnt_sst, "sst", "sea surface temperature", "K")
5692 SET_QNT(qnt_pbl, "pbl", "planetary boundary layer", "hPa")
5693 SET_QNT(qnt_pt, "pt", "tropopause pressure", "hPa")
5694 SET_QNT(qnt_tt, "tt", "tropopause temperature", "K")
5695 SET_QNT(qnt_zt, "zt", "tropopause geopotential height", "km")
5696 SET_QNT(qnt_h2ot, "h2ot", "tropopause water vapor", "ppv")
5697 SET_QNT(qnt_zg, "zg", "geopotential height", "km")
5698 SET_QNT(qnt_p, "p", "pressure", "hPa")
5699 SET_QNT(qnt_t, "t", "temperature", "K")
5700 SET_QNT(qnt_rho, "rho", "air density", "kg/m^3")
5701 SET_QNT(qnt_u, "u", "zonal wind", "m/s")
5702 SET_QNT(qnt_v, "v", "meridional wind", "m/s")
5703 SET_QNT(qnt_w, "w", "vertical velocity", "hPa/s")
5704 SET_QNT(qnt_h2o, "h2o", "water vapor", "ppv")
5705 SET_QNT(qnt_o3, "o3", "ozone", "ppv")
5706 SET_QNT(qnt_lwc, "lwc", "cloud liquid water content", "kg/kg")
5707 SET_QNT(qnt_rwc, "rwc", "cloud rain water content", "kg/kg")
5708 SET_QNT(qnt_iwc, "iwc", "cloud ice water content", "kg/kg")
5709 SET_QNT(qnt_swc, "swc", "cloud snow water content", "kg/kg")
5710 SET_QNT(qnt_cc, "cc", "cloud cover", "1")
5711 SET_QNT(qnt_pct, "pct", "cloud top pressure", "hPa")
5712 SET_QNT(qnt_pcb, "pcb", "cloud bottom pressure", "hPa")
5713 SET_QNT(qnt_cl, "cl", "total column cloud water", "kg/m^2")
5714 SET_QNT(qnt_plcl, "plcl", "lifted condensation level", "hPa")
5715 SET_QNT(qnt_plfc, "plfc", "level of free convection", "hPa")
5716 SET_QNT(qnt_pel, "pel", "equilibrium level", "hPa")
5717 SET_QNT(qnt_cape, "cape", "convective available potential energy",
5718 "J/kg")
5719 SET_QNT(qnt_cin, "cin", "convective inhibition", "J/kg")
5720 SET_QNT(qnt_o3c, "o3c", "total column ozone", "DU")
5721 SET_QNT(qnt_hno3, "hno3", "nitric acid", "ppv")
5722 SET_QNT(qnt_oh, "oh", "hydroxyl radical", "ppv")
5723 SET_QNT(qnt_h2o2, "h2o2", "hydrogen peroxide", "ppv")
5724 SET_QNT(qnt_ho2, "ho2", "hydroperoxyl radical", "ppv")
5725 SET_QNT(qnt_o1d, "o1d", "atomic oxygen", "ppv")
5726 SET_QNT(qnt_mloss_oh, "mloss_oh", "mass loss due to OH chemistry", "kg")
5727 SET_QNT(qnt_mloss_h2o2, "mloss_h2o2",
5728 "mass loss due to H2O2 chemistry", "kg")
5729 SET_QNT(qnt_mloss_kpp, "mloss_kpp", "mass loss due to kpp chemistry",
5730 "kg")
5731 SET_QNT(qnt_mloss_wet, "mloss_wet", "mass loss due to wet deposition",
5732 "kg")
5733 SET_QNT(qnt_mloss_dry, "mloss_dry", "mass loss due to dry deposition",
5734 "kg")
5735 SET_QNT(qnt_mloss_decay, "mloss_decay",
5736 "mass loss due to exponential decay", "kg")
5737 SET_QNT(qnt_loss_rate, "loss_rate", "total loss rate", "s^-1")
5738 SET_QNT(qnt_psat, "psat", "saturation pressure over water", "hPa")
5739 SET_QNT(qnt_psice, "psice", "saturation pressure over ice", "hPa")
5740 SET_QNT(qnt_pw, "pw", "partial water vapor pressure", "hPa")
5741 SET_QNT(qnt_sh, "sh", "specific humidity", "kg/kg")
5742 SET_QNT(qnt_rh, "rh", "relative humidity", "%%")
5743 SET_QNT(qnt_rhice, "rhice", "relative humidity over ice", "%%")
5744 SET_QNT(qnt_theta, "theta", "potential temperature", "K")
5745 SET_QNT(qnt_zeta, "zeta", "zeta coordinate", "K")
5746 SET_QNT(qnt_zeta_d, "zeta_d", "diagnosed zeta coordinate", "K")
5747 SET_QNT(qnt_zeta_dot, "zeta_dot", "velocity of zeta coordinate",
5748 "K/day")
5749 SET_QNT(qnt_tvirt, "tvirt", "virtual temperature", "K")
5750 SET_QNT(qnt_lapse, "lapse", "temperature lapse rate", "K/km")
5751 SET_QNT(qnt_vh, "vh", "horizontal velocity", "m/s")
5752 SET_QNT(qnt_vz, "vz", "vertical velocity", "m/s")
5753 SET_QNT(qnt_pv, "pv", "potential vorticity", "PVU")
5754 SET_QNT(qnt_tdew, "tdew", "dew point temperature", "K")
5755 SET_QNT(qnt_tice, "tice", "frost point temperature", "K")
5756 SET_QNT(qnt_tsts, "tsts", "STS existence temperature", "K")
5757 SET_QNT(qnt_tnat, "tnat", "NAT existence temperature", "K")
5758 SET_QNT(qnt_Cx, "Cx", "Trace species x volume mixing ratio", "ppv")
5759 SET_QNT(qnt_Ch2o, "Ch2o", "H2O volume mixing ratio", "ppv")
5760 SET_QNT(qnt_Co3, "Co3", "O3 volume mixing ratio", "ppv")
5761 SET_QNT(qnt_Cco, "Cco", "CO volume mixing ratio", "ppv")
5762 SET_QNT(qnt_Coh, "Coh", "HO volume mixing ratio", "ppv")
5763 SET_QNT(qnt_Ch, "Ch", "H radical volume mixing ratio", "ppv")
5764 SET_QNT(qnt_Cho2, "Cho2", "HO2 volume mixing ratio", "ppv")
5765 SET_QNT(qnt_Ch2o2, "Ch2o2", "H2O2 volume mixing ratio", "ppv")
5766 SET_QNT(qnt_Co1d, "Co1d", "O(1D) volume mixing ratio", "ppv")
5767 SET_QNT(qnt_Co3p, "Co3p", "O(3P) radical volume mixing ratio", "ppv")
5768 SET_QNT(qnt_Cccl4, "Cccl4", "CCl4 (CFC-10) volume mixing ratio", "ppv")
5769 SET_QNT(qnt_Cccl3f, "Cccl3f", "CCl3F (CFC-11) volume mixing ratio",
5770 "ppv")
5771 SET_QNT(qnt_Cccl2f2, "Cccl2f2", "CCl2F2 (CFC-12) volume mixing ratio",
5772 "ppv")
5773 SET_QNT(qnt_Cn2o, "Cn2o", "N2O volume mixing ratio", "ppv")
5774 SET_QNT(qnt_Csf6, "Csf6", "SF6 volume mixing ratio", "ppv")
5775 SET_QNT(qnt_aoa, "aoa", "age of air", "s")
5776#ifdef DD
5777 SET_QNT(qnt_destination, "destination",
5778 "subdomain index of destination", "-")
5779 SET_QNT(qnt_subdomain, "subdomain", "current subdomain index", "-")
5780#endif
5781 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "QNT_UNIT", iq, "", ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
5782 }
5783
5784 /* Vertical coordinates and velocities... */
5785 ctl->advect_vert_coord =
5786 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ADVECT_VERT_COORD", -1, "0", NULL);
5787 if (ctl->advect_vert_coord < 0 || ctl->advect_vert_coord > 2)
5788 ERRMSG("Set ADVECT_VERT_COORD to 0, 1, or 2!");
5789 ctl->met_vert_coord =
5790 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_VERT_COORD", -1, "0", NULL);
5791 if (ctl->met_vert_coord < 0 || ctl->met_vert_coord > 4)
5792 ERRMSG("Set MET_VERT_COORD to 0, 1, 2, 3, or 4!");
5793 if (ctl->advect_vert_coord == 1 && ctl->qnt_zeta < 0)
5794 ERRMSG("Please add zeta to your quantities for diabatic calculations!");
5795 if (ctl->advect_vert_coord == 2 && ctl->met_vert_coord == 0)
5796 ERRMSG
5797 ("Using ADVECT_VERT_COORD = 2 requires meteo data on model levels!");
5798
5799 /* Time steps of simulation... */
5800 ctl->direction =
5801 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DIRECTION", -1, "1", NULL);
5802 if (ctl->direction != -1 && ctl->direction != 1)
5803 ERRMSG("Set DIRECTION to -1 or 1!");
5804 ctl->t_stop = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "T_STOP", -1, "1e100", NULL);
5805 ctl->dt_mod = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DT_MOD", -1, "180", NULL);
5806
5807 /* Meteo data... */
5808 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "METBASE", -1, "-", ctl->metbase);
5809 ctl->dt_met = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DT_MET", -1, "3600", NULL);
5810 ctl->met_convention =
5811 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CONVENTION", -1, "0", NULL);
5812 ctl->met_type =
5813 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_TYPE", -1, "0", NULL);
5814 if (ctl->advect_vert_coord == 1 && ctl->met_type != 0)
5815 ERRMSG
5816 ("Please use meteo files in netcdf format for diabatic calculations.");
5817 ctl->met_clams =
5818 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CLAMS", -1, "0", NULL);
5819 ctl->met_nc_scale =
5820 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_NC_SCALE", -1, "1", NULL);
5821 ctl->met_nc_level =
5822 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_NC_LEVEL", -1, "0", NULL);
5823 ctl->met_nc_quant =
5824 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_NC_QUANT", -1, "0", NULL);
5825 ctl->met_zstd_level =
5826 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_ZSTD_LEVEL", -1, "0", NULL);
5827 for (int i = 0; i < METVAR; i++) {
5828 char defprec[LEN] = "0", deftol[LEN] = "0.0";
5829 if (i == 0) /* geopotential height */
5830 sprintf(deftol, "0.5");
5831 else if (i == 1) /* temperature */
5832 sprintf(deftol, "5.0");
5833 else /* other variables */
5834 sprintf(defprec, "8");
5835 ctl->met_comp_prec[i] =
5836 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_COMP_PREC", i, defprec, NULL);
5837 ctl->met_comp_tol[i] =
5838 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_COMP_TOL", i, deftol, NULL);
5839 }
5840 ctl->met_cms_batch =
5841 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CMS_BATCH", -1, "-1", NULL);
5842 ctl->met_cms_zstd =
5843 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CMS_ZSTD", -1, "1", NULL);
5844 ctl->met_cms_heur =
5845 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CMS_HEUR", -1, "1", NULL);
5846 ctl->met_cms_eps_z =
5847 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CMS_EPS_Z", -1, "1.0", NULL);
5848 ctl->met_cms_eps_t =
5849 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CMS_EPS_T", -1, "0.05", NULL);
5850 ctl->met_cms_eps_u =
5851 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CMS_EPS_U", -1, "0.05", NULL);
5852 ctl->met_cms_eps_v =
5853 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CMS_EPS_V", -1, "0.05", NULL);
5854 ctl->met_cms_eps_w =
5855 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CMS_EPS_W", -1, "1.0", NULL);
5856 ctl->met_cms_eps_pv =
5857 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CMS_EPS_PV", -1, "1.0", NULL);
5858 ctl->met_cms_eps_h2o =
5859 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CMS_EPS_H2O", -1, "1.0", NULL);
5860 ctl->met_cms_eps_o3 =
5861 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CMS_EPS_O3", -1, "1.0", NULL);
5862 ctl->met_cms_eps_lwc =
5863 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CMS_EPS_LWC", -1, "1.0", NULL);
5864 ctl->met_cms_eps_rwc =
5865 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CMS_EPS_RWC", -1, "1.0", NULL);
5866 ctl->met_cms_eps_iwc =
5867 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CMS_EPS_IWC", -1, "1.0", NULL);
5868 ctl->met_cms_eps_swc =
5869 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CMS_EPS_SWC", -1, "1.0", NULL);
5870 ctl->met_cms_eps_cc =
5871 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CMS_EPS_CC", -1, "1.0", NULL);
5872 ctl->met_dx = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_DX", -1, "1", NULL);
5873 ctl->met_dy = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_DY", -1, "1", NULL);
5874 ctl->met_dp = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_DP", -1, "1", NULL);
5875 if (ctl->met_dx < 1 || ctl->met_dy < 1 || ctl->met_dp < 1)
5876 ERRMSG("MET_DX, MET_DY, and MET_DP need to be greater than zero!");
5877 ctl->met_sx = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_SX", -1, "1", NULL);
5878 ctl->met_sy = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_SY", -1, "1", NULL);
5879 ctl->met_sp = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_SP", -1, "1", NULL);
5880 if (ctl->met_sx < 1 || ctl->met_sy < 1 || ctl->met_sp < 1)
5881 ERRMSG("MET_SX, MET_SY, and MET_SP need to be greater than zero!");
5882 ctl->met_detrend =
5883 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_DETREND", -1, "-999", NULL);
5884 ctl->met_np = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_NP", -1, "0", NULL);
5885 if (ctl->met_np > EP)
5886 ERRMSG("Too many pressure levels!");
5887 ctl->met_press_level_def =
5888 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_PRESS_LEVEL_DEF", -1, "-1",
5889 NULL);
5890 if (ctl->met_press_level_def >= 0) {
5891 level_definitions(ctl);
5892 } else {
5893 if (ctl->met_np > 0) {
5894 for (int ip = 0; ip < ctl->met_np; ip++)
5895 ctl->met_p[ip] =
5896 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_P", ip, "", NULL);
5897 }
5898 }
5899 ctl->met_nlev =
5900 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_NLEV", -1, "0", NULL);
5901 if (ctl->met_nlev > EP)
5902 ERRMSG("Too many model levels!");
5903 for (int ip = 0; ip < ctl->met_nlev; ip++) {
5904 ctl->met_lev_hyam[ip] =
5905 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_LEV_HYAM", ip, "", NULL);
5906 ctl->met_lev_hybm[ip] =
5907 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_LEV_HYBM", ip, "", NULL);
5908 }
5909 ctl->met_geopot_sx =
5910 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_GEOPOT_SX", -1, "-1", NULL);
5911 ctl->met_geopot_sy =
5912 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_GEOPOT_SY", -1, "-1", NULL);
5913 ctl->met_relhum =
5914 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_RELHUM", -1, "0", NULL);
5915 ctl->met_cape =
5916 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CAPE", -1, "1", NULL);
5917 if (ctl->met_cape < 0 || ctl->met_cape > 1)
5918 ERRMSG("Set MET_CAPE to 0 or 1!");
5919 ctl->met_pbl =
5920 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_PBL", -1, "3", NULL);
5921 if (ctl->met_pbl < 0 || ctl->met_pbl > 3)
5922 ERRMSG("Set MET_PBL to 0 ... 3!");
5923 ctl->met_pbl_min =
5924 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_PBL_MIN", -1, "0.1", NULL);
5925 ctl->met_pbl_max =
5926 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_PBL_MAX", -1, "5.0", NULL);
5927 ctl->met_tropo =
5928 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_TROPO", -1, "3", NULL);
5929 if (ctl->met_tropo < 0 || ctl->met_tropo > 5)
5930 ERRMSG("Set MET_TROPO to 0 ... 5!");
5931 ctl->met_tropo_pv =
5932 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_TROPO_PV", -1, "3.5", NULL);
5933 ctl->met_tropo_theta =
5934 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_TROPO_THETA", -1, "380", NULL);
5935 ctl->met_tropo_spline =
5936 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_TROPO_SPLINE", -1, "1", NULL);
5937 ctl->met_dt_out =
5938 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_DT_OUT", -1, "0.1", NULL);
5939 ctl->met_cache =
5940 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_CACHE", -1, "0", NULL);
5941 ctl->met_mpi_share =
5942 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MET_MPI_SHARE", -1, "0", NULL);
5943
5944 /* Sorting... */
5945 ctl->sort_dt = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "SORT_DT", -1, "-999", NULL);
5946
5947 /* Isosurface parameters... */
5948 ctl->isosurf =
5949 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ISOSURF", -1, "0", NULL);
5950 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BALLOON", -1, "-", ctl->balloon);
5951
5952 /* Random number generator... */
5953 ctl->rng_type =
5954 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "RNG_TYPE", -1, "1", NULL);
5955 if (ctl->rng_type < 0 || ctl->rng_type > 2)
5956 ERRMSG("Set RNG_TYPE to 0, 1, or 2!");
5957
5958 /* Advection parameters... */
5959 ctl->advect = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ADVECT", -1, "2", NULL);
5960 if (!
5961 (ctl->advect == 0 || ctl->advect == 1 || ctl->advect == 2
5962 || ctl->advect == 4))
5963 ERRMSG("Set ADVECT to 0, 1, 2, or 4!");
5964
5965 /* Diffusion parameters... */
5966 ctl->diffusion
5967 = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DIFFUSION", -1, "0", NULL);
5968 if (ctl->diffusion < 0 || ctl->diffusion > 2)
5969 ERRMSG("Set DIFFUSION to 0, 1 or 2!");
5970 ctl->turb_dx_pbl =
5971 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TURB_DX_PBL", -1, "50", NULL);
5972 ctl->turb_dx_trop =
5973 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TURB_DX_TROP", -1, "50", NULL);
5974 ctl->turb_dx_strat =
5975 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TURB_DX_STRAT", -1, "0", NULL);
5976 ctl->turb_dz_pbl =
5977 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TURB_DZ_PBL", -1, "0", NULL);
5978 ctl->turb_dz_trop =
5979 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TURB_DZ_TROP", -1, "0", NULL);
5980 ctl->turb_dz_strat =
5981 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TURB_DZ_STRAT", -1, "0.1", NULL);
5982 ctl->turb_mesox =
5983 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TURB_MESOX", -1, "0.16", NULL);
5984 ctl->turb_mesoz =
5985 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TURB_MESOZ", -1, "0.16", NULL);
5986

5988 ctl->conv_mix_pbl
5989 = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CONV_MIX_PBL", -1, "0", NULL);
5990 ctl->conv_pbl_trans
5991 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CONV_PBL_TRANS", -1, "0", NULL);
5992 ctl->conv_cape
5993 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CONV_CAPE", -1, "-999", NULL);
5994 ctl->conv_cin
5995 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CONV_CIN", -1, "-999", NULL);
5996 ctl->conv_dt = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CONV_DT", -1, "-999", NULL);
5997
5998 /* Boundary conditions... */
5999 ctl->bound_mass =
6000 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_MASS", -1, "-999", NULL);
6001 ctl->bound_mass_trend =
6002 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_MASS_TREND", -1, "0", NULL);
6003 ctl->bound_vmr =
6004 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_VMR", -1, "-999", NULL);
6005 ctl->bound_vmr_trend =
6006 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_VMR_TREND", -1, "0", NULL);
6007 ctl->bound_lat0 =
6008 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_LAT0", -1, "-999", NULL);
6009 ctl->bound_lat1 =
6010 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_LAT1", -1, "-999", NULL);
6011 ctl->bound_p0 =
6012 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_P0", -1, "-999", NULL);
6013 ctl->bound_p1 =
6014 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_P1", -1, "-999", NULL);
6015 ctl->bound_dps =
6016 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_DPS", -1, "-999", NULL);
6017 ctl->bound_dzs =
6018 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_DZS", -1, "-999", NULL);
6019 ctl->bound_zetas =
6020 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_ZETAS", -1, "-999", NULL);
6021 ctl->bound_pbl =
6022 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "BOUND_PBL", -1, "0", NULL);
6023
6024 /* Species parameters... */
6025 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "SPECIES", -1, "-", ctl->species);
6026 if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "CF2Cl2") == 0) {
6027 ctl->molmass = 120.907;
6028 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 3e-5;
6029 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 3500.0;
6030 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "CFCl3") == 0) {
6031 ctl->molmass = 137.359;
6032 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 1.1e-4;
6033 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 3300.0;
6034 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "CH4") == 0) {
6035 ctl->molmass = 16.043;
6036 ctl->oh_chem_reaction = 2;
6037 ctl->oh_chem[0] = 2.45e-12;
6038 ctl->oh_chem[1] = 1775;
6039 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 1.4e-5;
6040 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 1600.0;
6041 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "CO") == 0) {
6042 ctl->molmass = 28.01;
6043 ctl->oh_chem_reaction = 3;
6044 ctl->oh_chem[0] = 6.9e-33;
6045 ctl->oh_chem[1] = 2.1;
6046 ctl->oh_chem[2] = 1.1e-12;
6047 ctl->oh_chem[3] = -1.3;
6048 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 9.7e-6;
6049 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 1300.0;
6050 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "CO2") == 0) {
6051 ctl->molmass = 44.009;
6052 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 3.3e-4;
6053 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 2400.0;
6054 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "H2O") == 0) {
6055 ctl->molmass = 18.01528;
6056 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "N2O") == 0) {
6057 ctl->molmass = 44.013;
6058 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 2.4e-4;
6059 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 2600.;
6060 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "NH3") == 0) {
6061 ctl->molmass = 17.031;
6062 ctl->oh_chem_reaction = 2;
6063 ctl->oh_chem[0] = 1.7e-12;
6064 ctl->oh_chem[1] = 710;
6065 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 5.9e-1;
6066 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 4200.0;
6067 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "HNO3") == 0) {
6068 ctl->molmass = 63.012;
6069 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 2.1e3;
6070 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 8700.0;
6071 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "NO") == 0) {
6072 ctl->molmass = 30.006;
6073 ctl->oh_chem_reaction = 3;
6074 ctl->oh_chem[0] = 7.1e-31;
6075 ctl->oh_chem[1] = 2.6;
6076 ctl->oh_chem[2] = 3.6e-11;
6077 ctl->oh_chem[3] = 0.1;
6078 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 1.9e-5;
6079 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 1600.0;
6080 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "NO2") == 0) {
6081 ctl->molmass = 46.005;
6082 ctl->oh_chem_reaction = 3;
6083 ctl->oh_chem[0] = 1.8e-30;
6084 ctl->oh_chem[1] = 3.0;
6085 ctl->oh_chem[2] = 2.8e-11;
6086 ctl->oh_chem[3] = 0.0;
6087 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 1.2e-4;
6088 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 2400.0;
6089 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "O3") == 0) {
6090 ctl->molmass = 47.997;
6091 ctl->oh_chem_reaction = 2;
6092 ctl->oh_chem[0] = 1.7e-12;
6093 ctl->oh_chem[1] = 940;
6094 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 1e-4;
6095 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 2800.0;
6096 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "SF6") == 0) {
6097 ctl->molmass = 146.048;
6098 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 2.4e-6;
6099 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 3100.0;
6100 } else if (strcasecmp(ctl->species, "SO2") == 0) {
6101 ctl->molmass = 64.066;
6102 ctl->oh_chem_reaction = 3;
6103 ctl->oh_chem[0] = 2.9e-31;
6104 ctl->oh_chem[1] = 4.1;
6105 ctl->oh_chem[2] = 1.7e-12;
6106 ctl->oh_chem[3] = -0.2;
6107 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] = 1.3e-2;
6108 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[1] = ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[1] = 2900.0;
6109 }
6110
6111 /* Molar mass... */
6112 char defstr[LEN];
6113 sprintf(defstr, "%g", ctl->molmass);
6114 ctl->molmass = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MOLMASS", -1, defstr, NULL);
6115
6116 /* OH chemistry... */
6117 sprintf(defstr, "%d", ctl->oh_chem_reaction);
6118 ctl->oh_chem_reaction =
6119 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "OH_CHEM_REACTION", -1, defstr,
6120 NULL);
6121 for (int ip = 0; ip < 4; ip++) {
6122 sprintf(defstr, "%g", ctl->oh_chem[ip]);
6123 ctl->oh_chem[ip] =
6124 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "OH_CHEM", ip, defstr, NULL);
6125 }
6126 ctl->oh_chem_beta =
6127 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "OH_CHEM_BETA", -1, "0", NULL);
6128
6129 /* H2O2 chemistry... */
6130 ctl->h2o2_chem_reaction =
6131 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "H2O2_CHEM_REACTION", -1, "0", NULL);
6132
6133 /* KPP chemistry... */
6134 ctl->kpp_chem =
6135 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "KPP_CHEM", -1, "0", NULL);
6136 ctl->dt_kpp = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DT_KPP", -1, "1800", NULL);
6137
6138 /* First order tracer chemistry... */
6139 ctl->tracer_chem =
6140 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TRACER_CHEM", -1, "0", NULL);
6141
6142 /* Wet deposition... */
6143 for (int ip = 0; ip < 2; ip++) {
6144 sprintf(defstr, "%g", ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[ip]);
6145 ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[ip] =
6146 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_IC_H", ip, defstr, NULL);
6147 }
6148 for (int ip = 0; ip < 1; ip++) {
6149 sprintf(defstr, "%g", ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[ip]);
6150 ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[ip] =
6151 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_BC_H", ip, defstr, NULL);
6152 }
6153 ctl->wet_depo_so2_ph =
6154 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_SO2_PH", -1, "0", NULL);
6155 ctl->wet_depo_ic_a =
6156 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_IC_A", -1, "0", NULL);
6157 ctl->wet_depo_ic_b =
6158 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_IC_B", -1, "0", NULL);
6159 ctl->wet_depo_bc_a =
6160 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_BC_A", -1, "0", NULL);
6161 ctl->wet_depo_bc_b =
6162 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_BC_B", -1, "0", NULL);
6163 ctl->wet_depo_pre[0] =
6164 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_PRE", 0, "0.5", NULL);
6165 ctl->wet_depo_pre[1] =
6166 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_PRE", 1, "0.36", NULL);
6167 ctl->wet_depo_ic_ret_ratio =
6168 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_IC_RET_RATIO", -1, "1", NULL);
6169 ctl->wet_depo_bc_ret_ratio =
6170 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "WET_DEPO_BC_RET_RATIO", -1, "1", NULL);
6171
6172 /* Dry deposition... */
6173 ctl->dry_depo_vdep =
6174 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DRY_DEPO_VDEP", -1, "0", NULL);
6175 ctl->dry_depo_dp =
6176 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DRY_DEPO_DP", -1, "30", NULL);
6177
6178 /* Climatological data... */
6179 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_PHOTO", -1,
6180 "../../data/clams_photolysis_rates.nc", ctl->clim_photo);
6181 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_HNO3_FILENAME", -1,
6182 "../../data/gozcards_HNO3.nc", ctl->clim_hno3_filename);
6183 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_OH_FILENAME", -1,
6184 "../../data/clams_radical_species_vmr.nc", ctl->clim_oh_filename);
6185 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_H2O2_FILENAME", -1,
6186 "../../data/cams_H2O2.nc", ctl->clim_h2o2_filename);
6187 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_HO2_FILENAME", -1,
6188 "../../data/clams_radical_species_vmr.nc", ctl->clim_ho2_filename);
6189 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_O1D_FILENAME", -1,
6190 "../../data/clams_radical_species_vmr.nc", ctl->clim_o1d_filename);
6191 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_CCL4_TIMESERIES", -1,
6192 "../../data/noaa_gml_ccl4.tab", ctl->clim_ccl4_timeseries);
6193 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_CCL3F_TIMESERIES", -1,
6194 "../../data/noaa_gml_cfc11.tab", ctl->clim_ccl3f_timeseries);
6195 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_CCL2F2_TIMESERIES", -1,
6196 "../../data/noaa_gml_cfc12.tab", ctl->clim_ccl2f2_timeseries);
6197 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_N2O_TIMESERIES", -1,
6198 "../../data/noaa_gml_n2o.tab", ctl->clim_n2o_timeseries);
6199 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CLIM_SF6_TIMESERIES", -1,
6200 "../../data/noaa_gml_sf6.tab", ctl->clim_sf6_timeseries);
6201
6202 /* Mixing... */
6203 ctl->mixing_dt =
6204 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_DT", -1, "3600.", NULL);
6205 ctl->mixing_trop =
6206 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_TROP", -1, "-999", NULL);
6207 ctl->mixing_strat =
6208 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_STRAT", -1, "-999", NULL);
6209 ctl->mixing_z0 =
6210 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_Z0", -1, "-5", NULL);
6211 ctl->mixing_z1 =
6212 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_Z1", -1, "85", NULL);
6213 ctl->mixing_nz =
6214 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_NZ", -1, "90", NULL);
6215 ctl->mixing_lon0 =
6216 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_LON0", -1, "-180", NULL);
6217 ctl->mixing_lon1 =
6218 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_LON1", -1, "180", NULL);
6219 ctl->mixing_nx =
6220 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_NX", -1, "360", NULL);
6221 ctl->mixing_lat0 =
6222 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_LAT0", -1, "-90", NULL);
6223 ctl->mixing_lat1 =
6224 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_LAT1", -1, "90", NULL);
6225 ctl->mixing_ny =
6226 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "MIXING_NY", -1, "180", NULL);

6229 ctl->chemgrid_z0 =
6230 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CHEMGRID_Z0", -1, "-5", NULL);
6231 ctl->chemgrid_z1 =
6232 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CHEMGRID_Z1", -1, "85", NULL);
6233 ctl->chemgrid_nz =
6234 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CHEMGRID_NZ", -1, "90", NULL);
6235 ctl->chemgrid_lon0 =
6236 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CHEMGRID_LON0", -1, "-180", NULL);

6238 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CHEMGRID_LON1", -1, "180", NULL);

6242 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CHEMGRID_LAT0", -1, "-90", NULL);

6249 ctl->tdec_trop = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TDEC_TROP", -1, "0", NULL);
6250 ctl->tdec_strat =
6251 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "TDEC_STRAT", -1, "0", NULL);

6253 /* PSC analysis... */
6254 ctl->psc_h2o = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PSC_H2O", -1, "4e-6", NULL);
6255 ctl->psc_hno3 =
6256 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PSC_HNO3", -1, "9e-9", NULL);
6257
6258 /* Output of atmospheric data... */
6259 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ATM_BASENAME", -1, "-", ctl->atm_basename);
6260 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ATM_GPFILE", -1, "-", ctl->atm_gpfile);
6261 ctl->atm_dt_out =
6262 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ATM_DT_OUT", -1, "86400", NULL);
6263 ctl->atm_filter =
6264 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ATM_FILTER", -1, "0", NULL);
6265 ctl->atm_stride =
6266 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ATM_STRIDE", -1, "1", NULL);
6267 ctl->atm_type =
6268 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ATM_TYPE", -1, "0", NULL);
6269 ctl->atm_type_out =
6270 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ATM_TYPE_OUT", -1, "-1", NULL);
6271 if (ctl->atm_type_out == -1)
6272 ctl->atm_type_out = ctl->atm_type;
6273 ctl->atm_nc_level =
6274 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ATM_NC_LEVEL", -1, "0", NULL);
6275 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
6276 ctl->atm_nc_quant[iq] =
6277 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ATM_NC_QUANT", iq, "0", NULL);
6278 ctl->obs_type =
6279 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "OBS_TYPE", -1, "0", NULL);
6280
6281 /* Output of CSI data... */
6282 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_BASENAME", -1, "-", ctl->csi_basename);
6283 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_KERNEL", -1, "-", ctl->csi_kernel);
6284 ctl->csi_dt_out =
6285 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_DT_OUT", -1, "86400", NULL);
6286 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_OBSFILE", -1, "-", ctl->csi_obsfile);
6287 ctl->csi_obsmin =
6288 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_OBSMIN", -1, "0", NULL);
6289 ctl->csi_modmin =
6290 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_MODMIN", -1, "0", NULL);
6291 ctl->csi_z0 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_Z0", -1, "-5", NULL);
6292 ctl->csi_z1 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_Z1", -1, "85", NULL);
6293 ctl->csi_nz = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_NZ", -1, "1", NULL);
6294 ctl->csi_lon0 =
6295 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_LON0", -1, "-180", NULL);
6296 ctl->csi_lon1 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_LON1", -1, "180", NULL);
6297 ctl->csi_nx =
6298 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_NX", -1, "360", NULL);
6299 ctl->csi_lat0 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_LAT0", -1, "-90", NULL);
6300 ctl->csi_lat1 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_LAT1", -1, "90", NULL);
6301 ctl->csi_ny =
6302 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "CSI_NY", -1, "180", NULL);
6303
6304 /* Output of ensemble data... */
6305 ctl->nens = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "NENS", -1, "0", NULL);
6306 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ENS_BASENAME", -1, "-", ctl->ens_basename);
6307 ctl->ens_dt_out =
6308 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "ENS_DT_OUT", -1, "86400", NULL);
6309
6310 /* Output of grid data... */
6311 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_BASENAME", -1, "-",
6312 ctl->grid_basename);
6313 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_KERNEL", -1, "-", ctl->grid_kernel);
6314 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_GPFILE", -1, "-", ctl->grid_gpfile);
6315 ctl->grid_dt_out =
6316 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_DT_OUT", -1, "86400", NULL);
6317 ctl->grid_sparse =
6318 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_SPARSE", -1, "0", NULL);
6319 ctl->grid_nc_level =
6320 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_NC_LEVEL", -1, "0", NULL);
6321 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
6322 ctl->grid_nc_quant[iq] =
6323 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_NC_QUANT", iq, "0", NULL);
6324 ctl->grid_stddev =
6325 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_STDDEV", -1, "0", NULL);
6326 ctl->grid_z0 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_Z0", -1, "-5", NULL);
6327 ctl->grid_z1 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_Z1", -1, "85", NULL);
6328 ctl->grid_nz =
6329 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_NZ", -1, "1", NULL);
6330 ctl->grid_lon0 =
6331 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_LON0", -1, "-180", NULL);
6332 ctl->grid_lon1 =
6333 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_LON1", -1, "180", NULL);
6334 ctl->grid_nx =
6335 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_NX", -1, "360", NULL);
6336 ctl->grid_lat0 =
6337 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_LAT0", -1, "-90", NULL);
6338 ctl->grid_lat1 =
6339 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_LAT1", -1, "90", NULL);
6340 ctl->grid_ny =
6341 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_NY", -1, "180", NULL);
6342 ctl->grid_type =
6343 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "GRID_TYPE", -1, "0", NULL);
6344
6345 /* Output of profile data... */
6346 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_BASENAME", -1, "-",
6347 ctl->prof_basename);
6348 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_OBSFILE", -1, "-", ctl->prof_obsfile);
6349 ctl->prof_z0 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_Z0", -1, "0", NULL);
6350 ctl->prof_z1 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_Z1", -1, "60", NULL);
6351 ctl->prof_nz =
6352 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_NZ", -1, "60", NULL);
6353 ctl->prof_lon0 =
6354 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_LON0", -1, "-180", NULL);
6355 ctl->prof_lon1 =
6356 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_LON1", -1, "180", NULL);
6357 ctl->prof_nx =
6358 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_NX", -1, "360", NULL);
6359 ctl->prof_lat0 =
6360 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_LAT0", -1, "-90", NULL);
6361 ctl->prof_lat1 =
6362 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_LAT1", -1, "90", NULL);
6363 ctl->prof_ny =
6364 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "PROF_NY", -1, "180", NULL);
6365
6366 /* Output of sample data... */
6367 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "SAMPLE_BASENAME", -1, "-",
6368 ctl->sample_basename);
6369 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "SAMPLE_KERNEL", -1, "-",
6370 ctl->sample_kernel);
6371 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "SAMPLE_OBSFILE", -1, "-",
6372 ctl->sample_obsfile);
6373 ctl->sample_dx =
6374 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "SAMPLE_DX", -1, "50", NULL);
6375 ctl->sample_dz =
6376 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "SAMPLE_DZ", -1, "-999", NULL);
6377
6378 /* Output of station data... */
6379 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "STAT_BASENAME", -1, "-",
6380 ctl->stat_basename);
6381 ctl->stat_lon = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "STAT_LON", -1, "0", NULL);
6382 ctl->stat_lat = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "STAT_LAT", -1, "0", NULL);
6383 ctl->stat_r = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "STAT_R", -1, "50", NULL);
6384 ctl->stat_t0 =
6385 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "STAT_T0", -1, "-1e100", NULL);
6386 ctl->stat_t1 = scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "STAT_T1", -1, "1e100", NULL);
6387
6388 /* Output of VTK data... */
6389 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "VTK_BASENAME", -1, "-", ctl->vtk_basename);
6390 ctl->vtk_dt_out =
6391 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "VTK_DT_OUT", -1, "86400", NULL);
6392 ctl->vtk_stride =
6393 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "VTK_STRIDE", -1, "1", NULL);
6394 ctl->vtk_scale =
6395 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "VTK_SCALE", -1, "1.0", NULL);
6396 ctl->vtk_offset =
6397 scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "VTK_OFFSET", -1, "0.0", NULL);
6398 ctl->vtk_sphere =
6399 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "VTK_SPHERE", -1, "0", NULL);
6400
6401 /* Domain decomposition... */
6402 ctl->dd = (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DD", -1, "0", NULL);
6403 ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional =
6404 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DD_SUBDOMAINS_MERIDIONAL", -1,
6405 (ctl->dd == 1) ? "2" : "1", NULL);
6406 ctl->dd_subdomains_zonal =
6407 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DD_SUBDOMAINS_ZONAL", -1,
6408 (ctl->dd == 1) ? "2" : "1", NULL);
6409 if (ctl->dd_subdomains_zonal * ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional > 1)
6410 ctl->dd = 1;
6411 else if (ctl->dd == 1)
6412 ERRMSG("Please provide zonal and meridional subdomain numbers!")
6413 ctl->dd_nbr_neighbours =
6414 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DD_NBR_NEIGHBOURS", -1, "8",
6415 NULL);
6416 ctl->dd_halos_size =
6417 (int) scan_ctl(filename, argc, argv, "DD_HALOS_SIZE", -1, "1", NULL);
6418}
6419
6420/*****************************************************************************/
6421
6422int mptrac_read_met(
6423 const char *filename,
6424 const ctl_t *ctl,
6425 const clim_t *clim,
6426 met_t *met,
6427 dd_t *dd) {
6428
6429 /* Write info... */
6430 LOG(1, "Read meteo data: %s", filename);
6431
6432 /* Set rank... */
6433 int rank = 0;
6434#ifdef MPI
6435 if (ctl->met_mpi_share)
6436 MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &rank);
6437#endif
6438
6439 /* Check rank... */
6440 if (!ctl->met_mpi_share || rank == 0) {
6441
6442 /* Read netCDF data... */
6443 if (ctl->met_type == 0) {
6444 if (read_met_nc(filename, ctl, met, dd) != 1)
6445 return 0;
6446 }
6447
6448 /* Read binary data... */
6449 else if ((ctl->met_type >= 1 && ctl->met_type <= 5) || ctl->met_type == 7) {
6450 if (read_met_bin(filename, ctl, met) != 1)
6451 return 0;
6452 }
6453
6454#ifdef ECCODES
6455 /* Read grib data... */
6456 else if (ctl->met_type == 6) {
6457 if (read_met_grib(filename, ctl, met) != 1)
6458 return 0;
6459 }
6460#endif
6461
6462 /* Not implemented... */
6463 else
6464 ERRMSG("MET_TYPE not implemented!");
6465
6466 /* Preprocessing for netCDF and grib files... */
6467 if (ctl->met_type == 0 || ctl->met_type == 6) {
6468
6469 /* Extrapolate data for lower boundary... */
6470 read_met_extrapolate(met);
6471
6472 /* Fix polar winds... */
6473 read_met_polar_winds(met);
6474
6475 /* Create periodic boundary conditions... */
6476#ifndef DD
6477 read_met_periodic(met);
6478#endif
6479
6480 /* Downsampling... */
6481 read_met_sample(ctl, met);
6482
6483 /* Calculate geopotential heights... */
6484 read_met_geopot(ctl, met);
6485
6486 /* Calculate potential vorticity... */
6487 read_met_pv(met);
6488
6489 /* Calculate boundary layer data... */
6490 read_met_pbl(ctl, met);
6491
6492 /* Calculate tropopause data... */
6493 read_met_tropo(ctl, clim, met);
6494
6495 /* Calculate cloud properties... */
6496 read_met_cloud(met);
6497
6498 /* Calculate convective available potential energy... */
6499 read_met_cape(ctl, clim, met);
6500
6501 /* Calculate total column ozone... */
6502 read_met_ozone(met);
6503
6504 /* Detrending... */
6505 read_met_detrend(ctl, met);
6506
6507 /* Check meteo data and smooth zeta profiles ... */
6508 read_met_monotonize(ctl, met);
6509 }
6510 }
6511
6512 /* Broadcast data via MPI... */
6513#ifdef MPI
6514 if (ctl->met_mpi_share) {
6515
6516 /* Set timer... */
6517 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_MPI_BCAST", "COMM", NVTX_SEND);
6518 LOG(2, "Broadcast data on rank %d...", rank);
6519
6520 /* Broadcast... */
6521 broadcast_large_data(met, sizeof(met_t));
6522 }
6523#endif
6524
6525 /* Return success... */
6526 return 1;
6527}
6528
6529/*****************************************************************************/
6530
6531void mptrac_run_timestep(
6532 ctl_t *ctl,
6533 cache_t *cache,
6534 clim_t *clim,
6535 met_t **met0,
6536 met_t **met1,
6537 atm_t *atm,
6538 double t,
6539 dd_t *dd) {
6540
6541 /* Initialize modules... */
6542 if (t == ctl->t_start) {
6543
6544 /* Initialize isosurface data... */
6545 if (ctl->isosurf >= 1 && ctl->isosurf <= 4)
6546 module_isosurf_init(ctl, cache, *met0, *met1, atm);
6547
6548 /* Initialize advection... */
6549 module_advect_init(ctl, cache, *met0, *met1, atm);
6550
6551 /* Initialize chemistry... */
6552 module_chem_init(ctl, cache, clim, *met0, *met1, atm);
6553 }
6554
6555 /* Set time steps of air parcels... */
6556 module_timesteps(ctl, cache, *met0, atm, t);
6557
6558 /* Sort particles... */
6559 if (ctl->sort_dt > 0 && fmod(t, ctl->sort_dt) == 0)
6560 module_sort(ctl, *met0, atm);
6561
6562
6563 /* Check positions (initial)... */
6564 module_position(cache, *met0, *met1, atm);
6565
6566 /* Advection... */
6567 if (ctl->advect > 0)
6568 module_advect(ctl, cache, *met0, *met1, atm);
6569
6570 /* Turbulent diffusion... */
6571 if (ctl->diffusion == 1
6572 && (ctl->turb_dx_pbl > 0 || ctl->turb_dz_pbl > 0
6573 || ctl->turb_dx_trop > 0 || ctl->turb_dz_trop > 0
6574 || ctl->turb_dx_strat > 0 || ctl->turb_dz_strat > 0))
6575 module_diff_turb(ctl, cache, clim, *met0, *met1, atm);
6576
6577 /* Mesoscale diffusion... */
6578 if (ctl->diffusion == 1 && (ctl->turb_mesox > 0 || ctl->turb_mesoz > 0))
6579 module_diff_meso(ctl, cache, *met0, *met1, atm);
6580
6581 /* Diffusion... */
6582 if (ctl->diffusion == 2)
6583 module_diff_pbl(ctl, cache, *met0, *met1, atm);
6584
6585 /* Convection... */
6586 if ((ctl->conv_mix_pbl || ctl->conv_cape >= 0)
6587 && (ctl->conv_dt <= 0 || fmod(t, ctl->conv_dt) == 0))
6588 module_convection(ctl, cache, *met0, *met1, atm);
6589
6590 /* Sedimentation... */
6591 if (ctl->qnt_rp >= 0 && ctl->qnt_rhop >= 0)
6592 module_sedi(ctl, cache, *met0, *met1, atm);
6593
6594 /* Isosurface... */
6595 if (ctl->isosurf >= 1 && ctl->isosurf <= 4)
6596 module_isosurf(ctl, cache, *met0, *met1, atm);
6597
6598 /* Check positions (final)... */
6599 module_position(cache, *met0, *met1, atm);
6600
6601 /* Interpolate meteo data... */
6602 if (ctl->met_dt_out > 0
6603 && (ctl->met_dt_out < ctl->dt_mod || fmod(t, ctl->met_dt_out) == 0))
6604 module_meteo(ctl, cache, clim, *met0, *met1, atm);
6605
6606 /* Check boundary conditions (initial)... */
6607 if ((ctl->bound_lat0 < ctl->bound_lat1)
6608 && (ctl->bound_p0 > ctl->bound_p1))
6609 module_bound_cond(ctl, cache, clim, *met0, *met1, atm);
6610
6611 /* Initialize quantity of total loss rate... */
6612 if (ctl->qnt_loss_rate >= 0) {
6613 PARTICLE_LOOP(0, atm->np, 1, "acc data present(ctl,atm)") {
6614 atm->q[ctl->qnt_loss_rate][ip] = 0;
6615 }
6616 }
6617
6618 /* Decay of particle mass... */
6619 if (ctl->tdec_trop > 0 && ctl->tdec_strat > 0)
6620 module_decay(ctl, cache, clim, atm);
6621
6622 /* Interparcel mixing... */
6623 if (ctl->mixing_trop >= 0 && ctl->mixing_strat >= 0
6624 && (ctl->mixing_dt <= 0 || fmod(t, ctl->mixing_dt) == 0))
6625 module_mixing(ctl, clim, atm, t);
6626
6627 /* Calculate the tracer vmr in the chemistry grid... */
6628 if (ctl->oh_chem_reaction != 0 || ctl->h2o2_chem_reaction != 0
6629 || (ctl->kpp_chem && fmod(t, ctl->dt_kpp) == 0))
6630 module_chem_grid(ctl, *met0, *met1, atm, t);
6631
6632 /* OH chemistry... */
6633 if (ctl->oh_chem_reaction != 0)
6634 module_oh_chem(ctl, cache, clim, *met0, *met1, atm);
6635
6636 /* H2O2 chemistry (for SO2 aqueous phase oxidation)... */
6637 if (ctl->h2o2_chem_reaction != 0)
6638 module_h2o2_chem(ctl, cache, clim, *met0, *met1, atm);
6639
6640 /* First-order tracer chemistry... */
6641 if (ctl->tracer_chem)
6642 module_tracer_chem(ctl, cache, clim, *met0, *met1, atm);
6643
6644 /* Domain decomposition... */
6645 if (dd->init) {
6646#ifdef DD
6647 module_dd(ctl, atm, cache, dd, met0);
6648#else
6649 ERRMSG("DD initialized, but model is compiled without DD.")
6650#endif
6651 }
6652
6653 /* KPP chemistry... */
6654 if (ctl->kpp_chem && fmod(t, ctl->dt_kpp) == 0) {
6655#ifdef KPP
6656 module_kpp_chem(ctl, cache, clim, *met0, *met1, atm);
6657#else
6658 ERRMSG("Code was compiled without KPP!");
6659#endif
6660 }
6661
6662 /* Wet deposition... */
6663 if ((ctl->wet_depo_ic_a > 0 || ctl->wet_depo_ic_h[0] > 0)
6664 && (ctl->wet_depo_bc_a > 0 || ctl->wet_depo_bc_h[0] > 0))
6665 module_wet_depo(ctl, cache, *met0, *met1, atm);
6666
6667 /* Dry deposition... */
6668 if (ctl->dry_depo_vdep > 0)
6669 module_dry_depo(ctl, cache, *met0, *met1, atm);
6670
6671 /* Check boundary conditions (final)... */
6672 if ((ctl->bound_lat0 < ctl->bound_lat1)
6673 && (ctl->bound_p0 > ctl->bound_p1))
6674 module_bound_cond(ctl, cache, clim, *met0, *met1, atm);
6675}
6676
6677/*****************************************************************************/
6678
6679void mptrac_update_device(
6680 const ctl_t *ctl,
6681 const cache_t *cache,
6682 const clim_t *clim,
6683 met_t **met0,
6684 met_t **met1,
6685 const atm_t *atm) {
6686
6687 /* Update GPU... */
6688 if (ctl != NULL) {
6689#ifdef _OPENACC
6690 SELECT_TIMER("UPDATE_DEVICE", "MEMORY", NVTX_H2D);
6691#pragma acc update device(ctl[:1])
6692#endif
6693 }
6694
6695 if (cache != NULL) {
6696#ifdef _OPENACC
6697 SELECT_TIMER("UPDATE_DEVICE", "MEMORY", NVTX_H2D);
6698#pragma acc update device(cache[:1])
6699#endif
6700 }
6701
6702 if (clim != NULL) {
6703#ifdef _OPENACC
6704 SELECT_TIMER("UPDATE_DEVICE", "MEMORY", NVTX_H2D);
6705#pragma acc update device(clim[:1])
6706#endif
6707 }
6708
6709 if (met0 != NULL) {
6710#ifdef _OPENACC
6711 SELECT_TIMER("UPDATE_DEVICE", "MEMORY", NVTX_H2D);
6712 met_t *met0up = *met0;
6713#pragma acc update device(met0up[:1])
6714#endif
6715 }
6716
6717 if (met1 != NULL) {
6718#ifdef _OPENACC
6719 SELECT_TIMER("UPDATE_DEVICE", "MEMORY", NVTX_H2D);
6720 met_t *met1up = *met1;
6721#pragma acc update device(met1up[:1])
6722#endif
6723 }
6724
6725 if (atm != NULL) {
6726#ifdef _OPENACC
6727 SELECT_TIMER("UPDATE_DEVICE", "MEMORY", NVTX_H2D);
6728#pragma acc update device(atm[:1])
6729#endif
6730 }
6731}
6732
6733/*****************************************************************************/
6734
6735void mptrac_update_host(
6736 const ctl_t *ctl,
6737 const cache_t *cache,
6738 const clim_t *clim,
6739 met_t **met0,
6740 met_t **met1,
6741 const atm_t *atm) {
6742
6743 /* Update GPU... */
6744 if (ctl != NULL) {
6745#ifdef _OPENACC
6746 SELECT_TIMER("UPDATE_HOST", "MEMORY", NVTX_H2D);
6747#pragma acc update host(ctl[:1])
6748#endif
6749 }
6750
6751 if (cache != NULL) {
6752#ifdef _OPENACC
6753 SELECT_TIMER("UPDATE_HOST", "MEMORY", NVTX_H2D);
6754#pragma acc update host(cache[:1])
6755#endif
6756 }
6757
6758 if (clim != NULL) {
6759#ifdef _OPENACC
6760 SELECT_TIMER("UPDATE_HOST", "MEMORY", NVTX_H2D);
6761#pragma acc update host(clim[:1])
6762#endif
6763 }
6764
6765 if (met0 != NULL) {
6766#ifdef _OPENACC
6767 SELECT_TIMER("UPDATE_DEVICE", "MEMORY", NVTX_H2D);
6768 met_t *met0up = *met0;
6769#pragma acc update host(met0up[:1])
6770#endif
6771 }
6772
6773 if (met1 != NULL) {
6774#ifdef _OPENACC
6775 SELECT_TIMER("UPDATE_DEVICE", "MEMORY", NVTX_H2D);
6776 met_t *met1up = *met1;
6777#pragma acc update host(met1up[:1])
6778#endif
6779 }
6780
6781 if (atm != NULL) {
6782#ifdef _OPENACC
6783 SELECT_TIMER("UPDATE_HOST", "MEMORY", NVTX_H2D);
6784#pragma acc update host(atm[:1])
6785#endif
6786 }
6787}
6788
6789/*****************************************************************************/
6790
6791void mptrac_write_atm(
6792 const char *filename,
6793 const ctl_t *ctl,
6794 const atm_t *atm,
6795 const double t) {
6796
6797 /* Set timer... */
6798 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_ATM", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
6799
6800 /* Write info... */
6801 LOG(1, "Write atmospheric data: %s", filename);
6802
6803 /* Write ASCII data... */
6804 if (ctl->atm_type_out == 0)
6805 write_atm_asc(filename, ctl, atm, t);
6806
6807 /* Write binary data... */
6808 else if (ctl->atm_type_out == 1)
6809 write_atm_bin(filename, ctl, atm);
6810
6811 /* Write netCDF data... */
6812 else if (ctl->atm_type_out == 2)
6813 write_atm_nc(filename, ctl, atm);
6814
6815 /* Write CLaMS trajectory data... */
6816 else if (ctl->atm_type_out == 3)
6817 write_atm_clams_traj(filename, ctl, atm, t);
6818
6819 /* Write CLaMS pos data... */
6820 else if (ctl->atm_type_out == 4)
6821 write_atm_clams(filename, ctl, atm);
6822
6823 /* Error... */
6824 else
6825 ERRMSG("Atmospheric data type not supported!");
6826
6827 /* Write info... */
6828 double mini, maxi;
6829 LOG(2, "Number of particles: %d", atm->np);
6830 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, atm->time, 1, (size_t) atm->np);
6831 LOG(2, "Time range: %.2f ... %.2f s", mini, maxi);
6832 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, atm->p, 1, (size_t) atm->np);
6833 LOG(2, "Altitude range: %g ... %g km", Z(maxi), Z(mini));
6834 LOG(2, "Pressure range: %g ... %g hPa", maxi, mini);
6835 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, atm->lon, 1, (size_t) atm->np);
6836 LOG(2, "Longitude range: %g ... %g deg", mini, maxi);
6837 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, atm->lat, 1, (size_t) atm->np);
6838 LOG(2, "Latitude range: %g ... %g deg", mini, maxi);
6839 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
6840 char msg[5 * LEN];
6841 sprintf(msg, "Quantity %s range: %s ... %s %s",
6842 ctl->qnt_name[iq], ctl->qnt_format[iq],
6843 ctl->qnt_format[iq], ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
6844 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, atm->q[iq], 1, (size_t) atm->np);
6845 LOG(2, msg, mini, maxi);
6846 }
6847}
6848
6849/*****************************************************************************/
6850
6851void mptrac_write_met(
6852 const char *filename,
6853 const ctl_t *ctl,
6854 met_t *met) {
6855
6856 /* Set timer... */
6857 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_MET", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
6858
6859 /* Write info... */
6860 LOG(1, "Write meteo data: %s", filename);
6861
6862 /* Check compression flags... */
6863#ifndef ZFP
6864 if (ctl->met_type == 3)
6865 ERRMSG("MPTRAC was compiled without ZFP compression!");
6866#endif
6867#ifndef ZSTD
6868 if (ctl->met_type == 4)
6869 ERRMSG("MPTRAC was compiled without ZSTD compression!");
6870#endif
6871#ifndef CMS
6872 if (ctl->met_type == 5)
6873 ERRMSG("MPTRAC was compiled without cmultiscale compression!");
6874#endif
6875#ifndef SZ3
6876 if (ctl->met_type == 7)
6877 ERRMSG("MPTRAC was compiled without SZ3 compression!");
6878#endif
6879
6880 /* Write netCDF data... */
6881 if (ctl->met_type == 0)
6882 write_met_nc(filename, ctl, met);
6883
6884 /* Write binary data... */
6885 else if (ctl->met_type >= 1 && ctl->met_type <= 7)
6886 write_met_bin(filename, ctl, met);
6887
6888 /* Not implemented... */
6889 else
6890 ERRMSG("MET_TYPE not implemented!");
6891}
6892
6893/*****************************************************************************/
6894
6895void mptrac_write_output(
6896 const char *dirname,
6897 const ctl_t *ctl,
6898 met_t *met0,
6899 met_t *met1,
6900 atm_t *atm,
6901 const double t) {
6902
6903 char ext[10], filename[2 * LEN];
6904
6905 double r;
6906
6907 int year, mon, day, hour, min, sec;
6908
6909 /* Get time... */
6910 jsec2time(t, &year, &mon, &day, &hour, &min, &sec, &r);
6911
6912 /* Update host... */
6913 if ((ctl->atm_basename[0] != '-' && fmod(t, ctl->atm_dt_out) == 0)
6914 || (ctl->grid_basename[0] != '-' && fmod(t, ctl->grid_dt_out) == 0)
6915 || (ctl->ens_basename[0] != '-' && fmod(t, ctl->ens_dt_out) == 0)
6916 || ctl->csi_basename[0] != '-' || ctl->prof_basename[0] != '-'
6917 || ctl->sample_basename[0] != '-' || ctl->stat_basename[0] != '-'
6918 || (ctl->vtk_basename[0] != '-' && fmod(t, ctl->vtk_dt_out) == 0))
6919 mptrac_update_host(NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, atm);
6920
6921 /* Write atmospheric data... */
6922 if (ctl->atm_basename[0] != '-' &&
6923 (fmod(t, ctl->atm_dt_out) == 0 || t == ctl->t_stop)) {
6924 if (ctl->atm_type_out == 0)
6925 sprintf(ext, "tab");
6926 else if (ctl->atm_type_out == 1)
6927 sprintf(ext, "bin");
6928 else if (ctl->atm_type_out == 2)
6929 sprintf(ext, "nc");
6930 sprintf(filename, "%s/%s_%04d_%02d_%02d_%02d_%02d.%s",
6931 dirname, ctl->atm_basename, year, mon, day, hour, min, ext);
6932 mptrac_write_atm(filename, ctl, atm, t);
6933 }
6934
6935 /* Write gridded data... */
6936 if (ctl->grid_basename[0] != '-' && fmod(t, ctl->grid_dt_out) == 0) {
6937 sprintf(filename, "%s/%s_%04d_%02d_%02d_%02d_%02d.%s",
6938 dirname, ctl->grid_basename, year, mon, day, hour, min,
6939 ctl->grid_type == 0 ? "tab" : "nc");
6940 write_grid(filename, ctl, met0, met1, atm, t);
6941 }
6942
6943 /* Write CSI data... */
6944 if (ctl->csi_basename[0] != '-') {
6945 sprintf(filename, "%s/%s.tab", dirname, ctl->csi_basename);
6946 write_csi(filename, ctl, atm, t);
6947 }
6948
6949 /* Write ensemble data... */
6950 if (ctl->ens_basename[0] != '-' && fmod(t, ctl->ens_dt_out) == 0) {
6951 sprintf(filename, "%s/%s_%04d_%02d_%02d_%02d_%02d.tab",
6952 dirname, ctl->ens_basename, year, mon, day, hour, min);
6953 write_ens(filename, ctl, atm, t);
6954 }
6955
6956 /* Write profile data... */
6957 if (ctl->prof_basename[0] != '-') {
6958 sprintf(filename, "%s/%s.tab", dirname, ctl->prof_basename);
6959 write_prof(filename, ctl, met0, met1, atm, t);
6960 }
6961
6962 /* Write sample data... */
6963 if (ctl->sample_basename[0] != '-') {
6964 sprintf(filename, "%s/%s.tab", dirname, ctl->sample_basename);
6965 write_sample(filename, ctl, met0, met1, atm, t);
6966 }
6967
6968 /* Write station data... */
6969 if (ctl->stat_basename[0] != '-') {
6970 sprintf(filename, "%s/%s.tab", dirname, ctl->stat_basename);
6971 write_station(filename, ctl, atm, t);
6972 }
6973
6974 /* Write VTK data... */
6975 if (ctl->vtk_basename[0] != '-' && fmod(t, ctl->vtk_dt_out) == 0) {
6976 static int nvtk;
6977 if (t == ctl->t_start)
6978 nvtk = 0;
6979 sprintf(filename, "%s/%s_%05d.vtk", dirname, ctl->vtk_basename, ++nvtk);
6980 write_vtk(filename, ctl, atm, t);
6981 }
6982}
6983
6984/*****************************************************************************/
6985
6986double nat_temperature(
6987 const double p,
6988 const double h2o,
6989 const double hno3) {
6990
6991 /* Check water vapor volume mixing ratio... */
6992 const double h2o_help = MAX(h2o, 0.1e-6);
6993
6994 /* Calculate T_NAT... */
6995 const double p_hno3 = hno3 * p / 1.333224;
6996 const double p_h2o = h2o_help * p / 1.333224;
6997 const double a = 0.009179 - 0.00088 * log10(p_h2o);
6998 const double b = (38.9855 - log10(p_hno3) - 2.7836 * log10(p_h2o)) / a;
6999 const double c = -11397.0 / a;
7000 double tnat = (-b + sqrt(b * b - 4. * c)) / 2.;
7001 double x2 = (-b - sqrt(b * b - 4. * c)) / 2.;
7002 if (x2 > 0)
7003 tnat = x2;
7004
7005 return tnat;
7006}
7007
7008/*****************************************************************************/
7009
7010double pbl_weight(
7011 const ctl_t *ctl,
7012 const atm_t *atm,
7013 const int ip,
7014 const double pbl,
7015 const double ps) {
7016
7017 /* Get pressure range... */
7018 const double p1 = pbl - ctl->conv_pbl_trans * (ps - pbl);
7019 const double p0 = pbl;
7020
7021 /* Get weighting factor... */
7022 if (atm->p[ip] > p0)
7023 return 1;
7024 else if (atm->p[ip] < p1)
7025 return 0;
7026 else
7027 return LIN(p0, 1.0, p1, 0.0, atm->p[ip]);
7028}
7029
7030/*****************************************************************************/
7031
7032int read_atm_asc(
7033 const char *filename,
7034 const ctl_t *ctl,
7035 atm_t *atm) {
7036
7037 /* Open file... */
7038 FILE *in;
7039 if (!(in = fopen(filename, "r"))) {
7040 WARN("Cannot open file!");
7041 return 0;
7042 }
7043
7044 /* Read line... */
7045 char line[LEN];
7046 while (fgets(line, LEN, in)) {
7047
7048 /* Read data... */
7049 char *tok;
7050 TOK(line, tok, "%lg", atm->time[atm->np]);
7051 TOK(NULL, tok, "%lg", atm->p[atm->np]);
7052 TOK(NULL, tok, "%lg", atm->lon[atm->np]);
7053 TOK(NULL, tok, "%lg", atm->lat[atm->np]);
7054 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
7055 TOK(NULL, tok, "%lg", atm->q[iq][atm->np]);
7056
7057 /* Convert altitude to pressure... */
7058 atm->p[atm->np] = P(atm->p[atm->np]);
7059
7060 /* Increment data point counter... */
7061 if ((++atm->np) > NP)
7062 ERRMSG("Too many data points!");
7063 }
7064
7065 /* Close file... */
7066 fclose(in);
7067
7068 /* Return success... */
7069 return 1;
7070}
7071
7072/*****************************************************************************/
7073
7074int read_atm_bin(
7075 const char *filename,
7076 const ctl_t *ctl,
7077 atm_t *atm) {
7078
7079 /* Open file... */
7080 FILE *in;
7081 if (!(in = fopen(filename, "r")))
7082 return 0;
7083
7084 /* Check version of binary data... */
7085 int version;
7086 FREAD(&version, int,
7087 1,
7088 in);
7089 if (version != 100)
7090 ERRMSG("Wrong version of binary data!");
7091
7092 /* Read data... */
7093 FREAD(&atm->np, int,
7094 1,
7095 in);
7096 FREAD(atm->time, double,
7097 (size_t) atm->np,
7098 in);
7099 FREAD(atm->p, double,
7100 (size_t) atm->np,
7101 in);
7102 FREAD(atm->lon, double,
7103 (size_t) atm->np,
7104 in);
7105 FREAD(atm->lat, double,
7106 (size_t) atm->np,
7107 in);
7108 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
7109 FREAD(atm->q[iq], double,
7110 (size_t) atm->np,
7111 in);
7112
7113 /* Read final flag... */
7114 int final;
7115 FREAD(&final, int,
7116 1,
7117 in);
7118 if (final != 999)
7119 ERRMSG("Error while reading binary data!");
7120
7121 /* Close file... */
7122 fclose(in);
7123
7124 /* Return success... */
7125 return 1;
7126}
7127
7128/*****************************************************************************/
7129
7130int read_atm_clams(
7131 const char *filename,
7132 const ctl_t *ctl,
7133 atm_t *atm) {
7134
7135 int ncid, varid;
7136
7137 /* Open file... */
7138 if (nc_open(filename, NC_NOWRITE, &ncid) != NC_NOERR)
7139 return 0;
7140
7141 /* Get dimensions... */
7142 NC_INQ_DIM("NPARTS", &atm->np, 1, NP, 1);
7143
7144 /* Get time... */
7145 if (nc_inq_varid(ncid, "TIME_INIT", &varid) == NC_NOERR) {
7146 NC(nc_get_var_double(ncid, varid, atm->time));
7147 } else {
7148 WARN("TIME_INIT not found use time instead!");
7149 double time_init;
7150 NC_GET_DOUBLE("time", &time_init, 1);
7151 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip++) {
7152 atm->time[ip] = time_init;
7153 }
7154 }
7155
7156 /* Read zeta coordinate, pressure is optional... */
7157 if (ctl->advect_vert_coord == 1) {
7158 NC_GET_DOUBLE("ZETA", atm->q[ctl->qnt_zeta], 1);
7159 NC_GET_DOUBLE("PRESS", atm->p, 0);
7160 }
7161
7162 /* Read pressure, zeta coordinate is optional... */
7163 else {
7164 if (nc_inq_varid(ncid, "PRESS_INIT", &varid) == NC_NOERR) {
7165 NC(nc_get_var_double(ncid, varid, atm->p));
7166 } else {
7167 WARN("PRESS_INIT not found use PRESS instead!");
7168 nc_inq_varid(ncid, "PRESS", &varid);
7169 NC(nc_get_var_double(ncid, varid, atm->p));
7170 }
7171 }
7172
7173 /* Read further quantities if requested... */
7174 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
7175 NC_GET_DOUBLE(ctl->qnt_name[iq], atm->q[iq], 0);
7176
7177 /* Read longitude and latitude... */
7178 NC_GET_DOUBLE("LON", atm->lon, 1);
7179 NC_GET_DOUBLE("LAT", atm->lat, 1);
7180
7181 /* Close file... */
7182 NC(nc_close(ncid));
7183
7184 /* Return success... */
7185 return 1;
7186}
7187
7188/*****************************************************************************/
7189
7190int read_atm_nc(
7191 const char *filename,
7192 const ctl_t *ctl,
7193 atm_t *atm) {
7194
7195 int ncid, varid;
7196
7197 /* Open file... */
7198 if (nc_open(filename, NC_NOWRITE, &ncid) != NC_NOERR)
7199 return 0;
7200
7201 /* Get dimensions... */
7202 NC_INQ_DIM("obs", &atm->np, 1, NP, 1);
7203
7204 /* Read geolocations... */
7205 NC_GET_DOUBLE("time", atm->time, 1);
7206 NC_GET_DOUBLE("press", atm->p, 1);
7207 NC_GET_DOUBLE("lon", atm->lon, 1);
7208 NC_GET_DOUBLE("lat", atm->lat, 1);
7209
7210 /* Read variables... */
7211 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
7212 NC_GET_DOUBLE(ctl->qnt_name[iq], atm->q[iq], 0);
7213
7214 /* Close file... */
7215 NC(nc_close(ncid));
7216
7217 /* Return success... */
7218 return 1;
7219}
7220
7221/*****************************************************************************/
7222
7223void read_clim_photo(
7224 const char *filename,
7225 clim_photo_t *photo) {
7226
7227 int ncid, varid;
7228
7229 /* Write info... */
7230 LOG(1, "Read photolysis rates: %s", filename);
7231
7232 /* Open netCDF file... */
7233 if (nc_open(filename, NC_NOWRITE, &ncid) != NC_NOERR) {
7234 WARN("Photolysis rate data are missing!");
7235 return;
7236 }
7237
7238 /* Read pressure data... */
7239 NC_INQ_DIM("press", &photo->np, 2, CP, 1);
7240 NC_GET_DOUBLE("press", photo->p, 1);
7241 if (photo->p[0] < photo->p[1])
7242 ERRMSG("Pressure data are not descending!");
7243
7244 /* Read total column ozone data... */
7245 NC_INQ_DIM("total_o3col", &photo->no3c, 2, CO3, 1);
7246 NC_GET_DOUBLE("total_o3col", photo->o3c, 1);
7247 if (photo->o3c[0] > photo->o3c[1])
7248 ERRMSG("Total column ozone data are not ascending!");
7249
7250 /* Read solar zenith angle data... */
7251 NC_INQ_DIM("sza", &photo->nsza, 2, CSZA, 1);
7252 NC_GET_DOUBLE("sza", photo->sza, 1);
7253 if (photo->sza[0] > photo->sza[1])
7254 ERRMSG("Solar zenith angle data are not ascending!");
7255
7256 /* Read data... */
7257 read_clim_photo_help(ncid, "J_N2O", photo, photo->n2o);
7258 read_clim_photo_help(ncid, "J_CCl4", photo, photo->ccl4);
7259 read_clim_photo_help(ncid, "J_CFC-11", photo, photo->ccl3f);
