9727 /* Copy pressure profile... */
9728 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++)
9729 p[ip] = met->pl[ix][iy][ip];
9730
9731 /* Interpolate... */
9732 for (int ip = 0; ip < ctl->met_np; ip++) {
9733 double pt = ctl->met_p[ip];
9734 if ((pt > p[0] && p[0] > p[1]) || (pt < p[0] && p[0] < p[1]))
9735 pt = p[0];
9736 else if ((pt > p[met->np - 1] && p[1] > p[0])
9737 || (pt < p[met->np - 1] && p[1] < p[0]))
9738 pt = p[met->np - 1];
9739 const int ip2 = locate_irr(p, met->np, pt);
9740 aux[ip] = LIN(p[ip2], var[ix][iy][ip2],
9741 p[ip2 + 1], var[ix][iy][ip2 + 1], pt);
9742 }
9743
9744 /* Copy data... */
9745 for (int ip = 0; ip < ctl->met_np; ip++)
9746 var[ix][iy][ip] = (float) aux[ip];
9747 }
9748}
9749
9750/*****************************************************************************/
9751
9752void read_met_monotonize(
9753 const ctl_t *ctl,
9754 met_t *met) {
9755
9756 /* Check parameters... */
9757 if (ctl->advect_vert_coord != 1)
9758 return;
9759
9760 /* Set timer... */
9761 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_MONOTONIZE", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
9762 LOG(2, "Make zeta profiles monotone...");
9763
9764 /* Create monotone zeta profiles... */
9765#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
9766 for (int i = 0; i < met->nx; i++)
9767 for (int j = 0; j < met->ny; j++) {
9768 int k = 1;
9769
9770 while (k < met->npl) { /* Check if there is an inversion at level k... */
9771 if ((met->zetal[i][j][k - 1] >= met->zetal[i][j][k])) {
9772 /* Find the upper level k+l over the inversion... */
9773 int l = 0;
9774 do {
9775 l++;
9776 }
9777 while ((met->zetal[i][j][k - 1] >=
9778 met->zetal[i][j][k + l]) & (k + l < met->npl));
9779
9780 /* Interpolate linear between the top and bottom
9781 of the inversion... */
9782 float s =
9783 (float) (met->zetal[i][j][k + l] - met->zetal[i][j][k - 1])
9784 / (float) (met->hybrid[k + l] - met->hybrid[k - 1]);
9785
9786 for (int m = k; m < k + l; m++) {
9787 float d = (float) (met->hybrid[m] - met->hybrid[k - 1]);
9788 met->zetal[i][j][m] = s * d + met->zetal[i][j][k - 1];
9789 }
9790
9791 /* Search for more inversions above the last inversion ... */
9792 k = k + l;
9793 } else {
9794 k++;
9795 }
9796 }
9797 }
9798
9799 /* Create monotone pressure profiles... */
9800#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
9801 for (int i = 0; i < met->nx; i++)
9802 for (int j = 0; j < met->ny; j++) {
9803 int k = 1;
9804
9805 while (k < met->npl) { /* Check if there is an inversion at level k... */
9806 if ((met->pl[i][j][k - 1] <= met->pl[i][j][k])) {
9807
9808 /* Find the upper level k+l over the inversion... */
9809 int l = 0;
9810 do {
9811 l++;
9812 }
9813 while ((met->pl[i][j][k - 1] <= met->pl[i][j][k + l]) & (k + l <
9814 met->npl));
9815
9816 /* Interpolate linear between the top and bottom
9817 of the inversion... */
9818 float s = (float) (met->pl[i][j][k + l] - met->pl[i][j][k - 1])
9819 / (float) (met->hybrid[k + l] - met->hybrid[k - 1]);
9820
9821 for (int m = k; m < k + l; m++) {
9822 float d = (float) (met->hybrid[m] - met->hybrid[k - 1]);
9823 met->pl[i][j][m] = s * d + met->pl[i][j][k - 1];
9824 }
9825
9826 /* Search for more inversions above the last inversion ... */
9827 k += l;
9828 } else {
9829 k++;
9830 }
9831 }
9832 }
9833}
9834
9835/*****************************************************************************/
9836
9837int read_met_nc(
9838 const char *filename,
9839 const ctl_t *ctl,
9840 met_t *met,
9841 dd_t *dd) {
9842
9843 int ncid;
9844
9845 /* Open file... */
9846#ifdef DD
9847 if (ctl->dd) {
9848 NC(nc_open_par
9849 (filename, NC_NOWRITE | NC_SHARE, MPI_COMM_WORLD, MPI_INFO_NULL,
9850 &ncid))
9851 }
9852#else
9853 if (nc_open(filename, NC_NOWRITE, &ncid) != NC_NOERR) {
9854 WARN("Cannot open file!");
9855 return 0;
9856 }
9857#endif
9858
9859 /* Read coordinates of meteo data... */
9860 read_met_nc_grid(filename, ncid, ctl, met, dd);
9861
9862 /* Read surface data... */
9863 read_met_nc_surface(ncid, ctl, met, dd);
9864
9865 /* Read meteo data on vertical levels... */
9866 read_met_nc_levels(ncid, ctl, met, dd);
9867
9868 /* Close file... */
9869 NC(nc_close(ncid));
9870
9871 /* Return success... */
9872 return 1;
9873}
9874
9875/*****************************************************************************/
9876
9877void read_met_nc_grid_dd_naive(
9878 dd_t *dd,
9879 const ctl_t *ctl,
9880 met_t *met,
9881 const int ncid) {
9882
9883 int varid;
9884
9885 /* Get the MPI information... */
9886#ifdef MPI
9887 MPI_Comm_rank(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &dd->rank);
9888 MPI_Comm_size(MPI_COMM_WORLD, &dd->size);
9889#endif
9890
9891 int help_nx_glob;
9892 int help_ny_glob;
9893
9894 /* Get grid dimensions... */
9895 NC_INQ_DIM("lon", &help_nx_glob, 0, 0, 0);
9896 LOG(2, "Number of longitudes: %d", help_nx_glob);
9897 met->nx = (int) floor(help_nx_glob / ctl->dd_subdomains_zonal);
9898
9899 NC_INQ_DIM("lat", &help_ny_glob, 0, 0, 0);
9900 LOG(2, "Number of latitudes: %d", help_ny_glob);
9901 met->ny = (int) floor(help_ny_glob / ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional);
9902
9903 double *help_lon_glob;
9904 double *help_lat_glob;
9905 ALLOC(help_lon_glob, double,
9906 help_nx_glob);
9907 ALLOC(help_lat_glob, double,
9908 help_ny_glob);
9909
9910 /* Read global longitudes and latitudes... */
9911 NC_GET_DOUBLE("lon", help_lon_glob, 1);
9912 LOG(2, "Longitudes: %g, %g ... %g deg",
9913 help_lon_glob[0], help_lon_glob[1], help_lon_glob[help_nx_glob - 1]);
9914 NC_GET_DOUBLE("lat", help_lat_glob, 1);
9915 LOG(2, "Latitudes: %g, %g ... %g deg",
9916 help_lat_glob[0], help_lat_glob[1], help_lat_glob[help_ny_glob - 1]);
9917
9918 /* Determine hyperslabs for reading the data in parallel... */
9919
9920 /* Check for edge cases... */
9921 int left = (dd->rank <= ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional - 1);
9922 int right = (dd->rank >= dd->size - ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional);
9923 int top = (dd->rank % ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional == 0);
9924 int bottom =
9925 (dd->rank % ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional ==
9926 ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional - 1);
9927
9928 /* Set the hyperslab for the subdomain... */
9929 dd->subdomain_start[0] = 0;
9930 dd->subdomain_start[1] = 0;
9931 dd->subdomain_start[2] =
9932 (size_t) ((dd->rank % ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional) * met->ny);
9933 dd->subdomain_start[3] =
9934 (size_t) (floor(dd->rank / ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional) * met->nx);
9935
9936 /* Extend subdomains at the right and bottom to fit the full domain. */
9937 if (right) {
9938 int gap = help_nx_glob - ctl->dd_subdomains_zonal * met->nx;
9939 if (gap > 0) {
9940 met->nx = met->nx + gap;
9941 WARN("Extended subdomains at the right to fit to full domain.");
9942 }
9943 }
9944 if (bottom) {
9945 int gap = help_ny_glob - ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional * met->ny;
9946 if (gap > 0) {
9947 met->ny = met->ny + gap;
9948 WARN("Extended subdomains at the bottom to fit to full domain.");
9949 }
9950 }
9951
9952 /* Block-size, i.e. count */
9953 dd->subdomain_count[0] = 1;
9954 dd->subdomain_count[1] = (size_t) met->np;
9955 dd->subdomain_count[2] = (size_t) met->ny;
9956 dd->subdomain_count[3] = (size_t) met->nx;
9957
9958 /* Create halos and include them into the subdomain... */
9959 if (!left && !right) {
9960 // If we are not at the left or right edge extend in zonal direction...
9961 // Move the start one point to the left...
9962 dd->subdomain_count[3] =
9963 dd->subdomain_count[3] + (size_t) (ctl->dd_halos_size * 2);
9964 dd->subdomain_start[3] =
9965 dd->subdomain_start[3] - (size_t) ctl->dd_halos_size;
9966 } else {
9967 // If we are at the left or right edge, extend only in one zonal direction...
9968 dd->subdomain_count[3] =
9969 dd->subdomain_count[3] + (size_t) ctl->dd_halos_size;
9970 if (!left)
9971 // If we are not at the left edge, move the start to the left...
9972 dd->subdomain_start[3] =
9973 dd->subdomain_start[3] - (size_t) ctl->dd_halos_size;
9974 }
9975
9976 if (!top && !bottom) {
9977 // If we are not at the upper or lower edge extend in meridional direction...
9978 // Move the start point one point down...
9979 dd->subdomain_count[2] =
9980 dd->subdomain_count[2] + (size_t) (ctl->dd_halos_size * 2);
9981 dd->subdomain_start[2] =
9982 dd->subdomain_start[2] - (size_t) ctl->dd_halos_size;
9983 } else {
9984 // If we are at the top or the lower edge only extend in one mer. direction...
9985 dd->subdomain_count[2] =
9986 dd->subdomain_count[2] + (size_t) ctl->dd_halos_size;
9987 if (!top)
9988 // If we are not at the top, move the start one upward...
9989 dd->subdomain_start[2] =
9990 dd->subdomain_start[2] - (size_t) ctl->dd_halos_size;
9991 }
9992
9993 /* Set boundary halo hyperslabs ... */
9994 double lon_shift = 0;
9995 if (left || right) {
9996
9997 met->nx = met->nx + ctl->dd_halos_size;
9998
9999 dd->halo_bnd_start[0] = 0;
10000 dd->halo_bnd_start[1] = 0;
10001 dd->halo_bnd_start[3] = (size_t) (left ? (help_nx_glob - ctl->dd_halos_size) : (0)); //x
10002 dd->halo_bnd_start[2] = dd->subdomain_start[2]; //y
10003
10004 dd->halo_bnd_count[0] = 1;
10005 dd->halo_bnd_count[1] = (size_t) met->np;
10006 dd->halo_bnd_count[3] = (size_t) ctl->dd_halos_size;
10007 dd->halo_bnd_count[2] =
10008 (size_t) met->ny +
10009 (size_t) ctl->dd_halos_size * ((top || bottom) ? 1 : 2);
10010
10011 dd->halo_offset_start = (left ? (int) dd->halo_bnd_count[3] : 0);
10012 dd->halo_offset_end = (left ? 0 : (int) dd->subdomain_count[3]);
10013 lon_shift = (left ? -360 : 360);
10014
10015 } else {
10016
10017 dd->halo_bnd_start[0] = 0;
10018 dd->halo_bnd_start[1] = 0;
10019 dd->halo_bnd_start[3] = 0;
10020 dd->halo_bnd_start[2] = 0;
10021
10022 dd->halo_bnd_count[0] = 0;
10023 dd->halo_bnd_count[1] = 0;
10024 dd->halo_bnd_count[3] = 0;
10025 dd->halo_bnd_count[2] = 0;
10026 }
10027
10028 /* Get the range of the entire meteodata... */
10029 /* Handle both periodic (global) and non-periodic (regional) longitude grids */
10030 double lon_range = 360;
10031 //if (dd_is_periodic_longitude(met, help_nx_glob)) {
10032 /* For global grids with periodic boundaries, use full 360 degrees */
10033 //lon_range = 360.0;
10034 //LOG(3, "Detected periodic longitude boundaries, using lon_range = 360.0");
10035 //} else {
10036 /* For regional grids, use the actual data range */
10037 //lon_range = help_lon_glob[help_nx_glob - 1] - help_lon_glob[0];
10038 //LOG(3, "Detected non-periodic longitude boundaries, using lon_range = %g", lon_range);
10039 //}
10040
10041 double lat_range = help_lat_glob[help_ny_glob - 1] - help_lat_glob[0];
10042
10043 /* Focus on subdomain latitudes and longitudes... */
10044 for (int iy = 0; iy < (int) dd->subdomain_count[2]; iy++)
10045 met->lat[iy] = help_lat_glob[(int) dd->subdomain_start[2] + iy];
10046
10047 /* Focus on subdomain longitudes... */
10048 /* Keep space at the beginning or end of the array for halo... */
10049 for (int ix = 0; ix < (int) dd->subdomain_count[3]; ix++)
10050 met->lon[ix + dd->halo_offset_start] =
10051 help_lon_glob[(int) dd->subdomain_start[3] + ix];
10052
10053 for (int ix = 0; ix < (int) dd->halo_bnd_count[3]; ix++)
10054 met->lon[ix + dd->halo_offset_end] =
10055 help_lon_glob[(int) dd->halo_bnd_start[3] + ix] + lon_shift;
10056
10057 /* Reset the grid dimensions... */
10058 met->nx = (int) dd->subdomain_count[3] + (int) dd->halo_bnd_count[3];
10059 met->ny = (int) dd->subdomain_count[2];
10060
10061 /* Determine subdomain edges... */
10062 dd->subdomain_lon_min = floor(dd->rank / ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional)
10063 * (lon_range) / (double) ctl->dd_subdomains_zonal;
10064 dd->subdomain_lon_max = dd->subdomain_lon_min
10065 + (lon_range) / (double) ctl->dd_subdomains_zonal;
10066
10067 /* Latitudes in descending order (90 to -90) */
10068 if (lat_range < 0) {
10069 dd->subdomain_lat_max = 90 + (dd->rank % ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional)
10070 * (lat_range) / (double) ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional;
10071 dd->subdomain_lat_min = dd->subdomain_lat_max
10072 + (lat_range) / (double) ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional;
10073 } else {
10074 WARN
10075 ("lat_range > 0, but is expected to be negative, i.e. latitudes should range from 90 to -90")
10076 dd->subdomain_lat_min = -90 + (dd->rank % ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional)
10077 * (lat_range) / (double) ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional;
10078 dd->subdomain_lat_max = dd->subdomain_lat_min
10079 + (lat_range) / (double) ctl->dd_subdomains_meridional;
10080 }
10081
10082 LOG(2, "Total longitude range: %g deg", lon_range);
10083 LOG(2, "Total latitude range: %g deg", lat_range);
10084
10085 LOG(2, "Define subdomain properties.");
10086 LOG(2, "MPI information: Rank %d, Size %d", dd->rank, dd->size);
10087 LOG(2, "Edge position: l=%d,r=%d,t=%d, b=%d", (int) left, (int) right,
10088 (int) top, (int) bottom);
10089 LOG(2, "Sizes for limits: EX %d EY %d EP %d", EX, EY, EP);
10090 LOG(2, "Total size for subdomain meteo data: nx %d ny %d np %d", met->nx,
10091 met->ny, met->np);
10092 LOG(2, "Hyperslab sizes for boundary halos: nx %d ny %d np %d",
10093 (int) dd->halo_bnd_count[3], (int) dd->halo_bnd_count[2],
10094 (int) dd->halo_bnd_count[1]);
10095 LOG(2, "Hyperslab sizes for subdomain and inner halos: nx %d ny %d np %d",
10096 (int) dd->subdomain_count[3], (int) dd->subdomain_count[2],
10097 (int) dd->subdomain_count[1]);
10098 LOG(2, "Subdomain start: nx %ld ny %ld np %ld", dd->subdomain_start[3],
10099 dd->subdomain_start[2], dd->subdomain_start[1]);
10100 LOG(2, "Boundary halo start: nx %ld ny %ld np %ld", dd->halo_bnd_start[3],
10101 dd->halo_bnd_start[2], dd->halo_bnd_start[1]);
10102 LOG(2, "Offsets: nx %d ny %d", dd->halo_offset_start, dd->halo_offset_end);
10103
10104 LOG(2, " %d Subdomain longitudes: %g, %g ... %g deg (edges: %g to %g)",
10105 dd->rank, met->lon[0], met->lon[1], met->lon[met->nx - 1],
10106 dd->subdomain_lon_min, dd->subdomain_lon_max);
10107 LOG(2, " %d Subdomain latitudes: %g, %g ... %g deg (edges: %g to %g)",
10108 dd->rank, met->lat[0], met->lat[1], met->lat[met->ny - 1],
10109 dd->subdomain_lat_min, dd->subdomain_lat_max);
10110
10111 free(help_lon_glob);
10112 free(help_lat_glob);
10113}
10114
10115/*****************************************************************************/
10116
10117void read_met_pbl(
10118 const ctl_t *ctl,
10119 met_t *met) {
10120
10121 /* Set timer... */
10122 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_PBL", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
10123 LOG(2, "Calculate planetary boundary layer...");
10124
10125 /* Convert PBL height from meteo file to pressure... */
10126 if (ctl->met_pbl == 1) {
10127
10128 /* Loop over grid points... */
10129#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
10130 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
10131 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
10132
10133 /* Get pressure at top of PBL... */
10134 const float z = met->zs[ix][iy] + met->pbl[ix][iy];
10135 const int ip = locate_irr_float(met->z[ix][iy], met->np, z, 0);
10136 met->pbl[ix][iy] =
10137 (float) (LIN(met->z[ix][iy][ip], met->p[ip],
10138 met->z[ix][iy][ip + 1], met->p[ip + 1], z));
10139 }
10140 }
10141
10142 /* Determine PBL based on Richardson number... */
10143 else if (ctl->met_pbl == 2) {
10144
10145 /* Parameters used to estimate the height of the PBL
10146 (e.g., Vogelezang and Holtslag, 1996; Seidel et al., 2012)... */
10147 const double rib_crit = 0.25, dz = 0.05, umin = 5.0;
10148
10149 /* Loop over grid points... */
10150#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
10151 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
10152 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
10153
10154 /* Set bottom level of PBL... */
10155 const double pbl_bot = met->ps[ix][iy] * exp(-dz / H0);
10156
10157 /* Find lowest level near the bottom... */
10158 int ip;
10159 for (ip = 1; ip < met->np; ip++)
10160 if (met->p[ip] < pbl_bot)
10161 break;
10162
10163 /* Get near surface data... */
10164 const double h2os = LIN(met->p[ip - 1], met->h2o[ix][iy][ip - 1],
10165 met->p[ip], met->h2o[ix][iy][ip], pbl_bot);
10166 const double tvs = THETAVIRT(pbl_bot, met->ts[ix][iy], h2os);
10167
10168 /* Init... */
10169 double rib_old = 0;
10170
10171 /* Loop over levels... */
10172 for (; ip < met->np; ip++) {
10173
10174 /* Get squared horizontal wind speed... */
10175 double vh2 = SQR(met->u[ix][iy][ip] - met->us[ix][iy])
10176 + SQR(met->v[ix][iy][ip] - met->vs[ix][iy]);
10177 vh2 = MAX(vh2, SQR(umin));
10178
10179 /* Calculate bulk Richardson number... */
10180 const double rib =
10181 G0 * 1e3 * (met->z[ix][iy][ip] - met->zs[ix][iy]) / tvs
10182 * (THETAVIRT(met->p[ip], met->t[ix][iy][ip],
10183 met->h2o[ix][iy][ip]) - tvs) / vh2;
10184
10185 /* Check for critical value... */
10186 if (rib >= rib_crit) {
10187 met->pbl[ix][iy] = (float) (LIN(rib_old, met->p[ip - 1],
10188 rib, met->p[ip], rib_crit));
10189 if (met->pbl[ix][iy] > pbl_bot)
10190 met->pbl[ix][iy] = (float) pbl_bot;
10191 break;
10192 }
10193
10194 /* Save Richardson number... */
10195 rib_old = rib;
10196 }
10197 }
10198 }
10199
10200 /* Determine PBL based on potential temperature... */
10201 if (ctl->met_pbl == 3) {
10202
10203 /* Parameters used to estimate the height of the PBL
10204 (following HYSPLIT model)... */
10205 const double dtheta = 2.0, zmin = 0.1;
10206
10207 /* Loop over grid points... */
10208#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
10209 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
10210 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
10211
10212 /* Potential temperature at the surface... */
10213 const double theta0 = THETA(met->ps[ix][iy], met->ts[ix][iy]);
10214
10215 /* Find topmost level where theta exceeds surface value by 2 K... */
10216 int ip;
10217 for (ip = met->np - 2; ip > 0; ip--)
10218 if (met->p[ip] >= 300.)
10219 if (met->p[ip] > met->ps[ix][iy]
10220 || THETA(met->p[ip], met->t[ix][iy][ip]) <= theta0 + dtheta)
10221 break;
10222
10223 /* Interpolate... */
10224 met->pbl[ix][iy]
10225 = (float) (LIN(THETA(met->p[ip + 1], met->t[ix][iy][ip + 1]),
10226 met->p[ip + 1],
10227 THETA(met->p[ip], met->t[ix][iy][ip]),
10228 met->p[ip], theta0 + dtheta));
10229
10230 /* Check minimum value... */
10231 double pbl_min = met->ps[ix][iy] * exp(-zmin / H0);
10232 if (met->pbl[ix][iy] > pbl_min || met->p[ip] > met->ps[ix][iy])
10233 met->pbl[ix][iy] = (float) pbl_min;
10234 }
10235 }
10236
10237 /* Loop over grid points... */
10238#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
10239 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
10240 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
10241
10242 /* Check minimum value... */
10243 double pbl_min = met->ps[ix][iy] * exp(-ctl->met_pbl_min / H0);
10244 met->pbl[ix][iy] = MIN(met->pbl[ix][iy], (float) pbl_min);
10245
10246 /* Check maximum value... */
10247 double pbl_max = met->ps[ix][iy] * exp(-ctl->met_pbl_max / H0);
10248 met->pbl[ix][iy] = MAX(met->pbl[ix][iy], (float) pbl_max);
10249 }
10250}
10251
10252/*****************************************************************************/
10253
10254void read_met_periodic(
10255 met_t *met) {
10256
10257 /* Set timer... */
10258 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_PERIODIC", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
10259 LOG(2, "Apply periodic boundary conditions...");
10260
10261 /* Check longitudes... */
10262 if (!(fabs(met->lon[met->nx - 1] - met->lon[0]
10263 + met->lon[1] - met->lon[0] - 360) < 0.01))
10264 return;
10265
10266 /* Increase longitude counter... */
10267 if ((++met->nx) >= EX)
10268 ERRMSG("Cannot create periodic boundary conditions!");
10269
10270 /* Set longitude... */
10271 met->lon[met->nx - 1] = met->lon[met->nx - 2] + met->lon[1] - met->lon[0];
10272
10273 /* Loop over latitudes and pressure levels... */
10274#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
10275 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
10276 met->ps[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->ps[0][iy];
10277 met->zs[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->zs[0][iy];
10278 met->ts[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->ts[0][iy];
10279 met->us[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->us[0][iy];
10280 met->vs[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->vs[0][iy];
10281 met->ess[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->ess[0][iy];
10282 met->nss[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->nss[0][iy];
10283 met->shf[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->shf[0][iy];
10284 met->lsm[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->lsm[0][iy];
10285 met->sst[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->sst[0][iy];
10286 met->pbl[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->pbl[0][iy];
10287 met->cape[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->cape[0][iy];
10288 met->cin[met->nx - 1][iy] = met->cin[0][iy];
10289 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
10290 met->t[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->t[0][iy][ip];
10291 met->u[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->u[0][iy][ip];
10292 met->v[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->v[0][iy][ip];
10293 met->w[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->w[0][iy][ip];
10294 met->h2o[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->h2o[0][iy][ip];
10295 met->o3[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->o3[0][iy][ip];
10296 met->lwc[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->lwc[0][iy][ip];
10297 met->rwc[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->rwc[0][iy][ip];
10298 met->iwc[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->iwc[0][iy][ip];
10299 met->swc[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->swc[0][iy][ip];
10300 met->cc[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->cc[0][iy][ip];
10301 }
10302 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->npl; ip++) {
10303 met->ul[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->ul[0][iy][ip];
10304 met->vl[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->vl[0][iy][ip];
10305 met->wl[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->wl[0][iy][ip];
10306 met->pl[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->pl[0][iy][ip];
10307 met->zetal[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->zetal[0][iy][ip];
10308 met->zeta_dotl[met->nx - 1][iy][ip] = met->zeta_dotl[0][iy][ip];
10309 }
10310 }
10311}
10312
10313/*****************************************************************************/
10314
10315void read_met_polar_winds(
10316 met_t *met) {
10317
10318 /* Set timer... */
10319 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_POLAR_WINDS", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
10320 LOG(2, "Apply fix for polar winds...");
10321
10322 /* Check latitudes... */
10323 if (fabs(met->lat[0]) < 89.999 || fabs(met->lat[met->ny - 1]) < 89.999)
10324 return;
10325
10326 /* Loop over hemispheres... */
10327 for (int ihem = 0; ihem < 2; ihem++) {
10328
10329 /* Set latitude indices... */
10330 int i89 = 1, i90 = 0, sign = 1;
10331 if (ihem == 1) {
10332 i89 = met->ny - 2;
10333 i90 = met->ny - 1;
10334 }
10335 if (met->lat[i90] < 0)
10336 sign = -1;
10337
10338 /* Look-up table of cosinus and sinus... */
10339 double clon[EX], slon[EX];
10340#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
10341 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++) {
10342 clon[ix] = cos(sign * DEG2RAD(met->lon[ix]));
10343 slon[ix] = sin(sign * DEG2RAD(met->lon[ix]));
10344 }
10345
10346 /* Loop over levels... */
10347#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
10348 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
10349
10350 /* Transform 89 degree u and v winds into Cartesian coordinates and take the mean... */
10351 double vel89x = 0, vel89y = 0;
10352 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++) {
10353 vel89x +=
10354 (met->u[ix][i89][ip] * clon[ix] -
10355 met->v[ix][i89][ip] * slon[ix]) / met->nx;
10356 vel89y +=
10357 (met->u[ix][i89][ip] * slon[ix] +
10358 met->v[ix][i89][ip] * clon[ix]) / met->nx;
10359 }
10360
10361 /* Replace 90 degree winds by 89 degree mean... */
10362 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++) {
10363 met->u[ix][i90][ip]
10364 = (float) (vel89x * clon[ix] + vel89y * slon[ix]);
10365 met->v[ix][i90][ip]
10366 = (float) (-vel89x * slon[ix] + vel89y * clon[ix]);
10367 }
10368 }
10369 }
10370}
10371
10372/*****************************************************************************/
10373
10374void read_met_pv(
10375 met_t *met) {
10376
10377 double pows[EP];
10378
10379 /* Set timer... */
10380 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_PV", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
10381 LOG(2, "Calculate potential vorticity...");
10382
10383 /* Set powers... */
10384#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
10385 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++)
10386 pows[ip] = pow(1000. / met->p[ip], 0.286);
10387
10388 /* Loop over grid points... */
10389#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
10390 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++) {
10391
10392 /* Set indices... */
10393 const int ix0 = MAX(ix - 1, 0);
10394 const int ix1 = MIN(ix + 1, met->nx - 1);
10395
10396 /* Loop over grid points... */
10397 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
10398
10399 /* Set indices... */
10400 const int iy0 = MAX(iy - 1, 0);
10401 const int iy1 = MIN(iy + 1, met->ny - 1);
10402
10403 /* Set auxiliary variables... */
10404 const double latr = 0.5 * (met->lat[iy1] + met->lat[iy0]);
10405 const double dx = 1000. * DEG2DX(met->lon[ix1] - met->lon[ix0], latr);
10406 const double dy = 1000. * DEG2DY(met->lat[iy1] - met->lat[iy0]);
10407 const double c0 = cos(DEG2RAD(met->lat[iy0]));
10408 const double c1 = cos(DEG2RAD(met->lat[iy1]));
10409 const double cr = cos(DEG2RAD(latr));
10410 const double vort = 2 * 7.2921e-5 * sin(DEG2RAD(latr));
10411
10412 /* Loop over grid points... */
10413 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
10414
10415 /* Get gradients in longitude... */
10416 const double dtdx
10417 = (met->t[ix1][iy][ip] - met->t[ix0][iy][ip]) * pows[ip] / dx;
10418 const double dvdx = (met->v[ix1][iy][ip] - met->v[ix0][iy][ip]) / dx;
10419
10420 /* Get gradients in latitude... */
10421 const double dtdy
10422 = (met->t[ix][iy1][ip] - met->t[ix][iy0][ip]) * pows[ip] / dy;
10423 const double dudy
10424 = (met->u[ix][iy1][ip] * c1 - met->u[ix][iy0][ip] * c0) / dy;
10425
10426 /* Set indices... */
10427 const int ip0 = MAX(ip - 1, 0);
10428 const int ip1 = MIN(ip + 1, met->np - 1);
10429
10430 /* Get gradients in pressure... */
10431 double dtdp, dudp, dvdp;
10432 const double dp0 = 100. * (met->p[ip] - met->p[ip0]);
10433 const double dp1 = 100. * (met->p[ip1] - met->p[ip]);
10434 if (ip != ip0 && ip != ip1) {
10435 double denom = dp0 * dp1 * (dp0 + dp1);
10436 dtdp = (dp0 * dp0 * met->t[ix][iy][ip1] * pows[ip1]
10437 - dp1 * dp1 * met->t[ix][iy][ip0] * pows[ip0]
10438 + (dp1 * dp1 - dp0 * dp0) * met->t[ix][iy][ip] * pows[ip])
10439 / denom;
10440 dudp = (dp0 * dp0 * met->u[ix][iy][ip1]
10441 - dp1 * dp1 * met->u[ix][iy][ip0]
10442 + (dp1 * dp1 - dp0 * dp0) * met->u[ix][iy][ip])
10443 / denom;
10444 dvdp = (dp0 * dp0 * met->v[ix][iy][ip1]
10445 - dp1 * dp1 * met->v[ix][iy][ip0]
10446 + (dp1 * dp1 - dp0 * dp0) * met->v[ix][iy][ip])
10447 / denom;
10448 } else {
10449 const double denom = dp0 + dp1;
10450 dtdp =
10451 (met->t[ix][iy][ip1] * pows[ip1] -
10452 met->t[ix][iy][ip0] * pows[ip0]) / denom;
10453 dudp = (met->u[ix][iy][ip1] - met->u[ix][iy][ip0]) / denom;
10454 dvdp = (met->v[ix][iy][ip1] - met->v[ix][iy][ip0]) / denom;
10455 }
10456
10457 /* Calculate PV... */
10458 met->pv[ix][iy][ip] = (float)
10459 (1e6 * G0 *
10460 (-dtdp * (dvdx - dudy / cr + vort) + dvdp * dtdx - dudp * dtdy));
10461 }
10462 }
10463 }
10464
10465 /* Fix for polar regions... */
10466#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
10467 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
10468 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++) {
10469 met->pv[ix][0][ip]
10470 = met->pv[ix][1][ip]
10471 = met->pv[ix][2][ip];
10472 met->pv[ix][met->ny - 1][ip]
10473 = met->pv[ix][met->ny - 2][ip]
10474 = met->pv[ix][met->ny - 3][ip];
10475 }
10476}
10477
10478/*****************************************************************************/
10479
10480void read_met_ozone(
10481 met_t *met) {
10482
10483 /* Set timer... */
10484 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_OZONE", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
10485 LOG(2, "Calculate total column ozone...");
10486
10487 /* Loop over columns... */
10488#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
10489 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
10490 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
10491
10492 /* Integrate... */
10493 double cd = 0;
10494 for (int ip = 1; ip < met->np; ip++)
10495 if (met->p[ip - 1] <= met->ps[ix][iy]) {
10496 const double vmr =
10497 0.5 * (met->o3[ix][iy][ip - 1] + met->o3[ix][iy][ip]);
10498 const double dp = met->p[ip - 1] - met->p[ip];
10499 cd += vmr * MO3 / MA * dp * 1e2 / G0;
10500 }
10501
10502 /* Convert to Dobson units... */
10503 met->o3c[ix][iy] = (float) (cd / 2.1415e-5);
10504 }
10505}
10506
10507/*****************************************************************************/
10508
10509void read_met_sample(
10510 const ctl_t *ctl,
10511 met_t *met) {
10512
10513 met_t *help;
10514
10515 /* Check parameters... */
10516 if (ctl->met_dp <= 1 && ctl->met_dx <= 1 && ctl->met_dy <= 1
10517 && ctl->met_sp <= 1 && ctl->met_sx <= 1 && ctl->met_sy <= 1)
10518 return;
10519
10520 /* Set timer... */
10521 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_SAMPLE", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
10522 LOG(2, "Downsampling of meteo data...");
10523
10524 /* Allocate... */
10525 ALLOC(help, met_t, 1);
10526
10527 /* Copy data... */
10528 help->nx = met->nx;
10529 help->ny = met->ny;
10530 help->np = met->np;
10531 memcpy(help->lon, met->lon, sizeof(met->lon));
10532 memcpy(help->lat, met->lat, sizeof(met->lat));
10533 memcpy(help->p, met->p, sizeof(met->p));
10534
10535 /* Smoothing... */
10536 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix += ctl->met_dx) {
10537 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy += ctl->met_dy) {
10538 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip += ctl->met_dp) {
10539 help->ps[ix][iy] = 0;
10540 help->zs[ix][iy] = 0;
10541 help->ts[ix][iy] = 0;
10542 help->us[ix][iy] = 0;
10543 help->vs[ix][iy] = 0;
10544 help->ess[ix][iy] = 0;
10545 help->nss[ix][iy] = 0;
10546 help->shf[ix][iy] = 0;
10547 help->lsm[ix][iy] = 0;
10548 help->sst[ix][iy] = 0;
10549 help->pbl[ix][iy] = 0;
10550 help->cape[ix][iy] = 0;
10551 help->cin[ix][iy] = 0;
10552 help->t[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
10553 help->u[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
10554 help->v[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
10555 help->w[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
10556 help->h2o[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
10557 help->o3[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
10558 help->lwc[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
10559 help->rwc[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
10560 help->iwc[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
10561 help->swc[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
10562 help->cc[ix][iy][ip] = 0;
10563 float wsum = 0;
10564 for (int ix2 = ix - ctl->met_sx + 1; ix2 <= ix + ctl->met_sx - 1;
10565 ix2++) {
10566 int ix3 = ix2;
10567 if (ix3 < 0)
10568 ix3 += met->nx;
10569 else if (ix3 >= met->nx)
10570 ix3 -= met->nx;
10571
10572 for (int iy2 = MAX(iy - ctl->met_sy + 1, 0);
10573 iy2 <= MIN(iy + ctl->met_sy - 1, met->ny - 1); iy2++)
10574 for (int ip2 = MAX(ip - ctl->met_sp + 1, 0);
10575 ip2 <= MIN(ip + ctl->met_sp - 1, met->np - 1); ip2++) {
10576 const float w =
10577 (1.0f - (float) abs(ix - ix2) / (float) ctl->met_sx)
10578 * (1.0f - (float) abs(iy - iy2) / (float) ctl->met_sy)
10579 * (1.0f - (float) abs(ip - ip2) / (float) ctl->met_sp);
10580 help->ps[ix][iy] += w * met->ps[ix3][iy2];
10581 help->zs[ix][iy] += w * met->zs[ix3][iy2];
10582 help->ts[ix][iy] += w * met->ts[ix3][iy2];
10583 help->us[ix][iy] += w * met->us[ix3][iy2];
10584 help->vs[ix][iy] += w * met->vs[ix3][iy2];
10585 help->ess[ix][iy] += w * met->ess[ix3][iy2];
10586 help->nss[ix][iy] += w * met->nss[ix3][iy2];
10587 help->shf[ix][iy] += w * met->shf[ix3][iy2];
10588 help->lsm[ix][iy] += w * met->lsm[ix3][iy2];
10589 help->sst[ix][iy] += w * met->sst[ix3][iy2];
10590 help->pbl[ix][iy] += w * met->pbl[ix3][iy2];
10591 help->cape[ix][iy] += w * met->cape[ix3][iy2];
10592 help->cin[ix][iy] += w * met->cin[ix3][iy2];
10593 help->t[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->t[ix3][iy2][ip2];
10594 help->u[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->u[ix3][iy2][ip2];
10595 help->v[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->v[ix3][iy2][ip2];
10596 help->w[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->w[ix3][iy2][ip2];
10597 help->h2o[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->h2o[ix3][iy2][ip2];
10598 help->o3[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->o3[ix3][iy2][ip2];
10599 help->lwc[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->lwc[ix3][iy2][ip2];
10600 help->rwc[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->rwc[ix3][iy2][ip2];
10601 help->iwc[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->iwc[ix3][iy2][ip2];
10602 help->swc[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->swc[ix3][iy2][ip2];
10603 help->cc[ix][iy][ip] += w * met->cc[ix3][iy2][ip2];
10604 wsum += w;
10605 }
10606 }
10607 help->ps[ix][iy] /= wsum;
10608 help->zs[ix][iy] /= wsum;
10609 help->ts[ix][iy] /= wsum;
10610 help->us[ix][iy] /= wsum;
10611 help->vs[ix][iy] /= wsum;
10612 help->ess[ix][iy] /= wsum;
10613 help->nss[ix][iy] /= wsum;
10614 help->shf[ix][iy] /= wsum;
10615 help->lsm[ix][iy] /= wsum;
10616 help->sst[ix][iy] /= wsum;
10617 help->pbl[ix][iy] /= wsum;
10618 help->cape[ix][iy] /= wsum;
10619 help->cin[ix][iy] /= wsum;
10620 help->t[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
10621 help->u[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
10622 help->v[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
10623 help->w[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
10624 help->h2o[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
10625 help->o3[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
10626 help->lwc[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
10627 help->rwc[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
10628 help->iwc[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
10629 help->swc[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
10630 help->cc[ix][iy][ip] /= wsum;
10631 }
10632 }
10633 }
10634
10635 /* Downsampling... */
10636 met->nx = 0;
10637 for (int ix = 0; ix < help->nx; ix += ctl->met_dx) {
10638 met->lon[met->nx] = help->lon[ix];
10639 met->ny = 0;
10640 for (int iy = 0; iy < help->ny; iy += ctl->met_dy) {
10641 met->lat[met->ny] = help->lat[iy];
10642 met->ps[met->nx][met->ny] = help->ps[ix][iy];
10643 met->zs[met->nx][met->ny] = help->zs[ix][iy];
10644 met->ts[met->nx][met->ny] = help->ts[ix][iy];
10645 met->us[met->nx][met->ny] = help->us[ix][iy];
10646 met->vs[met->nx][met->ny] = help->vs[ix][iy];
10647 met->ess[met->nx][met->ny] = help->ess[ix][iy];
10648 met->nss[met->nx][met->ny] = help->nss[ix][iy];
10649 met->shf[met->nx][met->ny] = help->shf[ix][iy];
10650 met->lsm[met->nx][met->ny] = help->lsm[ix][iy];
10651 met->sst[met->nx][met->ny] = help->sst[ix][iy];
10652 met->pbl[met->nx][met->ny] = help->pbl[ix][iy];
10653 met->cape[met->nx][met->ny] = help->cape[ix][iy];
10654 met->cin[met->nx][met->ny] = help->cin[ix][iy];
10655 met->np = 0;
10656 for (int ip = 0; ip < help->np; ip += ctl->met_dp) {
10657 met->p[met->np] = help->p[ip];
10658 met->t[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->t[ix][iy][ip];
10659 met->u[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->u[ix][iy][ip];
10660 met->v[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->v[ix][iy][ip];
10661 met->w[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->w[ix][iy][ip];
10662 met->h2o[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->h2o[ix][iy][ip];
10663 met->o3[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->o3[ix][iy][ip];
10664 met->lwc[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->lwc[ix][iy][ip];
10665 met->rwc[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->rwc[ix][iy][ip];
10666 met->iwc[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->iwc[ix][iy][ip];
10667 met->swc[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->swc[ix][iy][ip];
10668 met->cc[met->nx][met->ny][met->np] = help->cc[ix][iy][ip];
10669 met->np++;
10670 }
10671 met->ny++;
10672 }
10673 met->nx++;
10674 }
10675
10676 /* Free... */
10677 free(help);
10678}
10679
10680/*****************************************************************************/
10681
10682void read_met_tropo(
10683 const ctl_t *ctl,
10684 const clim_t *clim,
10685 met_t *met) {
10686
10687 double p2[200], pv[EP], pv2[200], t[EP], t2[200], th[EP],
10688 th2[200], z[EP], z2[200];
10689
10690 /* Set timer... */
10691 SELECT_TIMER("READ_MET_TROPO", "METPROC", NVTX_READ);
10692 LOG(2, "Calculate tropopause...");
10693
10694 /* Get altitude and pressure profiles... */
10695#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
10696 for (int iz = 0; iz < met->np; iz++)
10697 z[iz] = Z(met->p[iz]);
10698#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
10699 for (int iz = 0; iz <= 190; iz++) {
10700 z2[iz] = 4.5 + 0.1 * iz;
10701 p2[iz] = P(z2[iz]);
10702 }
10703
10704 /* Do not calculate tropopause... */
10705 if (ctl->met_tropo == 0)
10706#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
10707 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
10708 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
10709 met->pt[ix][iy] = NAN;
10710
10711 /* Use tropopause climatology... */
10712 else if (ctl->met_tropo == 1) {
10713#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
10714 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
10715 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
10716 met->pt[ix][iy] = (float) clim_tropo(clim, met->time, met->lat[iy]);
10717 }
10718
10719 /* Use cold point... */
10720 else if (ctl->met_tropo == 2) {
10721
10722 /* Loop over grid points... */
10723#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) private(t,t2) collapse(2)
10724 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
10725 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
10726
10727 /* Interpolate temperature profile... */
10728 for (int iz = 0; iz < met->np; iz++)
10729 t[iz] = met->t[ix][iy][iz];
10730 spline(z, t, met->np, z2, t2, 171, ctl->met_tropo_spline);
10731
10732 /* Find minimum... */
10733 int iz = (int) gsl_stats_min_index(t2, 1, 171);
10734 if (iz > 0 && iz < 170)
10735 met->pt[ix][iy] = (float) p2[iz];
10736 else
10737 met->pt[ix][iy] = NAN;
10738 }
10739 }
10740
10741 /* Use WMO definition... */
10742 else if (ctl->met_tropo == 3 || ctl->met_tropo == 4) {
10743
10744 /* Loop over grid points... */
10745#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) private(t,t2) collapse(2)
10746 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
10747 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
10748
10749 /* Interpolate temperature profile... */
10750 int iz;
10751 for (iz = 0; iz < met->np; iz++)
10752 t[iz] = met->t[ix][iy][iz];
10753 spline(z, t, met->np, z2, t2, 191, ctl->met_tropo_spline);
10754
10755 /* Find 1st tropopause... */
10756 met->pt[ix][iy] = NAN;
10757 for (iz = 0; iz <= 170; iz++) {
10758 int found = 1;
10759 for (int iz2 = iz + 1; iz2 <= iz + 20; iz2++)
10760 if (LAPSE(p2[iz], t2[iz], p2[iz2], t2[iz2]) > 2.0) {
10761 found = 0;
10762 break;
10763 }
10764 if (found) {
10765 if (iz > 0 && iz < 170)
10766 met->pt[ix][iy] = (float) p2[iz];
10767 break;
10768 }
10769 }
10770
10771 /* Find 2nd tropopause... */
10772 if (ctl->met_tropo == 4) {
10773 met->pt[ix][iy] = NAN;
10774 for (; iz <= 170; iz++) {
10775 int found = 1;
10776 for (int iz2 = iz + 1; iz2 <= iz + 10; iz2++)
10777 if (LAPSE(p2[iz], t2[iz], p2[iz2], t2[iz2]) < 3.0) {
10778 found = 0;
10779 break;
10780 }
10781 if (found)
10782 break;
10783 }
10784 for (; iz <= 170; iz++) {
10785 int found = 1;
10786 for (int iz2 = iz + 1; iz2 <= iz + 20; iz2++)
10787 if (LAPSE(p2[iz], t2[iz], p2[iz2], t2[iz2]) > 2.0) {
10788 found = 0;
10789 break;
10790 }
10791 if (found) {
10792 if (iz > 0 && iz < 170)
10793 met->pt[ix][iy] = (float) p2[iz];
10794 break;
10795 }
10796 }
10797 }
10798 }
10799 }
10800
10801 /* Use dynamical tropopause... */
10802 else if (ctl->met_tropo == 5) {
10803
10804 /* Loop over grid points... */
10805#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) private(pv,pv2,th,th2) collapse(2)
10806 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
10807 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
10808
10809 /* Interpolate potential vorticity profile... */
10810 for (int iz = 0; iz < met->np; iz++)
10811 pv[iz] = met->pv[ix][iy][iz];
10812 spline(z, pv, met->np, z2, pv2, 171, ctl->met_tropo_spline);
10813
10814 /* Interpolate potential temperature profile... */
10815 for (int iz = 0; iz < met->np; iz++)
10816 th[iz] = THETA(met->p[iz], met->t[ix][iy][iz]);
10817 spline(z, th, met->np, z2, th2, 171, ctl->met_tropo_spline);
10818
10819 /* Find dynamical tropopause... */
10820 met->pt[ix][iy] = NAN;
10821 for (int iz = 0; iz <= 170; iz++)
10822 if (fabs(pv2[iz]) >= ctl->met_tropo_pv
10823 || th2[iz] >= ctl->met_tropo_theta) {
10824 if (iz > 0 && iz < 170)
10825 met->pt[ix][iy] = (float) p2[iz];
10826 break;
10827 }
10828 }
10829 }
10830
10831 else
10832 ERRMSG("Cannot calculate tropopause!");
10833
10834 /* Interpolate temperature, geopotential height, and water vapor... */
10835#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
10836 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
10837 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++) {
10838 double h2ot, tt, zt;
10839 INTPOL_INIT;
10840 intpol_met_space_3d(met, met->t, met->pt[ix][iy], met->lon[ix],
10841 met->lat[iy], &tt, ci, cw, 1);
10842 intpol_met_space_3d(met, met->z, met->pt[ix][iy], met->lon[ix],
10843 met->lat[iy], &zt, ci, cw, 0);
10844 intpol_met_space_3d(met, met->h2o, met->pt[ix][iy], met->lon[ix],
10845 met->lat[iy], &h2ot, ci, cw, 0);
10846 met->tt[ix][iy] = (float) tt;
10847 met->zt[ix][iy] = (float) zt;
10848 met->h2ot[ix][iy] = (float) h2ot;
10849 }
10850}
10851
10852/*****************************************************************************/
10853
10854void read_obs(
10855 const char *filename,
10856 const ctl_t *ctl,
10857 double *rt,
10858 double *rz,
10859 double *rlon,
10860 double *rlat,
10861 double *robs,
10862 int *nobs) {
10863
10864 /* Write info... */
10865 LOG(1, "Read observation data: %s", filename);
10866
10867 /* Read data... */
10868 if (ctl->obs_type == 0)
10869 read_obs_asc(filename, rt, rz, rlon, rlat, robs, nobs);
10870 else if (ctl->obs_type == 1)
10871 read_obs_nc(filename, rt, rz, rlon, rlat, robs, nobs);
10872 else
10873 ERRMSG("Set OBS_TYPE to 0 or 1!");
10874
10875 /* Check time... */
10876 for (int i = 1; i < *nobs; i++)
10877 if (rt[i] < rt[i - 1])
10878 ERRMSG("Time must be ascending!");
10879
10880 /* Write info... */
10881 int n = *nobs;
10882 double mini, maxi;
10883 LOG(2, "Number of observations: %d", *nobs);
10884 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, rt, 1, (size_t) n);
10885 LOG(2, "Time range: %.2f ... %.2f s", mini, maxi);
10886 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, rz, 1, (size_t) n);
10887 LOG(2, "Altitude range: %g ... %g km", mini, maxi);
10888 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, rlon, 1, (size_t) n);
10889 LOG(2, "Longitude range: %g ... %g deg", mini, maxi);
10890 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, rlat, 1, (size_t) n);
10891 LOG(2, "Latitude range: %g ... %g deg", mini, maxi);
10892 gsl_stats_minmax(&mini, &maxi, robs, 1, (size_t) n);
10893 LOG(2, "Observation range: %g ... %g", mini, maxi);
10894}
10895
10896/*****************************************************************************/
10897
10898void read_obs_asc(
10899 const char *filename,
10900 double *rt,
10901 double *rz,
10902 double *rlon,
10903 double *rlat,
10904 double *robs,
10905 int *nobs) {
10906
10907 /* Open observation data file... */
10908 FILE *in;
10909 if (!(in = fopen(filename, "r")))
10910 ERRMSG("Cannot open file!");
10911
10912 /* Read observations... */
10913 char line[LEN];
10914 while (fgets(line, LEN, in))
10915 if (sscanf(line, "%lg %lg %lg %lg %lg", &rt[*nobs], &rz[*nobs],
10916 &rlon[*nobs], &rlat[*nobs], &robs[*nobs]) == 5)
10917 if ((++(*nobs)) >= NOBS)
10918 ERRMSG("Too many observations!");
10919
10920 /* Close observation data file... */
10921 fclose(in);
10922}
10923
10924/*****************************************************************************/
10925
10926void read_obs_nc(
10927 const char *filename,
10928 double *rt,
10929 double *rz,
10930 double *rlon,
10931 double *rlat,
10932 double *robs,
10933 int *nobs) {
10934
10935 int ncid, varid;
10936
10937 /* Open netCDF file... */
10938 if (nc_open(filename, NC_NOWRITE, &ncid) != NC_NOERR)
10939 ERRMSG("Cannot open file!");
10940
10941 /* Read the observations from the NetCDF file... */
10942 NC_INQ_DIM("nobs", nobs, 1, NOBS, 1);
10943 NC_GET_DOUBLE("time", rt, 1);
10944 NC_GET_DOUBLE("alt", rz, 1);
10945 NC_GET_DOUBLE("lon", rlon, 1);
10946 NC_GET_DOUBLE("lat", rlat, 1);
10947 NC_GET_DOUBLE("obs", robs, 1);
10948
10949 /* Close file... */
10950 NC(nc_close(ncid));
10951}
10952
10953/*****************************************************************************/
10954
10955double scan_ctl(
10956 const char *filename,
10957 int argc,
10958 char *argv[],
10959 const char *varname,
10960 const int arridx,
10961 const char *defvalue,
10962 char *value) {
10963
10964 FILE *in = NULL;
10965
10966 char fullname1[LEN], fullname2[LEN], rval[LEN];
10967
10968 int contain = 0, i;
10969
10970 /* Open file... */
10971 if (filename[strlen(filename) - 1] != '-')
10972 if (!(in = fopen(filename, "r")))
10973 ERRMSG("Cannot open file!");
10974
10975 /* Set full variable name... */
10976 if (arridx >= 0) {
10977 sprintf(fullname1, "%s[%d]", varname, arridx);
10978 sprintf(fullname2, "%s[*]", varname);
10979 } else {
10980 sprintf(fullname1, "%s", varname);
10981 sprintf(fullname2, "%s", varname);
10982 }
10983
10984 /* Read data... */
10985 if (in != NULL) {
10986 char dummy[LEN], line[LEN], rvarname[LEN];
10987 while (fgets(line, LEN, in)) {
10988 if (sscanf(line, "%4999s %4999s %4999s", rvarname, dummy, rval) == 3)
10989 if (strcasecmp(rvarname, fullname1) == 0 ||
10990 strcasecmp(rvarname, fullname2) == 0) {
10991 contain = 1;
10992 break;
10993 }
10994 }
10995 }
10996 for (i = 1; i < argc - 1; i++)
10997 if (strcasecmp(argv[i], fullname1) == 0 ||
10998 strcasecmp(argv[i], fullname2) == 0) {
10999 sprintf(rval, "%s", argv[i + 1]);
11000 contain = 1;
11001 break;
11002 }
11003
11004 /* Close file... */
11005 if (in != NULL)
11006 fclose(in);
11007
11008 /* Check for missing variables... */
11009 if (!contain) {
11010 if (strlen(defvalue) > 0)
11011 sprintf(rval, "%s", defvalue);
11012 else
11013 ERRMSG("Missing variable %s!\n", fullname1);
11014 }
11015
11016 /* Write info... */
11017 LOG(1, "%s = %s", fullname1, rval);
11018
11019 /* Return values... */
11020 if (value != NULL)
11021 sprintf(value, "%s", rval);
11022 return atof(rval);
11023}
11024
11025/*****************************************************************************/
11026
11027double sedi(
11028 const double p,
11029 const double T,
11030 const double rp,
11031 const double rhop) {
11032
11033 /* Convert particle radius from microns to m... */
11034 const double rp_help = rp * 1e-6;
11035
11036 /* Density of dry air [kg / m^3]... */
11037 const double rho = RHO(p, T);
11038
11039 /* Dynamic viscosity of air [kg / (m s)]... */
11040 const double eta = 1.8325e-5 * (416.16 / (T + 120.)) * pow(T / 296.16, 1.5);
11041
11042 /* Thermal velocity of an air molecule [m / s]... */
11043 const double v = sqrt(8. * KB * T / (M_PI * 4.8096e-26));
11044
11045 /* Mean free path of an air molecule [m]... */
11046 const double lambda = 2. * eta / (rho * v);
11047
11048 /* Knudsen number for air (dimensionless)... */
11049 const double K = lambda / rp_help;
11050
11051 /* Cunningham slip-flow correction (dimensionless)... */
11052 const double G = 1. + K * (1.249 + 0.42 * exp(-0.87 / K));
11053
11054 /* Sedimentation velocity [m / s]... */
11055 return 2. * SQR(rp_help) * (rhop - rho) * G0 / (9. * eta) * G;
11056}
11057
11058/*****************************************************************************/
11059
11060void spline(
11061 const double *x,
11062 const double *y,
11063 const int n,
11064 const double *x2,
11065 double *y2,
11066 const int n2,
11067 const int method) {
11068
11069 /* Cubic spline interpolation... */
11070 if (method == 1) {
11071
11072 /* Allocate... */
11073 gsl_interp_accel *acc = gsl_interp_accel_alloc();
11074 gsl_spline *s = gsl_spline_alloc(gsl_interp_cspline, (size_t) n);
11075
11076 /* Interpolate profile... */
11077 gsl_spline_init(s, x, y, (size_t) n);
11078 for (int i = 0; i < n2; i++)
11079 if (x2[i] <= x[0])
11080 y2[i] = y[0];
11081 else if (x2[i] >= x[n - 1])
11082 y2[i] = y[n - 1];
11083 else
11084 y2[i] = gsl_spline_eval(s, x2[i], acc);
11085
11086 /* Free... */
11087 gsl_spline_free(s);
11088 gsl_interp_accel_free(acc);
11089 }
11090
11091 /* Linear interpolation... */
11092 else {
11093 for (int i = 0; i < n2; i++)
11094 if (x2[i] <= x[0])
11095 y2[i] = y[0];
11096 else if (x2[i] >= x[n - 1])
11097 y2[i] = y[n - 1];
11098 else {
11099 const int idx = locate_irr(x, n, x2[i]);
11100 y2[i] = LIN(x[idx], y[idx], x[idx + 1], y[idx + 1], x2[i]);
11101 }
11102 }
11103}
11104
11105/*****************************************************************************/
11106
11107float stddev(
11108 const float *data,
11109 const int n) {
11110
11111 if (n <= 0)
11112 return 0;
11113
11114 float mean = 0, var = 0;
11115
11116 for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
11117 mean += data[i];
11118 var += SQR(data[i]);
11119 }
11120
11121 var = var / (float) n - SQR(mean / (float) n);
11122
11123 return (var > 0 ? sqrtf(var) : 0);
11124}
11125
11126/*****************************************************************************/
11127
11128double sza_calc(
11129 const double sec,
11130 const double lon,
11131 const double lat) {
11132
11133 /* Number of days and fraction with respect to 2000-01-01T12:00Z... */
11134 const double D = sec / 86400 - 0.5;
11135
11136 /* Geocentric apparent ecliptic longitude [rad]... */
11137 const double g = DEG2RAD(357.529 + 0.98560028 * D);
11138 const double q = 280.459 + 0.98564736 * D;
11139 const double L = DEG2RAD(q + 1.915 * sin(g) + 0.020 * sin(2 * g));
11140
11141 /* Mean obliquity of the ecliptic [rad]... */
11142 const double e = DEG2RAD(23.439 - 0.00000036 * D);
11143
11144 /* Declination [rad]... */
11145 const double sindec = sin(e) * sin(L);
11146
11147 /* Right ascension [rad]... */
11148 const double ra = atan2(cos(e) * sin(L), cos(L));
11149
11150 /* Greenwich Mean Sidereal Time [h]... */
11151 const double GMST = 18.697374558 + 24.06570982441908 * D;
11152
11153 /* Local Sidereal Time [h]... */
11154 const double LST = GMST + lon / 15;
11155
11156 /* Hour angle [rad]... */
11157 const double h = LST / 12 * M_PI - ra;
11158
11159 /* Convert latitude... */
11160 const double lat_help = DEG2RAD(lat);
11161
11162 /* Return solar zenith angle [rad]... */
11163 return acos(sin(lat_help) * sindec +
11164 cos(lat_help) * sqrt(1 - SQR(sindec)) * cos(h));
11165}
11166
11167/*****************************************************************************/
11168
11169void time2jsec(
11170 const int year,
11171 const int mon,
11172 const int day,
11173 const int hour,
11174 const int min,
11175 const int sec,
11176 const double remain,
11177 double *jsec) {
11178
11179 struct tm t0, t1;
11180
11181 t0.tm_year = 100;
11182 t0.tm_mon = 0;
11183 t0.tm_mday = 1;
11184 t0.tm_hour = 0;
11185 t0.tm_min = 0;
11186 t0.tm_sec = 0;
11187
11188 t1.tm_year = year - 1900;
11189 t1.tm_mon = mon - 1;
11190 t1.tm_mday = day;
11191 t1.tm_hour = hour;
11192 t1.tm_min = min;
11193 t1.tm_sec = sec;
11194
11195 *jsec = (double) timegm(&t1) - (double) timegm(&t0) + remain;
11196}
11197
11198/*****************************************************************************/
11199
11200void timer(
11201 const char *name,
11202 const char *group,
11203 const int output) {
11204
11205 static char names[NTIMER][100], groups[NTIMER][100];
11206
11207 static double rt_name[NTIMER], rt_group[NTIMER],
11208 rt_min[NTIMER], rt_max[NTIMER], dt, t0, t1;
11209
11210 static int iname = -1, igroup = -1, nname, ngroup, ct_name[NTIMER];
11211
11212 /* Get time... */
11213 t1 = omp_get_wtime();
11214 dt = t1 - t0;
11215
11216 /* Add elapsed time to current timers... */
11217 if (iname >= 0) {
11218 rt_name[iname] += dt;
11219 rt_min[iname] = (ct_name[iname] <= 0 ? dt : MIN(rt_min[iname], dt));
11220 rt_max[iname] = (ct_name[iname] <= 0 ? dt : MAX(rt_max[iname], dt));
11221 ct_name[iname]++;
11222 }
11223 if (igroup >= 0)
11224 rt_group[igroup] += t1 - t0;
11225
11226 /* Report timers... */
11227 if (output) {
11228 for (int i = 0; i < nname; i++)
11229 LOG(1, "TIMER_%s = %.3f s (min= %g s, mean= %g s,"
11230 " max= %g s, n= %d)", names[i], rt_name[i], rt_min[i],
11231 rt_name[i] / ct_name[i], rt_max[i], ct_name[i]);
11232 for (int i = 0; i < ngroup; i++)
11233 LOG(1, "TIMER_GROUP_%s = %.3f s", groups[i], rt_group[i]);
11234 double total = 0.0;
11235 for (int i = 0; i < nname; i++)
11236 total += rt_name[i];
11237 LOG(1, "TIMER_TOTAL = %.3f s", total);
11238 }
11239
11240 /* Identify IDs of next timer... */
11241 for (iname = 0; iname < nname; iname++)
11242 if (strcasecmp(name, names[iname]) == 0)
11243 break;
11244 for (igroup = 0; igroup < ngroup; igroup++)
11245 if (strcasecmp(group, groups[igroup]) == 0)
11246 break;
11247
11248 /* Check whether this is a new timer... */
11249 if (iname >= nname) {
11250 sprintf(names[iname], "%s", name);
11251 if ((++nname) >= NTIMER)
11252 ERRMSG("Too many timers!");
11253 }
11254
11255 /* Check whether this is a new group... */
11256 if (igroup >= ngroup) {
11257 sprintf(groups[igroup], "%s", group);
11258 if ((++ngroup) >= NTIMER)
11259 ERRMSG("Too many groups!");
11260 }
11261
11262 /* Save starting time... */
11263 t0 = t1;
11264}
11265
11266/*****************************************************************************/
11267
11268double time_from_filename(
11269 const char *filename,
11270 const int offset) {
11271
11272 char tstr[10];
11273
11274 double t;
11275
11276 /* Get time from filename... */
11277 int len = (int) strlen(filename);
11278 sprintf(tstr, "%.4s", &filename[len - offset]);
11279 int year = atoi(tstr);
11280 sprintf(tstr, "%.2s", &filename[len - offset + 5]);
11281 int mon = atoi(tstr);
11282 sprintf(tstr, "%.2s", &filename[len - offset + 8]);
11283 int day = atoi(tstr);
11284 sprintf(tstr, "%.2s", &filename[len - offset + 11]);
11285 int hour = atoi(tstr);
11286 sprintf(tstr, "%.2s", &filename[len - offset + 14]);
11287 int min = atoi(tstr);
11288
11289 /* Check time... */
11290 if (year < 1900 || year > 2100 || mon < 1 || mon > 12 || day < 1
11291 || day > 31 || hour < 0 || hour > 23 || min < 0 || min > 59)
11292 ERRMSG("Cannot read time from filename!");
11293
11294 /* Convert time to Julian seconds... */
11295 time2jsec(year, mon, day, hour, min, 0, 0.0, &t);
11296
11297 /* Return time... */
11298 return t;
11299}
11300
11301/*****************************************************************************/
11302
11303double tropo_weight(
11304 const clim_t *clim,
11305 const atm_t *atm,
11306 const int ip) {
11307
11308 /* Get tropopause pressure... */
11309 const double pt = clim_tropo(clim, atm->time[ip], atm->lat[ip]);
11310
11311 /* Get pressure range... */
11312 const double p1 = pt * 0.866877899;
11313 const double p0 = pt / 0.866877899;
11314
11315 /* Get weighting factor... */
11316 if (atm->p[ip] > p0)
11317 return 1;
11318 else if (atm->p[ip] < p1)
11319 return 0;
11320 else
11321 return LIN(p0, 1.0, p1, 0.0, atm->p[ip]);
11322}
11323
11324/*****************************************************************************/
11325
11326void write_atm_asc(
11327 const char *filename,
11328 const ctl_t *ctl,
11329 const atm_t *atm,
11330 const double t) {
11331
11332 FILE *out;
11333
11334 /* Set time interval for output... */
11335 const double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
11336 const double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
11337
11338 /* Check if gnuplot output is requested... */
11339 if (ctl->atm_gpfile[0] != '-') {
11340
11341 /* Create gnuplot pipe... */
11342 if (!(out = popen("gnuplot", "w")))
11343 ERRMSG("Cannot create pipe to gnuplot!");
11344
11345 /* Set plot filename... */
11346 fprintf(out, "set out \"%s.png\"\n", filename);
11347
11348 /* Set time string... */
11349 double r;
11350 int year, mon, day, hour, min, sec;
11351 jsec2time(t, &year, &mon, &day, &hour, &min, &sec, &r);
11352 fprintf(out, "timestr=\"%d-%02d-%02d, %02d:%02d UTC\"\n",
11353 year, mon, day, hour, min);
11354
11355 /* Dump gnuplot file to pipe... */
11356 FILE *in;
11357 if (!(in = fopen(ctl->atm_gpfile, "r")))
11358 ERRMSG("Cannot open file!");
11359 char line[LEN];
11360 while (fgets(line, LEN, in))
11361 fprintf(out, "%s", line);
11362 fclose(in);
11363 }
11364
11365 else {
11366
11367 /* Create file... */
11368 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
11369 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
11370 }
11371
11372 /* Write header... */
11373 fprintf(out,
11374 "# $1 = time [s]\n"
11375 "# $2 = altitude [km]\n"
11376 "# $3 = longitude [deg]\n" "# $4 = latitude [deg]\n");
11377 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
11378 fprintf(out, "# $%i = %s [%s]\n", iq + 5, ctl->qnt_name[iq],
11379 ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
11380 fprintf(out, "\n");
11381
11382 /* Write data... */
11383 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip += ctl->atm_stride) {
11384
11385 /* Check time... */
11386 if (ctl->atm_filter == 2 && (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1))
11387 continue;
11388
11389 /* Write output... */
11390 fprintf(out, "%.2f %g %g %g", atm->time[ip], Z(atm->p[ip]),
11391 atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip]);
11392 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
11393 fprintf(out, " ");
11394 if (ctl->atm_filter == 1 && (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1))
11395 fprintf(out, ctl->qnt_format[iq], NAN);
11396 else
11397 fprintf(out, ctl->qnt_format[iq], atm->q[iq][ip]);
11398 }
11399 fprintf(out, "\n");
11400 }
11401
11402 /* Close file... */
11403 fclose(out);
11404}
11405
11406/*****************************************************************************/
11407
11408void write_atm_bin(
11409 const char *filename,
11410 const ctl_t *ctl,
11411 const atm_t *atm) {
11412
11413 FILE *out;
11414
11415 /* Create file... */
11416 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
11417 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
11418
11419 /* Write version of binary data... */
11420 int version = 100;
11421 FWRITE(&version, int,
11422 1,
11423 out);
11424
11425 /* Write data... */
11426 FWRITE(&atm->np, int,
11427 1,
11428 out);
11429 FWRITE(atm->time, double,
11430 (size_t) atm->np,
11431 out);
11432 FWRITE(atm->p, double,
11433 (size_t) atm->np,
11434 out);
11435 FWRITE(atm->lon, double,
11436 (size_t) atm->np,
11437 out);
11438 FWRITE(atm->lat, double,
11439 (size_t) atm->np,
11440 out);
11441 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
11442 FWRITE(atm->q[iq], double,
11443 (size_t) atm->np,
11444 out);
11445
11446 /* Write final flag... */
11447 int final = 999;
11448 FWRITE(&final, int,
11449 1,
11450 out);
11451
11452 /* Close file... */
11453 fclose(out);
11454}
11455
11456/*****************************************************************************/
11457
11458void write_atm_clams(
11459 const char *filename,
11460 const ctl_t *ctl,
11461 const atm_t *atm) {
11462
11463 int tid, pid, ncid, varid;
11464 size_t start[2], count[2];
11465
11466 /* Create file... */
11467 nc_create(filename, NC_NETCDF4, &ncid);
11468
11469 /* Define dimensions... */
11470 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "time", 1, &tid));
11471 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "NPARTS", (size_t) atm->np, &pid));
11472
11473 /* Define variables and their attributes... */
11474 int dim_ids[2] = { tid, pid };
11475 NC_DEF_VAR("time", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &tid, "Time",
11476 "seconds since 2000-01-01 00:00:00 UTC", ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11477 NC_DEF_VAR("LAT", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &pid, "Latitude", "deg",
11478 ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11479 NC_DEF_VAR("LON", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &pid, "Longitude", "deg",
11480 ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11481 NC_DEF_VAR("PRESS", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &pid, "Pressure", "hPa",
11482 ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11483 NC_DEF_VAR("ZETA", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &pid, "Zeta", "K", ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11484 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
11485 NC_DEF_VAR(ctl->qnt_name[iq], NC_DOUBLE, 2, dim_ids,
11486 ctl->qnt_name[iq], ctl->qnt_unit[iq],
11487 ctl->atm_nc_level, ctl->atm_nc_quant[iq]);
11488
11489 /* Define global attributes... */
11490 NC_PUT_ATT_GLOBAL("exp_VERTCOOR_name", "zeta");
11491 NC_PUT_ATT_GLOBAL("model", "MPTRAC");
11492
11493 /* End definitions... */
11494 NC(nc_enddef(ncid));
11495
11496 /* Write data... */
11497 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("time", atm->time, 0);
11498 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("LAT", atm->lat, 0);
11499 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("LON", atm->lon, 0);
11500 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("PRESS", atm->p, 0);
11501 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("ZETA", atm->q[ctl->qnt_zeta_d], 0);
11502 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
11503 NC_PUT_DOUBLE(ctl->qnt_name[iq], atm->q[iq], 0);
11504
11505 /* Close file... */
11506 NC(nc_close(ncid));
11507}
11508
11509/*****************************************************************************/
11510
11511void write_atm_clams_traj(
11512 const char *dirname,
11513 const ctl_t *ctl,
11514 const atm_t *atm,
11515 const double t) {
11516
11517 /* Global Counter... */
11518 static size_t out_cnt = 0;
11519
11520 double r, r_start, r_stop;
11521 int year, mon, day, hour, min, sec;
11522 int year_start, mon_start, day_start, hour_start, min_start, sec_start;
11523 int year_stop, mon_stop, day_stop, hour_stop, min_stop, sec_stop;
11524 char filename_out[2 * LEN] = "traj_fix_3d_YYYYMMDDHH_YYYYMMDDHH.nc";
11525
11526 int ncid, varid, tid, pid, cid;
11527 int dim_ids[2];
11528
11529 /* time, nparc */
11530 size_t start[2];
11531 size_t count[2];
11532
11533 /* Determine start and stop times of calculation... */
11534 jsec2time(t, &year, &mon, &day, &hour, &min, &sec, &r);
11535 jsec2time(ctl->t_start, &year_start, &mon_start, &day_start, &hour_start,
11536 &min_start, &sec_start, &r_start);
11537 jsec2time(ctl->t_stop, &year_stop, &mon_stop, &day_stop, &hour_stop,
11538 &min_stop, &sec_stop, &r_stop);
11539
11540 sprintf(filename_out,
11541 "%s/traj_fix_3d_%02d%02d%02d%02d_%02d%02d%02d%02d.nc", dirname,
11542 year_start % 100, mon_start, day_start, hour_start,
11543 year_stop % 100, mon_stop, day_stop, hour_stop);
11544 LOG(1, "Write traj file: %s", filename_out);
11545
11546 /* Define hyperslap for the traj_file... */
11547 start[0] = out_cnt;
11548 start[1] = 0;
11549 count[0] = 1;
11550 count[1] = (size_t) atm->np;
11551
11552 /* Create the file at the first timestep... */
11553 if (out_cnt == 0) {
11554
11555 /* Create file... */
11556 NC(nc_create(filename_out, NC_NETCDF4, &ncid));
11557
11558 /* Define dimensions... */
11559 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "time", NC_UNLIMITED, &tid));
11560 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "NPARTS", (size_t) atm->np, &pid));
11561 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "TMDT", 7, &cid));
11562 dim_ids[0] = tid;
11563 dim_ids[1] = pid;
11564
11565 /* Define variables and their attributes... */
11566 NC_DEF_VAR("time", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &tid, "Time",
11567 "seconds since 2000-01-01 00:00:00 UTC", ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11568 NC_DEF_VAR("LAT", NC_DOUBLE, 2, dim_ids, "Latitude", "deg",
11569 ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11570 NC_DEF_VAR("LON", NC_DOUBLE, 2, dim_ids, "Longitude", "deg",
11571 ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11572 NC_DEF_VAR("PRESS", NC_DOUBLE, 2, dim_ids, "Pressure", "hPa",
11573 ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11574 NC_DEF_VAR("ZETA", NC_DOUBLE, 2, dim_ids, "Zeta", "K",
11575 ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11576 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
11577 NC_DEF_VAR(ctl->qnt_name[iq], NC_DOUBLE, 2, dim_ids,
11578 ctl->qnt_name[iq], ctl->qnt_unit[iq],
11579 ctl->atm_nc_level, ctl->atm_nc_quant[iq]);
11580
11581 /* Define global attributes... */
11582 NC_PUT_ATT_GLOBAL("exp_VERTCOOR_name", "zeta");
11583 NC_PUT_ATT_GLOBAL("model", "MPTRAC");
11584
11585 /* End definitions... */
11586 NC(nc_enddef(ncid));
11587 NC(nc_close(ncid));
11588 }
11589
11590 /* Increment global counter to change hyperslap... */
11591 out_cnt++;
11592
11593 /* Open file... */
11594 NC(nc_open(filename_out, NC_WRITE, &ncid));
11595
11596 /* Write data... */
11597 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("time", atm->time, 1);
11598 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("LAT", atm->lat, 1);
11599 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("LON", atm->lon, 1);
11600 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("PRESS", atm->p, 1);
11601 if (ctl->advect_vert_coord == 1) {
11602 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("ZETA", atm->q[ctl->qnt_zeta], 1);
11603 } else if (ctl->qnt_zeta >= 0) {
11604 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("ZETA", atm->q[ctl->qnt_zeta_d], 1);
11605 }
11606 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
11607 NC_PUT_DOUBLE(ctl->qnt_name[iq], atm->q[iq], 1);
11608
11609 /* Close file... */
11610 NC(nc_close(ncid));
11611
11612 /* At the last time step create the init_fix_YYYYMMDDHH file... */
11613 if ((year == year_stop) && (mon == mon_stop)
11614 && (day == day_stop) && (hour == hour_stop)) {
11615
11616 /* Set filename... */
11617 char filename_init[2 * LEN] = "./init_fix_YYYYMMDDHH.nc";
11618 sprintf(filename_init, "%s/init_fix_%02d%02d%02d%02d.nc",
11619 dirname, year_stop % 100, mon_stop, day_stop, hour_stop);
11620 LOG(1, "Write init file: %s", filename_init);
11621
11622 /* Create file... */
11623 nc_create(filename_init, NC_NETCDF4, &ncid);
11624
11625 /* Define dimensions... */
11626 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "time", 1, &tid));
11627 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "NPARTS", (size_t) atm->np, &pid));
11628 dim_ids[0] = tid;
11629 dim_ids[1] = pid;
11630
11631 /* Define variables and their attributes... */
11632 NC_DEF_VAR("time", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &tid, "Time",
11633 "seconds since 2000-01-01 00:00:00 UTC", ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11634 NC_DEF_VAR("LAT", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &pid, "Latitude", "deg",
11635 ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11636 NC_DEF_VAR("LON", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &pid, "Longitude", "deg",
11637 ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11638 NC_DEF_VAR("PRESS", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &pid, "Pressure", "hPa",
11639 ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11640 NC_DEF_VAR("ZETA", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &pid, "Zeta", "K", ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11641 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
11642 NC_DEF_VAR(ctl->qnt_name[iq], NC_DOUBLE, 2, dim_ids,
11643 ctl->qnt_name[iq], ctl->qnt_unit[iq],
11644 ctl->atm_nc_level, ctl->atm_nc_quant[iq]);
11645
11646 /* Define global attributes... */
11647 NC_PUT_ATT_GLOBAL("exp_VERTCOOR_name", "zeta");
11648 NC_PUT_ATT_GLOBAL("model", "MPTRAC");
11649
11650 /* End definitions... */
11651 NC(nc_enddef(ncid));
11652
11653 /* Write data... */
11654 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("time", atm->time, 0);
11655 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("LAT", atm->lat, 0);
11656 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("LON", atm->lon, 0);
11657 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("PRESS", atm->p, 0);
11658 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("ZETA", atm->q[ctl->qnt_zeta_d], 0);
11659 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
11660 NC_PUT_DOUBLE(ctl->qnt_name[iq], atm->q[iq], 0);
11661
11662 /* Close file... */
11663 NC(nc_close(ncid));
11664 }
11665}
11666
11667/*****************************************************************************/
11668
11669void write_atm_nc(
11670 const char *filename,
11671 const ctl_t *ctl,
11672 const atm_t *atm) {
11673
11674 int ncid, obsid, varid;
11675
11676 size_t start[2], count[2];
11677
11678 /* Create file... */
11679 NC(nc_create(filename, NC_NETCDF4, &ncid));
11680
11681 /* Define dimensions... */
11682 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "obs", (size_t) atm->np, &obsid));
11683
11684 /* Define variables and their attributes... */
11685 NC_DEF_VAR("time", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &obsid, "time",
11686 "seconds since 2000-01-01 00:00:00 UTC", ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11687 NC_DEF_VAR("press", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &obsid, "pressure", "hPa",
11688 ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11689 NC_DEF_VAR("lon", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &obsid, "longitude", "degrees_east",
11690 ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11691 NC_DEF_VAR("lat", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &obsid, "latitude", "degrees_north",
11692 ctl->atm_nc_level, 0);
11693 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
11694 NC_DEF_VAR(ctl->qnt_name[iq], NC_DOUBLE, 1, &obsid,
11695 ctl->qnt_longname[iq], ctl->qnt_unit[iq],
11696 ctl->atm_nc_level, ctl->atm_nc_quant[iq]);
11697
11698 /* Define global attributes... */
11699 NC_PUT_ATT_GLOBAL("featureType", "point");
11700
11701 /* End definitions... */
11702 NC(nc_enddef(ncid));
11703
11704 /* Write data... */
11705 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("time", atm->time, 0);
11706 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("press", atm->p, 0);
11707 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("lon", atm->lon, 0);
11708 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("lat", atm->lat, 0);
11709 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
11710 NC_PUT_DOUBLE(ctl->qnt_name[iq], atm->q[iq], 0);
11711
11712 /* Close file... */
11713 NC(nc_close(ncid));
11714}
11715
11716/*****************************************************************************/
11717
11718void write_csi(
11719 const char *filename,
11720 const ctl_t *ctl,
11721 const atm_t *atm,
11722 const double t) {
11723
11724 static FILE *out;
11725
11726 static double *modmean, *obsmean, *obsstd, *rt, *rz, *rlon, *rlat, *robs,
11727 *area, dlon, dlat, dz, x[NCSI], y[NCSI], obsstdn[NCSI], kz[EP], kw[EP];
11728
11729 static int *obscount, nobs, nk;
11730
11731 static int ct[NENS], cx[NENS], cy[NENS], cz[NENS], n[NENS];
11732
11733 const int ensemble = (ctl->nens > 0);
11734
11735 /* Set timer */
11736 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_CSI", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
11737
11738 /* Check quantities... */
11739 if (ctl->qnt_m < 0)
11740 ERRMSG("Need quantity mass!");
11741 if (ensemble) {
11742 if (ctl->qnt_ens < 0)
11743 ERRMSG("Missing ensemble IDs!");
11744 if (ctl->nens > NENS)
11745 ERRMSG("Too many ensembles!");
11746 }
11747
11748 /* Init... */
11749 if (t == ctl->t_start) {
11750
11751 /* Allocate.. */
11752 ALLOC(area, double,
11753 ctl->csi_ny);
11754 ALLOC(rt, double,
11755 NOBS);
11756 ALLOC(rz, double,
11757 NOBS);
11758 ALLOC(rlon, double,
11759 NOBS);
11760 ALLOC(rlat, double,
11761 NOBS);
11762 ALLOC(robs, double,
11763 NOBS);
11764
11765 /* Read observation data... */
11766 read_obs(ctl->csi_obsfile, ctl, rt, rz, rlon, rlat, robs, &nobs);
11767
11768 /* Read kernel data... */
11769 if (ctl->csi_kernel[0] != '-')
11770 read_kernel(ctl->csi_kernel, kz, kw, &nk);
11771
11772 /* Create new file... */
11773 LOG(1, "Write CSI%s data: %s", ensemble ? " ensemble" : "", filename);
11774 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
11775 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
11776
11777 /* Write header... */
11778 fprintf(out,
11779 "# $1 = time [s]\n"
11780 "# $2 = ensemble ID\n"
11781 "# $3 = number of hits (cx)\n"
11782 "# $4 = number of misses (cy)\n"
11783 "# $5 = number of false alarms (cz)\n"
11784 "# $6 = number of observations (cx + cy)\n"
11785 "# $7 = number of forecasts (cx + cz)\n"
11786 "# $8 = bias (%%)\n"
11787 "# $9 = POD (%%)\n"
11788 "# $10 = FAR (%%)\n"
11789 "# $11 = CSI (%%)\n"
11790 "# $12 = hits by random chance\n"
11791 "# $13 = ETS (%%)\n"
11792 "# $14 = Pearson R\n"
11793 "# $15 = Spearman R\n"
11794 "# $16 = mean error [kg/m²]\n"
11795 "# $17 = RMSE [kg/m²]\n"
11796 "# $18 = MAE [kg/m²]\n"
11797 "# $19 = log-likelihood\n" "# $20 = number of points\n\n");
11798
11799 /* Set grid box size... */
11800 dz = (ctl->csi_z1 - ctl->csi_z0) / ctl->csi_nz;
11801 dlon = (ctl->csi_lon1 - ctl->csi_lon0) / ctl->csi_nx;
11802 dlat = (ctl->csi_lat1 - ctl->csi_lat0) / ctl->csi_ny;
11803
11804 /* Set horizontal coordinates... */
11805 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->csi_ny; iy++) {
11806 const double lat = ctl->csi_lat0 + dlat * (iy + 0.5);
11807 area[iy] = dlat * dlon * SQR(RE * M_PI / 180.0) * cos(DEG2RAD(lat));
11808 }
11809 }
11810
11811 /* Set time interval... */
11812 const double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
11813 const double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
11814
11815 /* Allocate... */
11816 int grid_size = ctl->csi_nx * ctl->csi_ny * ctl->csi_nz;
11817 ALLOC(modmean, double,
11818 (ensemble ? ctl->nens : 1) * grid_size);
11819 ALLOC(obsmean, double,
11820 grid_size);
11821 ALLOC(obscount, int,
11822 grid_size);
11823 ALLOC(obsstd, double,
11824 grid_size);
11825
11826 /* Init... */
11827 for (int i = 0; i < (ensemble ? ctl->nens : 1); i++)
11828 ct[i] = cx[i] = cy[i] = cz[i] = n[i] = 0;
11829
11830 /* Loop over observations... */
11831 for (int i = 0; i < nobs; i++) {
11832 if (rt[i] < t0 || rt[i] >= t1 || !isfinite(robs[i]))
11833 continue;
11834
11835 /* Calculate indices... */
11836 const int ix = (int) ((rlon[i] - ctl->csi_lon0) / dlon);
11837 const int iy = (int) ((rlat[i] - ctl->csi_lat0) / dlat);
11838 const int iz = (int) ((rz[i] - ctl->csi_z0) / dz);
11839 if (ix < 0 || ix >= ctl->csi_nx || iy < 0 || iy >= ctl->csi_ny || iz < 0
11840 || iz >= ctl->csi_nz)
11841 continue;
11842
11843 /* Get mean observation index... */
11844 const int idx = ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->csi_ny, iz, ctl->csi_nz);
11845 obsmean[idx] += robs[i];
11846 obsstd[idx] += SQR(robs[i]);
11847 obscount[idx]++;
11848 }
11849
11850 /* Analyze model data... */
11851 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip++) {
11852
11853 /* Check time... */
11854 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
11855 continue;
11856
11857 /* Get ensemble ID... */
11858 int ens_id = ensemble ? (int) atm->q[ctl->qnt_ens][ip] : 0;
11859 if (ens_id < 0 || ens_id >= (ensemble ? ctl->nens : 1))
11860 ERRMSG("Ensemble ID out of range!");
11861
11862 /* Get indices... */
11863 const int ix = (int) ((atm->lon[ip] - ctl->csi_lon0) / dlon);
11864 const int iy = (int) ((atm->lat[ip] - ctl->csi_lat0) / dlat);
11865 const int iz = (int) ((Z(atm->p[ip]) - ctl->csi_z0) / dz);
11866 if (ix < 0 || ix >= ctl->csi_nx || iy < 0 || iy >= ctl->csi_ny || iz < 0
11867 || iz >= ctl->csi_nz)
11868 continue;
11869
11870 /* Get total mass in grid cell... */
11871 const int idx =
11872 ens_id * grid_size + ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->csi_ny, iz, ctl->csi_nz);
11873 modmean[idx] +=
11874 kernel_weight(kz, kw, nk, atm->p[ip]) * atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip];
11875 }
11876 for (int e = 0; e < (ensemble ? ctl->nens : 1); e++) {
11877 /* Analyze all grid cells... */
11878 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->csi_nx; ix++)
11879 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->csi_ny; iy++)
11880 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->csi_nz; iz++) {
11881
11882 /* Calculate mean observation index... */
11883 const int idx = ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->csi_ny, iz, ctl->csi_nz);
11884 if (e == 0)
11885 if (obscount[idx]) {
11886 obsmean[idx] /= obscount[idx];
11887 obsstd[idx] =
11888 sqrt(obsstd[idx] / obscount[idx] - SQR(obsmean[idx]));
11889 }
11890
11891 /* Calculate model mean per ensemble... */
11892 const int midx = e * grid_size + idx;
11893 if (modmean[midx] > 0)
11894 modmean[midx] /= (1e6 * area[iy]);
11895
11896 /* Check number of observations... */
11897 if (obscount[idx]) {
11898
11899 /* Calculate CSI... */
11900 ct[e]++;
11901 if (obsmean[idx] >= ctl->csi_obsmin
11902 && modmean[midx] >= ctl->csi_modmin)
11903 cx[e]++;
11904 else if (obsmean[idx] >= ctl->csi_obsmin)
11905 cy[e]++;
11906 else if (modmean[midx] >= ctl->csi_modmin)
11907 cz[e]++;
11908
11909 /* Save data for other verification statistics... */
11910 if (obsmean[idx] >= ctl->csi_obsmin
11911 || modmean[midx] >= ctl->csi_modmin) {
11912 x[n[e]] = modmean[midx];
11913 y[n[e]] = obsmean[idx];
11914 if (modmean[midx] >= ctl->csi_modmin)
11915 obsstdn[n[e]] = obsstd[idx];
11916 if ((++n[e]) >= NCSI)
11917 ERRMSG("Too many points for statistics!");
11918 }
11919 }
11920 }
11921 /* Write output... */
11922 if (fmod(t, ctl->csi_dt_out) == 0) {
11923
11924 if (n[e] == 0)
11925 continue;
11926
11927 /* Calculate verification statistics
11928 (https://www.cawcr.gov.au/projects/verification/) ... */
11929 static double work[2 * NCSI], work2[2 * NCSI];
11930 const int n_obs = cx[e] + cy[e];
11931 const int n_for = cx[e] + cz[e];
11932 const double cx_rd = (ct[e] > 0) ? (1. * n_obs * n_for) / ct[e] : NAN;
11933 const double bias = (n_obs > 0) ? 100. * n_for / n_obs : NAN;
11934 const double pod = (n_obs > 0) ? 100. * cx[e] / n_obs : NAN;
11935 const double far = (n_for > 0) ? 100. * cz[e] / n_for : NAN;
11936 const double csi =
11937 (cx[e] + cy[e] + cz[e] >
11938 0) ? 100. * cx[e] / (cx[e] + cy[e] + cz[e]) : NAN;
11939 const double ets =
11940 (cx[e] + cy[e] + cz[e] - cx_rd >
11941 0) ? 100. * (cx[e] - cx_rd) / (cx[e] + cy[e] + cz[e] - cx_rd) : NAN;
11942 const double rho_p = gsl_stats_correlation(x, 1, y, 1, (size_t) n[e]);
11943 const double rho_s =
11944 gsl_stats_spearman(x, 1, y, 1, (size_t) n[e], work);
11945 for (int i = 0; i < n[e]; i++) {
11946 work[i] = x[i] - y[i];
11947 work2[i] = (obsstdn[i] != 0) ? work[i] / obsstdn[i] : 0;
11948 }
11949 const double mean = gsl_stats_mean(work, 1, (size_t) n[e]);
11950 const double rmse =
11951 gsl_stats_sd_with_fixed_mean(work, 1, (size_t) n[e], 0.0);
11952 const double absdev = gsl_stats_absdev_m(work, 1, (size_t) n[e], 0.0);
11953 const double loglikelihood =
11954 gsl_stats_tss_m(work2, 1, (size_t) n[e], 0.0) * -0.5;
11955
11956 /* Write... */
11957 fprintf(out,
11958 "%.2f %d %d %d %d %d %d %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %d\n",
11959 t, ensemble ? e : -999, cx[e], cy[e], cz[e], n_obs, n_for, bias,
11960 pod, far, csi, cx_rd, ets, rho_p, rho_s, mean, rmse, absdev,
11961 loglikelihood, n[e]);
11962
11963 /* Set counters to zero... */
11964 for (int i = 0; i < n[e]; i++)
11965 work[i] = work2[i] = x[i] = y[i] = obsstdn[i] = 0;
11966 ct[e] = cx[e] = cy[e] = cz[e] = n[e] = 0;
11967 }
11968 }
11969 /* Free... */
11970 free(modmean);
11971 free(obsmean);
11972 free(obscount);
11973 free(obsstd);
11974
11975 /* Finalize... */
11976 if (t == ctl->t_stop) {
11977
11978 /* Close output file... */
11979 fclose(out);
11980
11981 /* Free... */
11982 free(area);
11983 free(rt);
11984 free(rz);
11985 free(rlon);
11986 free(rlat);
11987 free(robs);
11988 }
11989}
11990
11991/*****************************************************************************/
11992
11993void write_ens(
11994 const char *filename,
11995 const ctl_t *ctl,
11996 const atm_t *atm,
11997 const double t) {
11998
11999 static FILE *out;
12000
12001 static double dummy, lat, lon, qm[NQ][NENS], qs[NQ][NENS], xm[NENS][3],
12002 x[3], zm[NENS];
12003
12004 static int n[NENS];
12005
12006 /* Set timer... */
12007 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_ENS", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
12008
12009 /* Check quantities... */
12010 if (ctl->qnt_ens < 0)
12011 ERRMSG("Missing ensemble IDs!");
12012
12013 /* Set time interval... */
12014 const double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
12015 const double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
12016
12017 /* Init... */
12018 for (int i = 0; i < NENS; i++) {
12019 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
12020 qm[iq][i] = qs[iq][i] = 0;
12021 xm[i][0] = xm[i][1] = xm[i][2] = zm[i] = 0;
12022 n[i] = 0;
12023 }
12024
12025 /* Loop over air parcels... */
12026 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip++) {
12027
12028 /* Check time... */
12029 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
12030 continue;
12031
12032 /* Check ensemble ID... */
12033 if (atm->q[ctl->qnt_ens][ip] < 0 || atm->q[ctl->qnt_ens][ip] >= NENS)
12034 ERRMSG("Ensemble ID is out of range!");
12035
12036 /* Get means... */
12037 geo2cart(0, atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip], x);
12038 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
12039 qm[iq][ctl->qnt_ens] += atm->q[iq][ip];
12040 qs[iq][ctl->qnt_ens] += SQR(atm->q[iq][ip]);
12041 }
12042 xm[ctl->qnt_ens][0] += x[0];
12043 xm[ctl->qnt_ens][1] += x[1];
12044 xm[ctl->qnt_ens][2] += x[2];
12045 zm[ctl->qnt_ens] += Z(atm->p[ip]);
12046 n[ctl->qnt_ens]++;
12047 }
12048
12049 /* Create file... */
12050 LOG(1, "Write ensemble data: %s", filename);
12051 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
12052 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
12053
12054 /* Write header... */
12055 fprintf(out,
12056 "# $1 = time [s]\n"
12057 "# $2 = altitude [km]\n"
12058 "# $3 = longitude [deg]\n" "# $4 = latitude [deg]\n");
12059 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
12060 fprintf(out, "# $%d = %s (mean) [%s]\n", 5 + iq,
12061 ctl->qnt_name[iq], ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
12062 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
12063 fprintf(out, "# $%d = %s (sigma) [%s]\n", 5 + ctl->nq + iq,
12064 ctl->qnt_name[iq], ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
12065 fprintf(out, "# $%d = number of members\n\n", 5 + 2 * ctl->nq);
12066
12067 /* Write data... */
12068 for (int i = 0; i < NENS; i++)
12069 if (n[i] > 0) {
12070 cart2geo(xm[i], &dummy, &lon, &lat);
12071 fprintf(out, "%.2f %g %g %g", t, zm[i] / n[i], lon, lat);
12072 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
12073 fprintf(out, " ");
12074 fprintf(out, ctl->qnt_format[iq], qm[iq][i] / n[i]);
12075 }
12076 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
12077 fprintf(out, " ");
12078 double var = qs[iq][i] / n[i] - SQR(qm[iq][i] / n[i]);
12079 fprintf(out, ctl->qnt_format[iq], (var > 0 ? sqrt(var) : 0));
12080 }
12081 fprintf(out, " %d\n", n[i]);
12082 }
12083
12084 /* Close file... */
12085 fclose(out);
12086}
12087
12088/*****************************************************************************/
12089
12090void write_grid(
12091 const char *filename,
12092 const ctl_t *ctl,
12093 met_t *met0,
12094 met_t *met1,
12095 const atm_t *atm,
12096 const double t) {
12097
12098 static double kz[EP], kw[EP];
12099
12100 static int nk;
12101
12102 double *cd, *mean[NQ], *sigma[NQ], *vmr_impl, *z, *lon, *lat, *area, *press;
12103
12104 int *ixs, *iys, *izs, *np;
12105
12106 /* Set timer... */
12107 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_GRID", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
12108
12109 /* Write info... */
12110 LOG(1, "Write grid data: %s", filename);
12111
12112 /* Init... */
12113 if (t == ctl->t_start) {
12114
12115 /* Read kernel data... */
12116 if (ctl->grid_kernel[0] != '-')
12117 read_kernel(ctl->grid_kernel, kz, kw, &nk);
12118 }
12119
12120 /* Allocate... */
12121 ALLOC(cd, double,
12122 ctl->grid_nx * ctl->grid_ny * ctl->grid_nz);
12123 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
12124 ALLOC(mean[iq], double,
12125 ctl->grid_nx * ctl->grid_ny * ctl->grid_nz);
12126 ALLOC(sigma[iq], double,
12127 ctl->grid_nx * ctl->grid_ny * ctl->grid_nz);
12128 }
12129 ALLOC(vmr_impl, double,
12130 ctl->grid_nx * ctl->grid_ny * ctl->grid_nz);
12131 ALLOC(z, double,
12132 ctl->grid_nz);
12133 ALLOC(lon, double,
12134 ctl->grid_nx);
12135 ALLOC(lat, double,
12136 ctl->grid_ny);
12137 ALLOC(area, double,
12138 ctl->grid_ny);
12139 ALLOC(press, double,
12140 ctl->grid_nz);
12141 ALLOC(np, int,
12142 ctl->grid_nx * ctl->grid_ny * ctl->grid_nz);
12143 ALLOC(ixs, int,
12144 atm->np);
12145 ALLOC(iys, int,
12146 atm->np);
12147 ALLOC(izs, int,
12148 atm->np);
12149
12150 /* Set grid box size... */
12151 const double dz = (ctl->grid_z1 - ctl->grid_z0) / ctl->grid_nz;
