12152 const double dlon = (ctl->grid_lon1 - ctl->grid_lon0) / ctl->grid_nx;
12153 const double dlat = (ctl->grid_lat1 - ctl->grid_lat0) / ctl->grid_ny;
12154
12155 /* Set vertical coordinates... */
12156#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
12157 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->grid_nz; iz++) {
12158 z[iz] = ctl->grid_z0 + dz * (iz + 0.5);
12159 press[iz] = P(z[iz]);
12160 }
12161
12162 /* Set horizontal coordinates... */
12163 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->grid_nx; ix++)
12164 lon[ix] = ctl->grid_lon0 + dlon * (ix + 0.5);
12165#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
12166 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->grid_ny; iy++) {
12167 lat[iy] = ctl->grid_lat0 + dlat * (iy + 0.5);
12168 area[iy] = dlat * dlon * SQR(RE * M_PI / 180.) * cos(DEG2RAD(lat[iy]));
12169 }
12170
12171 /* Set time interval for output... */
12172 const double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
12173 const double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
12174
12175 /* Get grid box indices... */
12176#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
12177 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip++) {
12178 ixs[ip] = (int) ((atm->lon[ip] - ctl->grid_lon0) / dlon);
12179 iys[ip] = (int) ((atm->lat[ip] - ctl->grid_lat0) / dlat);
12180 izs[ip] = (int) ((Z(atm->p[ip]) - ctl->grid_z0) / dz);
12181 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1
12182 || ixs[ip] < 0 || ixs[ip] >= ctl->grid_nx
12183 || iys[ip] < 0 || iys[ip] >= ctl->grid_ny
12184 || izs[ip] < 0 || izs[ip] >= ctl->grid_nz)
12185 izs[ip] = -1;
12186 }
12187
12188 /* Average data... */
12189 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip++)
12190 if (izs[ip] >= 0) {
12191 const int idx =
12192 ARRAY_3D(ixs[ip], iys[ip], ctl->grid_ny, izs[ip], ctl->grid_nz);
12193 const double kernel = kernel_weight(kz, kw, nk, atm->p[ip]);
12194 np[idx]++;
12195 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
12196 mean[iq][idx] += kernel * atm->q[iq][ip];
12197 sigma[iq][idx] += SQR(kernel * atm->q[iq][ip]);
12198 }
12199 }
12200
12201 /* Calculate column density and volume mixing ratio... */
12202#pragma omp parallel for default(shared)
12203 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->grid_nx; ix++)
12204 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->grid_ny; iy++)
12205 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->grid_nz; iz++) {
12206
12207 /* Get grid index... */
12208 const int idx = ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->grid_ny, iz, ctl->grid_nz);
12209
12210 /* Calculate column density... */
12211 cd[idx] = NAN;
12212 if (ctl->qnt_m >= 0)
12213 cd[idx] = mean[ctl->qnt_m][idx] / (1e6 * area[iy]);
12214
12215 /* Calculate volume mixing ratio (implicit)... */
12216 vmr_impl[idx] = NAN;
12217 if (ctl->qnt_m >= 0 && ctl->molmass > 0 && met0 != NULL
12218 && met1 != NULL) {
12219 vmr_impl[idx] = 0;
12220 if (mean[ctl->qnt_m][idx] > 0) {
12221
12222 /* Get temperature... */
12223 double temp;
12224 INTPOL_INIT;
12225 intpol_met_time_3d(met0, met0->t, met1, met1->t, t, press[iz],
12226 lon[ix], lat[iy], &temp, ci, cw, 1);
12227
12228 /* Calculate volume mixing ratio... */
12229 vmr_impl[idx] =
12230 MA / ctl->molmass * cd[idx] / (RHO(press[iz], temp) * dz * 1e3);
12231 }
12232 }
12233
12234 /* Calculate mean... */
12235 if (np[idx] > 0)
12236 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
12237 mean[iq][idx] /= np[idx];
12238 const double var = sigma[iq][idx] / np[idx] - SQR(mean[iq][idx]);
12239 sigma[iq][idx] = (var > 0 ? sqrt(var) : 0);
12240 } else
12241 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
12242 mean[iq][idx] = NAN;
12243 sigma[iq][idx] = NAN;
12244 }
12245 }
12246
12247 /* Write ASCII data... */
12248 if (ctl->grid_type == 0)
12249 write_grid_asc(filename, ctl, cd, mean, sigma, vmr_impl,
12250 t, z, lon, lat, area, dz, np);
12251
12252 /* Write netCDF data... */
12253 else if (ctl->grid_type == 1)
12254 write_grid_nc(filename, ctl, cd, mean, sigma, vmr_impl,
12255 t, z, lon, lat, area, dz, np);
12256
12257 /* Error message... */
12258 else
12259 ERRMSG("Grid data format GRID_TYPE unknown!");
12260
12261 /* Free... */
12262 free(cd);
12263 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
12264 free(mean[iq]);
12265 free(sigma[iq]);
12266 }
12267 free(vmr_impl);
12268 free(z);
12269 free(lon);
12270 free(lat);
12271 free(area);
12272 free(press);
12273 free(np);
12274 free(ixs);
12275 free(iys);
12276 free(izs);
12277}
12278
12279/*****************************************************************************/
12280
12281void write_grid_asc(
12282 const char *filename,
12283 const ctl_t *ctl,
12284 const double *cd,
12285 double *mean[NQ],
12286 double *sigma[NQ],
12287 const double *vmr_impl,
12288 const double t,
12289 const double *z,
12290 const double *lon,
12291 const double *lat,
12292 const double *area,
12293 const double dz,
12294 const int *np) {
12295
12296 FILE *out;
12297
12298 /* Check if gnuplot output is requested... */
12299 if (ctl->grid_gpfile[0] != '-') {
12300
12301 /* Create gnuplot pipe... */
12302 if (!(out = popen("gnuplot", "w")))
12303 ERRMSG("Cannot create pipe to gnuplot!");
12304
12305 /* Set plot filename... */
12306 fprintf(out, "set out \"%s.png\"\n", filename);
12307
12308 /* Set time string... */
12309 double r;
12310 int year, mon, day, hour, min, sec;
12311 jsec2time(t, &year, &mon, &day, &hour, &min, &sec, &r);
12312 fprintf(out, "timestr=\"%d-%02d-%02d, %02d:%02d UTC\"\n",
12313 year, mon, day, hour, min);
12314
12315 /* Dump gnuplot file to pipe... */
12316 FILE *in;
12317 char line[LEN];
12318 if (!(in = fopen(ctl->grid_gpfile, "r")))
12319 ERRMSG("Cannot open file!");
12320 while (fgets(line, LEN, in))
12321 fprintf(out, "%s", line);
12322 fclose(in);
12323 }
12324
12325 else {
12326
12327 /* Create file... */
12328 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
12329 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
12330 }
12331
12332 /* Write header... */
12333 fprintf(out,
12334 "# $1 = time [s]\n"
12335 "# $2 = altitude [km]\n"
12336 "# $3 = longitude [deg]\n"
12337 "# $4 = latitude [deg]\n"
12338 "# $5 = surface area [km^2]\n"
12339 "# $6 = layer depth [km]\n"
12340 "# $7 = column density (implicit) [kg/m^2]\n"
12341 "# $8 = volume mixing ratio (implicit) [ppv]\n"
12342 "# $9 = number of particles [1]\n");
12343 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
12344 fprintf(out, "# $%i = %s (mean) [%s]\n", 10 + iq, ctl->qnt_name[iq],
12345 ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
12346 if (ctl->grid_stddev)
12347 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
12348 fprintf(out, "# $%i = %s (stddev) [%s]\n", 10 + ctl->nq + iq,
12349 ctl->qnt_name[iq], ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
12350 fprintf(out, "\n");
12351
12352 /* Write data... */
12353 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->grid_nx; ix++) {
12354 if (ix > 0 && ctl->grid_ny > 1 && !ctl->grid_sparse)
12355 fprintf(out, "\n");
12356 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->grid_ny; iy++) {
12357 if (iy > 0 && ctl->grid_nz > 1 && !ctl->grid_sparse)
12358 fprintf(out, "\n");
12359 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->grid_nz; iz++) {
12360 int idx = ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->grid_ny, iz, ctl->grid_nz);
12361 if (!ctl->grid_sparse || vmr_impl[idx] > 0) {
12362 fprintf(out, "%.2f %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %d", t, z[iz], lon[ix],
12363 lat[iy], area[iy], dz, cd[idx], vmr_impl[idx], np[idx]);
12364 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
12365 fprintf(out, " ");
12366 fprintf(out, ctl->qnt_format[iq], mean[iq][idx]);
12367 }
12368 if (ctl->grid_stddev)
12369 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
12370 fprintf(out, " ");
12371 fprintf(out, ctl->qnt_format[iq], sigma[iq][idx]);
12372 }
12373 fprintf(out, "\n");
12374 }
12375 }
12376 }
12377 }
12378
12379 /* Close file... */
12380 fclose(out);
12381}
12382
12383/*****************************************************************************/
12384
12385void write_grid_nc(
12386 const char *filename,
12387 const ctl_t *ctl,
12388 const double *cd,
12389 double *mean[NQ],
12390 double *sigma[NQ],
12391 const double *vmr_impl,
12392 const double t,
12393 const double *z,
12394 const double *lon,
12395 const double *lat,
12396 const double *area,
12397 const double dz,
12398 const int *np) {
12399
12400 char longname[2 * LEN], varname[2 * LEN];
12401
12402 double *help;
12403
12404 int *help2, ncid, dimid[10], varid;
12405
12406 size_t start[2], count[2];
12407
12408 /* Allocate... */
12409 ALLOC(help, double,
12410 ctl->grid_nx * ctl->grid_ny * ctl->grid_nz);
12411 ALLOC(help2, int,
12412 ctl->grid_nx * ctl->grid_ny * ctl->grid_nz);
12413
12414 /* Create file... */
12415 NC(nc_create(filename, NC_NETCDF4, &ncid));
12416
12417 /* Define dimensions... */
12418 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "time", 1, &dimid[0]));
12419 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "z", (size_t) ctl->grid_nz, &dimid[1]));
12420 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "lat", (size_t) ctl->grid_ny, &dimid[2]));
12421 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "lon", (size_t) ctl->grid_nx, &dimid[3]));
12422 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "dz", 1, &dimid[4]));
12423
12424 /* Define variables and their attributes... */
12425 NC_DEF_VAR("time", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &dimid[0], "time",
12426 "seconds since 2000-01-01 00:00:00 UTC", 0, 0);
12427 NC_DEF_VAR("z", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &dimid[1], "altitude", "km", 0, 0);
12428 NC_DEF_VAR("lat", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &dimid[2], "latitude", "degrees_north", 0,
12429 0);
12430 NC_DEF_VAR("lon", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &dimid[3], "longitude", "degrees_east", 0,
12431 0);
12432 NC_DEF_VAR("dz", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &dimid[1], "layer depth", "km", 0, 0);
12433 NC_DEF_VAR("area", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &dimid[2], "surface area", "km**2", 0, 0);
12434
12435 NC_DEF_VAR("cd", NC_FLOAT, 4, dimid, "column density", "kg m**-2",
12436 ctl->grid_nc_level, 0);
12437 NC_DEF_VAR("vmr_impl", NC_FLOAT, 4, dimid,
12438 "volume mixing ratio (implicit)", "ppv", ctl->grid_nc_level, 0);
12439 NC_DEF_VAR("np", NC_INT, 4, dimid, "number of particles", "1", 0, 0);
12440 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
12441 sprintf(varname, "%s_mean", ctl->qnt_name[iq]);
12442 sprintf(longname, "%s (mean)", ctl->qnt_longname[iq]);
12443 NC_DEF_VAR(varname, NC_DOUBLE, 4, dimid, longname, ctl->qnt_unit[iq],
12444 ctl->grid_nc_level, ctl->grid_nc_quant[iq]);
12445 if (ctl->grid_stddev) {
12446 sprintf(varname, "%s_stddev", ctl->qnt_name[iq]);
12447 sprintf(longname, "%s (stddev)", ctl->qnt_longname[iq]);
12448 NC_DEF_VAR(varname, NC_DOUBLE, 4, dimid, longname, ctl->qnt_unit[iq],
12449 ctl->grid_nc_level, ctl->grid_nc_quant[iq]);
12450 }
12451 }
12452 /* End definitions... */
12453 NC(nc_enddef(ncid));
12454
12455 /* Write data... */
12456 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("time", &t, 0);
12457 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("lon", lon, 0);
12458 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("lat", lat, 0);
12459 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("z", z, 0);
12460 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("area", area, 0);
12461 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("dz", &dz, 0);
12462
12463 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->grid_nx; ix++)
12464 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->grid_ny; iy++)
12465 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->grid_nz; iz++)
12466 help[ARRAY_3D(iz, iy, ctl->grid_ny, ix, ctl->grid_nx)] =
12467 cd[ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->grid_ny, iz, ctl->grid_nz)];
12468 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("cd", help, 0);
12469
12470 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->grid_nx; ix++)
12471 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->grid_ny; iy++)
12472 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->grid_nz; iz++)
12473 help[ARRAY_3D(iz, iy, ctl->grid_ny, ix, ctl->grid_nx)] =
12474 vmr_impl[ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->grid_ny, iz, ctl->grid_nz)];
12475 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("vmr_impl", help, 0);
12476
12477 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->grid_nx; ix++)
12478 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->grid_ny; iy++)
12479 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->grid_nz; iz++)
12480 help2[ARRAY_3D(iz, iy, ctl->grid_ny, ix, ctl->grid_nx)] =
12481 np[ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->grid_ny, iz, ctl->grid_nz)];
12482 NC_PUT_INT("np", help2, 0);
12483
12484 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
12485 sprintf(varname, "%s_mean", ctl->qnt_name[iq]);
12486 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->grid_nx; ix++)
12487 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->grid_ny; iy++)
12488 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->grid_nz; iz++)
12489 help[ARRAY_3D(iz, iy, ctl->grid_ny, ix, ctl->grid_nx)] =
12490 mean[iq][ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->grid_ny, iz, ctl->grid_nz)];
12491 NC_PUT_DOUBLE(varname, help, 0);
12492 }
12493
12494 if (ctl->grid_stddev)
12495 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
12496 sprintf(varname, "%s_stddev", ctl->qnt_name[iq]);
12497 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->grid_nx; ix++)
12498 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->grid_ny; iy++)
12499 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->grid_nz; iz++)
12500 help[ARRAY_3D(iz, iy, ctl->grid_ny, ix, ctl->grid_nx)] =
12501 sigma[iq][ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->grid_ny, iz, ctl->grid_nz)];
12502 NC_PUT_DOUBLE(varname, help, 0);
12503 }
12504
12505 /* Close file... */
12506 NC(nc_close(ncid));
12507
12508 /* Free... */
12509 free(help);
12510 free(help2);
12511}
12512
12513/*****************************************************************************/
12514
12515void write_met_bin(
12516 const char *filename,
12517 const ctl_t *ctl,
12518 met_t *met) {
12519
12520 /* Create file... */
12521 FILE *out;
12522 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
12523 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
12524
12525 /* Write type of binary data... */
12526 FWRITE(&ctl->met_type, int,
12527 1,
12528 out);
12529
12530 /* Write version of binary data... */
12531 int version = 103;
12532 FWRITE(&version, int,
12533 1,
12534 out);
12535
12536 /* Write grid data... */
12537 FWRITE(&met->time, double,
12538 1,
12539 out);
12540 FWRITE(&met->nx, int,
12541 1,
12542 out);
12543 FWRITE(&met->ny, int,
12544 1,
12545 out);
12546 FWRITE(&met->np, int,
12547 1,
12548 out);
12549 FWRITE(met->lon, double,
12550 (size_t) met->nx,
12551 out);
12552 FWRITE(met->lat, double,
12553 (size_t) met->ny,
12554 out);
12555 FWRITE(met->p, double,
12556 (size_t) met->np,
12557 out);
12558
12559 /* Write surface data... */
12560 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->ps, "PS");
12561 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->ts, "TS");
12562 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->zs, "ZS");
12563 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->us, "US");
12564 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->vs, "VS");
12565 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->ess, "ESS");
12566 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->nss, "NSS");
12567 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->shf, "SHF");
12568 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->lsm, "LSM");
12569 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->sst, "SST");
12570 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->pbl, "PBL");
12571 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->pt, "PT");
12572 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->tt, "TT");
12573 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->zt, "ZT");
12574 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->h2ot, "H2OT");
12575 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->pct, "PCT");
12576 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->pcb, "PCB");
12577 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->cl, "CL");
12578 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->plcl, "PLCL");
12579 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->plfc, "PLFC");
12580 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->pel, "PEL");
12581 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->cape, "CAPE");
12582 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->cin, "CIN");
12583 write_met_bin_2d(out, met, met->o3c, "O3C");
12584
12585 /* Write level data... */
12586 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->z, "Z",
12587 ctl->met_comp_prec[0], ctl->met_comp_tol[0]);
12588 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->t, "T",
12589 ctl->met_comp_prec[1], ctl->met_comp_tol[1]);
12590 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->u, "U",
12591 ctl->met_comp_prec[2], ctl->met_comp_tol[2]);
12592 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->v, "V",
12593 ctl->met_comp_prec[3], ctl->met_comp_tol[3]);
12594 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->w, "W",
12595 ctl->met_comp_prec[4], ctl->met_comp_tol[4]);
12596 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->pv, "PV",
12597 ctl->met_comp_prec[5], ctl->met_comp_tol[5]);
12598 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->h2o, "H2O",
12599 ctl->met_comp_prec[6], ctl->met_comp_tol[6]);
12600 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->o3, "O3",
12601 ctl->met_comp_prec[7], ctl->met_comp_tol[7]);
12602 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->lwc, "LWC",
12603 ctl->met_comp_prec[8], ctl->met_comp_tol[8]);
12604 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->rwc, "RWC",
12605 ctl->met_comp_prec[9], ctl->met_comp_tol[9]);
12606 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->iwc, "IWC",
12607 ctl->met_comp_prec[10], ctl->met_comp_tol[10]);
12608 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->swc, "SWC",
12609 ctl->met_comp_prec[11], ctl->met_comp_tol[11]);
12610 write_met_bin_3d(out, ctl, met, met->cc, "CC",
12611 ctl->met_comp_prec[12], ctl->met_comp_tol[12]);
12612 if (METVAR != 13)
12613 ERRMSG("Number of meteo variables doesn't match!");
12614
12615 /* Write final flag... */
12616 int final = 999;
12617 FWRITE(&final, int,
12618 1,
12619 out);
12620
12621 /* Close file... */
12622 fclose(out);
12623}
12624
12625/*****************************************************************************/
12626
12627void write_met_bin_2d(
12628 FILE *out,
12629 met_t *met,
12630 float var[EX][EY],
12631 const char *varname) {
12632
12633 float *help;
12634
12635 /* Allocate... */
12636 ALLOC(help, float,
12637 EX * EY);
12638
12639 /* Copy data... */
12640 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
12641 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
12642 help[ARRAY_2D(ix, iy, met->ny)] = var[ix][iy];
12643
12644 /* Write uncompressed data... */
12645 LOG(2, "Write 2-D variable: %s (uncompressed)", varname);
12646 FWRITE(help, float,
12647 (size_t) (met->nx * met->ny),
12648 out);
12649
12650 /* Free... */
12651 free(help);
12652}
12653
12654/*****************************************************************************/
12655
12656void write_met_bin_3d(
12657 FILE *out,
12658 const ctl_t *ctl,
12659 met_t *met,
12660 float var[EX][EY][EP],
12661 const char *varname,
12662 const int precision,
12663 const double tolerance) {
12664
12665 float *help;
12666
12667 /* Allocate... */
12668 ALLOC(help, float,
12669 EX * EY * EP);
12670
12671 /* Copy data... */
12672#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) collapse(2)
12673 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
12674 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
12675 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++)
12676 help[ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, met->ny, ip, met->np)] = var[ix][iy][ip];
12677
12678 /* Write uncompressed data... */
12679 if (ctl->met_type == 1) {
12680 LOG(2, "Write 3-D variable: %s (uncompressed)", varname);
12681 FWRITE(help, float,
12682 (size_t) (met->nx * met->ny * met->np),
12683 out);
12684 }
12685
12686 /* Write packed data... */
12687 else if (ctl->met_type == 2)
12688 compress_pck(varname, help, (size_t) (met->ny * met->nx),
12689 (size_t) met->np, 0, out);
12690
12691 /* Write ZFP data... */
12692#ifdef ZFP
12693 else if (ctl->met_type == 3) {
12694 FWRITE(&precision, int,
12695 1,
12696 out);
12697 FWRITE(&tolerance, double,
12698 1,
12699 out);
12700 compress_zfp(varname, help, met->np, met->ny, met->nx, precision,
12701 tolerance, 0, out);
12702 }
12703#endif
12704
12705 /* Write zstd data... */
12706#ifdef ZSTD
12707 else if (ctl->met_type == 4)
12708 compress_zstd(varname, help, (size_t) (met->np * met->ny * met->nx), 0,
12709 ctl->met_zstd_level, out);
12710#endif
12711
12712 /* Write cmultiscale data... */
12713#ifdef CMS
12714 else if (ctl->met_type == 5) {
12715 compress_cms(ctl, varname, help, (size_t) met->nx, (size_t) met->ny,
12716 (size_t) met->np, 0, out);
12717 }
12718#endif
12719
12720 /* Write SZ3 data... */
12721#ifdef SZ3
12722 else if (ctl->met_type == 7) {
12723 FWRITE(&precision, int,
12724 1,
12725 out);
12726 FWRITE(&tolerance, double,
12727 1,
12728 out);
12729 compress_sz3(varname, help, met->np, met->ny, met->nx, precision,
12730 tolerance, 0, out);
12731 }
12732#endif
12733
12734 /* Unknown method... */
12735 else {
12736 ERRMSG("MET_TYPE not supported!");
12737 LOG(3, "%d %g", precision, tolerance);
12738 }
12739
12740 /* Free... */
12741 free(help);
12742}
12743
12744/*****************************************************************************/
12745
12746void write_met_nc(
12747 const char *filename,
12748 const ctl_t *ctl,
12749 met_t *met) {
12750
12751 /* Create file... */
12752 int ncid, varid;
12753 size_t start[4], count[4];
12754 nc_create(filename, NC_NETCDF4, &ncid);
12755
12756 /* Define dimensions... */
12757 int tid, lonid, latid, levid;
12758 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "time", 1, &tid));
12759 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "lon", (size_t) met->nx, &lonid));
12760 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "lat", (size_t) met->ny, &latid));
12761 NC(nc_def_dim(ncid, "lev", (size_t) met->np, &levid));
12762
12763 /* Define grid... */
12764 NC_DEF_VAR("time", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &tid, "time",
12765 "seconds since 2000-01-01 00:00:00 UTC", 0, 0);
12766 NC_DEF_VAR("lon", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &lonid, "longitude", "degrees_east", 0, 0);
12767 NC_DEF_VAR("lat", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &latid, "latitude", "degrees_north", 0, 0);
12768 NC_DEF_VAR("lev", NC_DOUBLE, 1, &levid, "pressure", "Pa", 0, 0);
12769
12770 /* Define surface variables... */
12771 int dimid2[2] = { latid, lonid };
12772 NC_DEF_VAR("sp", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "Surface pressure", "Pa",
12773 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12774 NC_DEF_VAR("z", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "Geopotential", "m**2 s**-2",
12775 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12776 NC_DEF_VAR("t2m", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "2 metre temperature", "K",
12777 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12778 NC_DEF_VAR("u10m", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "10 metre U wind component",
12779 "m s**-1", ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12780 NC_DEF_VAR("v10m", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "10 metre V wind component",
12781 "m s**-1", ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12782 NC_DEF_VAR("iews", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2,
12783 "Instantaneous eastward turbulent surface stress", "N m**-2",
12784 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12785 NC_DEF_VAR("inss", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2,
12786 "Instantaneous northward turbulent surface stress", "N m**-2",
12787 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12788 NC_DEF_VAR("ishf", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2,
12789 "Instantaneous surface sensible heat flux", "W m**-1",
12790 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12791 NC_DEF_VAR("lsm", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "Land/sea mask", "-",
12792 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12793 NC_DEF_VAR("sstk", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "Sea surface temperature", "K",
12794 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12795 NC_DEF_VAR("blp", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "Boundary layer pressure", "Pa",
12796 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12797 NC_DEF_VAR("pt", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "Tropopause pressure", "Pa",
12798 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12799 NC_DEF_VAR("tt", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "Tropopause temperature", "K",
12800 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12801 NC_DEF_VAR("zt", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "Tropopause height", "m",
12802 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12803 NC_DEF_VAR("h2ot", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "Tropopause water vapor", "ppv",
12804 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12805 NC_DEF_VAR("pct", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "Cloud top pressure", "Pa",
12806 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12807 NC_DEF_VAR("pcb", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "Cloud bottom pressure", "Pa",
12808 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12809 NC_DEF_VAR("cl", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "Total column cloud water",
12810 "kg m**2", ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12811 NC_DEF_VAR("plcl", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2,
12812 "Pressure at lifted condensation level (LCL)", "Pa",
12813 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12814 NC_DEF_VAR("plfc", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2,
12815 "Pressure at level of free convection (LFC)", "Pa",
12816 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12817 NC_DEF_VAR("pel", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2,
12818 "Pressure at equilibrium level (EL)", "Pa", ctl->met_nc_level,
12819 0);
12820 NC_DEF_VAR("cape", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2,
12821 "Convective available potential energy", "J kg**-1",
12822 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12823 NC_DEF_VAR("cin", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "Convective inhibition",
12824 "J kg**-1", ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12825 NC_DEF_VAR("o3c", NC_FLOAT, 2, dimid2, "Total column ozone", "DU",
12826 ctl->met_nc_level, 0);
12827
12828 /* Define level data... */
12829 int dimid3[3] = { levid, latid, lonid };
12830 NC_DEF_VAR("t", NC_FLOAT, 3, dimid3, "Temperature", "K",
12831 ctl->met_nc_level, ctl->met_nc_quant);
12832 NC_DEF_VAR("u", NC_FLOAT, 3, dimid3, "U velocity", "m s**-1",
12833 ctl->met_nc_level, ctl->met_nc_quant);
12834 NC_DEF_VAR("v", NC_FLOAT, 3, dimid3, "V velocity", "m s**-1",
12835 ctl->met_nc_level, ctl->met_nc_quant);
12836 NC_DEF_VAR("w", NC_FLOAT, 3, dimid3, "Vertical velocity", "Pa s**-1",
12837 ctl->met_nc_level, ctl->met_nc_quant);
12838 NC_DEF_VAR("q", NC_FLOAT, 3, dimid3, "Specific humidity", "kg kg**-1",
12839 ctl->met_nc_level, ctl->met_nc_quant);
12840 NC_DEF_VAR("o3", NC_FLOAT, 3, dimid3, "Ozone mass mixing ratio",
12841 "kg kg**-1", ctl->met_nc_level, ctl->met_nc_quant);
12842 NC_DEF_VAR("clwc", NC_FLOAT, 3, dimid3, "Cloud liquid water content",
12843 "kg kg**-1", ctl->met_nc_level, ctl->met_nc_quant);
12844 NC_DEF_VAR("crwc", NC_FLOAT, 3, dimid3, "Cloud rain water content",
12845 "kg kg**-1", ctl->met_nc_level, ctl->met_nc_quant);
12846 NC_DEF_VAR("ciwc", NC_FLOAT, 3, dimid3, "Cloud ice water content",
12847 "kg kg**-1", ctl->met_nc_level, ctl->met_nc_quant);
12848 NC_DEF_VAR("cswc", NC_FLOAT, 3, dimid3, "Cloud snow water content",
12849 "kg kg**-1", ctl->met_nc_level, ctl->met_nc_quant);
12850 NC_DEF_VAR("cc", NC_FLOAT, 3, dimid3, "Cloud cover", "-",
12851 ctl->met_nc_level, ctl->met_nc_quant);
12852
12853 /* End definitions... */
12854 NC(nc_enddef(ncid));
12855
12856 /* Write grid data... */
12857 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("time", &met->time, 0);
12858 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("lon", met->lon, 0);
12859 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("lat", met->lat, 0);
12860 double phelp[EP];
12861 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++)
12862 phelp[ip] = 100. * met->p[ip];
12863 NC_PUT_DOUBLE("lev", phelp, 0);
12864
12865 /* Write surface data... */
12866 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "sp", met, met->ps, 100.0f);
12867 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "z", met, met->zs, (float) (1000. * G0));
12868 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "t2m", met, met->ts, 1.0f);
12869 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "u10m", met, met->us, 1.0f);
12870 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "v10m", met, met->vs, 1.0f);
12871 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "iews", met, met->ess, 1.0f);
12872 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "inss", met, met->nss, 1.0f);
12873 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "ishf", met, met->shf, 1.0f);
12874 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "lsm", met, met->lsm, 1.0f);
12875 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "sstk", met, met->sst, 1.0f);
12876 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "blp", met, met->pbl, 100.0f);
12877 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "pt", met, met->pt, 100.0f);
12878 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "tt", met, met->tt, 1.0f);
12879 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "zt", met, met->zt, 1000.0f);
12880 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "h2ot", met, met->h2ot, 1.0f);
12881 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "pct", met, met->pct, 100.0f);
12882 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "pcb", met, met->pcb, 100.0f);
12883 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "cl", met, met->cl, 1.0f);
12884 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "plcl", met, met->plcl, 100.0f);
12885 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "plfc", met, met->plfc, 100.0f);
12886 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "pel", met, met->pel, 100.0f);
12887 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "cape", met, met->cape, 1.0f);
12888 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "cin", met, met->cin, 1.0f);
12889 write_met_nc_2d(ncid, "o3c", met, met->o3c, 1.0f);
12890
12891 /* Write level data... */
12892 write_met_nc_3d(ncid, "t", met, met->t, 1.0f);
12893 write_met_nc_3d(ncid, "u", met, met->u, 1.0f);
12894 write_met_nc_3d(ncid, "v", met, met->v, 1.0f);
12895 write_met_nc_3d(ncid, "w", met, met->w, 100.0f);
12896 write_met_nc_3d(ncid, "q", met, met->h2o, (float) (MH2O / MA));
12897 write_met_nc_3d(ncid, "o3", met, met->o3, (float) (MO3 / MA));
12898 write_met_nc_3d(ncid, "clwc", met, met->lwc, 1.0f);
12899 write_met_nc_3d(ncid, "crwc", met, met->rwc, 1.0f);
12900 write_met_nc_3d(ncid, "ciwc", met, met->iwc, 1.0f);
12901 write_met_nc_3d(ncid, "cswc", met, met->swc, 1.0f);
12902 write_met_nc_3d(ncid, "cc", met, met->cc, 1.0f);
12903
12904 /* Close file... */
12905 NC(nc_close(ncid));
12906}
12907
12908/*****************************************************************************/
12909
12910void write_met_nc_2d(
12911 const int ncid,
12912 const char *varname,
12913 met_t *met,
12914 float var[EX][EY],
12915 const float scl) {
12916
12917 int varid;
12918 size_t start[4], count[4];
12919
12920 /* Allocate... */
12921 float *help;
12922 ALLOC(help, float,
12923 EX * EY);
12924
12925 /* Copy data... */
12926 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
12927 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
12928 help[ARRAY_2D(iy, ix, met->nx)] = scl * var[ix][iy];
12929
12930 /* Write data... */
12931 NC_PUT_FLOAT(varname, help, 0);
12932
12933 /* Free... */
12934 free(help);
12935}
12936
12937/*****************************************************************************/
12938
12939void write_met_nc_3d(
12940 const int ncid,
12941 const char *varname,
12942 met_t *met,
12943 float var[EX][EY][EP],
12944 const float scl) {
12945
12946 int varid;
12947 size_t start[4], count[4];
12948
12949 /* Allocate... */
12950 float *help;
12951 ALLOC(help, float,
12952 EX * EY * EP);
12953
12954 /* Copy data... */
12955 for (int ix = 0; ix < met->nx; ix++)
12956 for (int iy = 0; iy < met->ny; iy++)
12957 for (int ip = 0; ip < met->np; ip++)
12958 help[ARRAY_3D(ip, iy, met->ny, ix, met->nx)] = scl * var[ix][iy][ip];
12959
12960 /* Write data... */
12961 NC_PUT_FLOAT(varname, help, 0);
12962
12963 /* Free... */
12964 free(help);
12965}
12966
12967/*****************************************************************************/
12968
12969void write_prof(
12970 const char *filename,
12971 const ctl_t *ctl,
12972 met_t *met0,
12973 met_t *met1,
12974 const atm_t *atm,
12975 const double t) {
12976
12977 static FILE *out;
12978
12979 static double *mass, *obsmean, *rt, *rz, *rlon, *rlat, *robs, *area,
12980 dz, dlon, dlat, *lon, *lat, *z, *press, temp, vmr, h2o, o3;
12981
12982 static int nobs, *obscount, ip, okay;
12983
12984 /* Set timer... */
12985 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_PROF", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
12986
12987 /* Init... */
12988 if (t == ctl->t_start) {
12989
12990 /* Check quantity index for mass... */
12991 if (ctl->qnt_m < 0)
12992 ERRMSG("Need quantity mass!");
12993
12994 /* Check molar mass... */
12995 if (ctl->molmass <= 0)
12996 ERRMSG("Specify molar mass!");
12997
12998 /* Allocate... */
12999 ALLOC(lon, double,
13000 ctl->prof_nx);
13001 ALLOC(lat, double,
13002 ctl->prof_ny);
13003 ALLOC(area, double,
13004 ctl->prof_ny);
13005 ALLOC(z, double,
13006 ctl->prof_nz);
13007 ALLOC(press, double,
13008 ctl->prof_nz);
13009 ALLOC(rt, double,
13010 NOBS);
13011 ALLOC(rz, double,
13012 NOBS);
13013 ALLOC(rlon, double,
13014 NOBS);
13015 ALLOC(rlat, double,
13016 NOBS);
13017 ALLOC(robs, double,
13018 NOBS);
13019
13020 /* Read observation data... */
13021 read_obs(ctl->prof_obsfile, ctl, rt, rz, rlon, rlat, robs, &nobs);
13022
13023 /* Create new output file... */
13024 LOG(1, "Write profile data: %s", filename);
13025 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
13026 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
13027
13028 /* Write header... */
13029 fprintf(out,
13030 "# $1 = time [s]\n"
13031 "# $2 = altitude [km]\n"
13032 "# $3 = longitude [deg]\n"
13033 "# $4 = latitude [deg]\n"
13034 "# $5 = pressure [hPa]\n"
13035 "# $6 = temperature [K]\n"
13036 "# $7 = volume mixing ratio [ppv]\n"
13037 "# $8 = H2O volume mixing ratio [ppv]\n"
13038 "# $9 = O3 volume mixing ratio [ppv]\n"
13039 "# $10 = observed BT index [K]\n"
13040 "# $11 = number of observations\n");
13041
13042 /* Set grid box size... */
13043 dz = (ctl->prof_z1 - ctl->prof_z0) / ctl->prof_nz;
13044 dlon = (ctl->prof_lon1 - ctl->prof_lon0) / ctl->prof_nx;
13045 dlat = (ctl->prof_lat1 - ctl->prof_lat0) / ctl->prof_ny;
13046
13047 /* Set vertical coordinates... */
13048 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->prof_nz; iz++) {
13049 z[iz] = ctl->prof_z0 + dz * (iz + 0.5);
13050 press[iz] = P(z[iz]);
13051 }
13052
13053 /* Set horizontal coordinates... */
13054 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->prof_nx; ix++)
13055 lon[ix] = ctl->prof_lon0 + dlon * (ix + 0.5);
13056 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->prof_ny; iy++) {
13057 lat[iy] = ctl->prof_lat0 + dlat * (iy + 0.5);
13058 area[iy] = dlat * dlon * SQR(RE * M_PI / 180.) * cos(DEG2RAD(lat[iy]));
13059 }
13060 }
13061
13062 /* Set time interval... */
13063 const double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
13064 const double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
13065
13066 /* Allocate... */
13067 ALLOC(mass, double,
13068 ctl->prof_nx * ctl->prof_ny * ctl->prof_nz);
13069 ALLOC(obsmean, double,
13070 ctl->prof_nx * ctl->prof_ny);
13071 ALLOC(obscount, int,
13072 ctl->prof_nx * ctl->prof_ny);
13073
13074 /* Loop over observations... */
13075 for (int i = 0; i < nobs; i++) {
13076
13077 /* Check time... */
13078 if (rt[i] < t0)
13079 continue;
13080 else if (rt[i] >= t1)
13081 break;
13082
13083 /* Check observation data... */
13084 if (!isfinite(robs[i]))
13085 continue;
13086
13087 /* Calculate indices... */
13088 const int ix = (int) ((rlon[i] - ctl->prof_lon0) / dlon);
13089 const int iy = (int) ((rlat[i] - ctl->prof_lat0) / dlat);
13090
13091 /* Check indices... */
13092 if (ix < 0 || ix >= ctl->prof_nx || iy < 0 || iy >= ctl->prof_ny)
13093 continue;
13094
13095 /* Get mean observation index... */
13096 const int idx = ARRAY_2D(ix, iy, ctl->prof_ny);
13097 obsmean[idx] += robs[i];
13098 obscount[idx]++;
13099 }
13100
13101 /* Analyze model data... */
13102 for (ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip++) {
13103
13104 /* Check time... */
13105 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
13106 continue;
13107
13108 /* Get indices... */
13109 const int ix = (int) ((atm->lon[ip] - ctl->prof_lon0) / dlon);
13110 const int iy = (int) ((atm->lat[ip] - ctl->prof_lat0) / dlat);
13111 const int iz = (int) ((Z(atm->p[ip]) - ctl->prof_z0) / dz);
13112
13113 /* Check indices... */
13114 if (ix < 0 || ix >= ctl->prof_nx ||
13115 iy < 0 || iy >= ctl->prof_ny || iz < 0 || iz >= ctl->prof_nz)
13116 continue;
13117
13118 /* Get total mass in grid cell... */
13119 const int idx = ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->prof_ny, iz, ctl->prof_nz);
13120 mass[idx] += atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip];
13121 }
13122
13123 /* Extract profiles... */
13124 for (int ix = 0; ix < ctl->prof_nx; ix++)
13125 for (int iy = 0; iy < ctl->prof_ny; iy++) {
13126 int idx2 = ARRAY_2D(ix, iy, ctl->prof_ny);
13127 if (obscount[idx2] > 0) {
13128
13129 /* Check profile... */
13130 okay = 0;
13131 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->prof_nz; iz++) {
13132 int idx3 = ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->prof_ny, iz, ctl->prof_nz);
13133 if (mass[idx3] > 0) {
13134 okay = 1;
13135 break;
13136 }
13137 }
13138 if (!okay)
13139 continue;
13140
13141 /* Write output... */
13142 fprintf(out, "\n");
13143
13144 /* Loop over altitudes... */
13145 for (int iz = 0; iz < ctl->prof_nz; iz++) {
13146
13147 /* Get temperature, water vapor, and ozone... */
13148 INTPOL_INIT;
13149 intpol_met_time_3d(met0, met0->t, met1, met1->t, t, press[iz],
13150 lon[ix], lat[iy], &temp, ci, cw, 1);
13151 intpol_met_time_3d(met0, met0->h2o, met1, met1->h2o, t, press[iz],
13152 lon[ix], lat[iy], &h2o, ci, cw, 0);
13153 intpol_met_time_3d(met0, met0->o3, met1, met1->o3, t, press[iz],
13154 lon[ix], lat[iy], &o3, ci, cw, 0);
13155
13156 /* Calculate volume mixing ratio... */
13157 const int idx3 = ARRAY_3D(ix, iy, ctl->prof_ny, iz, ctl->prof_nz);
13158 vmr = MA / ctl->molmass * mass[idx3]
13159 / (RHO(press[iz], temp) * area[iy] * dz * 1e9);
13160
13161 /* Write output... */
13162 fprintf(out, "%.2f %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %g %d\n",
13163 t, z[iz], lon[ix], lat[iy], press[iz], temp, vmr, h2o, o3,
13164 obsmean[idx2] / obscount[idx2], obscount[idx2]);
13165 }
13166 }
13167 }
13168
13169 /* Free... */
13170 free(mass);
13171 free(obsmean);
13172 free(obscount);
13173
13174 /* Finalize... */
13175 if (t == ctl->t_stop) {
13176
13177 /* Close output file... */
13178 fclose(out);
13179
13180 /* Free... */
13181 free(lon);
13182 free(lat);
13183 free(area);
13184 free(z);
13185 free(press);
13186 free(rt);
13187 free(rz);
13188 free(rlon);
13189 free(rlat);
13190 free(robs);
13191 }
13192}
13193
13194/*****************************************************************************/
13195
13196void write_sample(
13197 const char *filename,
13198 const ctl_t *ctl,
13199 met_t *met0,
13200 met_t *met1,
13201 const atm_t *atm,
13202 const double t) {
13203
13204 static FILE *out;
13205
13206 static double area, dlat, rmax2, *rt, *rz, *rlon, *rlat, *robs, kz[EP],
13207 kw[EP];
13208
13209 static int nobs, nk;
13210
13211 /* Set timer... */
13212 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_SAMPLE", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
13213
13214 /* Init... */
13215 if (t == ctl->t_start) {
13216
13217 /* Allocate... */
13218 ALLOC(rt, double,
13219 NOBS);
13220 ALLOC(rz, double,
13221 NOBS);
13222 ALLOC(rlon, double,
13223 NOBS);
13224 ALLOC(rlat, double,
13225 NOBS);
13226 ALLOC(robs, double,
13227 NOBS);
13228
13229 /* Read observation data... */
13230 read_obs(ctl->sample_obsfile, ctl, rt, rz, rlon, rlat, robs, &nobs);
13231
13232 /* Read kernel data... */
13233 if (ctl->sample_kernel[0] != '-')
13234 read_kernel(ctl->sample_kernel, kz, kw, &nk);
13235
13236 /* Create output file... */
13237 LOG(1, "Write sample data: %s", filename);
13238 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
13239 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
13240
13241 /* Write header... */
13242 fprintf(out,
13243 "# $1 = time [s]\n"
13244 "# $2 = altitude [km]\n"
13245 "# $3 = longitude [deg]\n"
13246 "# $4 = latitude [deg]\n"
13247 "# $5 = surface area [km^2]\n"
13248 "# $6 = layer depth [km]\n"
13249 "# $7 = number of particles [1]\n"
13250 "# $8 = column density [kg/m^2]\n"
13251 "# $9 = volume mixing ratio [ppv]\n"
13252 "# $10 = observed BT index [K]\n\n");
13253
13254 /* Set latitude range, squared radius, and area... */
13255 dlat = DY2DEG(ctl->sample_dx);
13256 rmax2 = SQR(ctl->sample_dx);
13257 area = M_PI * rmax2;
13258 }
13259
13260 /* Set time interval for output... */
13261 const double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
13262 const double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
13263
13264 /* Loop over observations... */
13265 for (int i = 0; i < nobs; i++) {
13266
13267 /* Check time... */
13268 if (rt[i] < t0)
13269 continue;
13270 else if (rt[i] >= t1)
13271 break;
13272
13273 /* Calculate Cartesian coordinates... */
13274 double x0[3];
13275 geo2cart(0, rlon[i], rlat[i], x0);
13276
13277 /* Set pressure range... */
13278 const double rp = P(rz[i]);
13279 const double ptop = P(rz[i] + ctl->sample_dz);
13280 const double pbot = P(rz[i] - ctl->sample_dz);
13281
13282 /* Init... */
13283 double mass = 0;
13284 int np = 0;
13285
13286 /* Loop over air parcels... */
13287 //#pragma omp parallel for default(shared) reduction(+:mass,np)
13288 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip++) {
13289
13290 /* Check time... */
13291 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
13292 continue;
13293
13294 /* Check latitude... */
13295 if (fabs(rlat[i] - atm->lat[ip]) > dlat)
13296 continue;
13297
13298 /* Check horizontal distance... */
13299 double x1[3];
13300 geo2cart(0, atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip], x1);
13301 if (DIST2(x0, x1) > rmax2)
13302 continue;
13303
13304 /* Check pressure... */
13305 if (ctl->sample_dz > 0)
13306 if (atm->p[ip] > pbot || atm->p[ip] < ptop)
13307 continue;
13308
13309 /* Add mass... */
13310 if (ctl->qnt_m >= 0)
13311 mass +=
13312 kernel_weight(kz, kw, nk, atm->p[ip]) * atm->q[ctl->qnt_m][ip];
13313 np++;
13314 }
13315
13316 /* Calculate column density... */
13317 const double cd = mass / (1e6 * area);
13318
13319 /* Calculate volume mixing ratio... */
13320 double vmr = 0;
13321 if (ctl->molmass > 0 && ctl->sample_dz > 0) {
13322 if (mass > 0) {
13323
13324 /* Get temperature... */
13325 double temp;
13326 INTPOL_INIT;
13327 intpol_met_time_3d(met0, met0->t, met1, met1->t, rt[i], rp,
13328 rlon[i], rlat[i], &temp, ci, cw, 1);
13329
13330 /* Calculate volume mixing ratio... */
13331 vmr = MA / ctl->molmass * cd / (RHO(rp, temp) * ctl->sample_dz * 1e3);
13332 }
13333 } else
13334 vmr = NAN;
13335
13336 /* Write output... */
13337 fprintf(out, "%.2f %g %g %g %g %g %d %g %g %g\n", rt[i], rz[i],
13338 rlon[i], rlat[i], area, ctl->sample_dz, np, cd, vmr, robs[i]);
13339 }
13340
13341 /* Finalize...... */
13342 if (t == ctl->t_stop) {
13343
13344 /* Close output file... */
13345 fclose(out);
13346
13347 /* Free... */
13348 free(rt);
13349 free(rz);
13350 free(rlon);
13351 free(rlat);
13352 free(robs);
13353 }
13354}
13355
13356/*****************************************************************************/
13357
13358void write_station(
13359 const char *filename,
13360 const ctl_t *ctl,
13361 atm_t *atm,
13362 const double t) {
13363
13364 static FILE *out;
13365
13366 static double rmax2, x0[3], x1[3];
13367
13368 /* Set timer... */
13369 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_STATION", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
13370
13371 /* Init... */
13372 if (t == ctl->t_start) {
13373
13374 /* Write info... */
13375 LOG(1, "Write station data: %s", filename);
13376
13377 /* Create new file... */
13378 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
13379 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
13380
13381 /* Write header... */
13382 fprintf(out,
13383 "# $1 = time [s]\n"
13384 "# $2 = altitude [km]\n"
13385 "# $3 = longitude [deg]\n" "# $4 = latitude [deg]\n");
13386 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++)
13387 fprintf(out, "# $%i = %s [%s]\n", (iq + 5),
13388 ctl->qnt_name[iq], ctl->qnt_unit[iq]);
13389 fprintf(out, "\n");
13390
13391 /* Set geolocation and search radius... */
13392 geo2cart(0, ctl->stat_lon, ctl->stat_lat, x0);
13393 rmax2 = SQR(ctl->stat_r);
13394 }
13395
13396 /* Set time interval for output... */
13397 const double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
13398 const double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
13399
13400 /* Loop over air parcels... */
13401 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip++) {
13402
13403 /* Check time... */
13404 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
13405 continue;
13406
13407 /* Check time range for station output... */
13408 if (atm->time[ip] < ctl->stat_t0 || atm->time[ip] > ctl->stat_t1)
13409 continue;
13410
13411 /* Check station flag... */
13412 if (ctl->qnt_stat >= 0)
13413 if ((int) atm->q[ctl->qnt_stat][ip])
13414 continue;
13415
13416 /* Get Cartesian coordinates... */
13417 geo2cart(0, atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip], x1);
13418
13419 /* Check horizontal distance... */
13420 if (DIST2(x0, x1) > rmax2)
13421 continue;
13422
13423 /* Set station flag... */
13424 if (ctl->qnt_stat >= 0)
13425 atm->q[ctl->qnt_stat][ip] = 1;
13426
13427 /* Write data... */
13428 fprintf(out, "%.2f %g %g %g",
13429 atm->time[ip], Z(atm->p[ip]), atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip]);
13430 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
13431 fprintf(out, " ");
13432 fprintf(out, ctl->qnt_format[iq], atm->q[iq][ip]);
13433 }
13434 fprintf(out, "\n");
13435 }
13436
13437 /* Close file... */
13438 if (t == ctl->t_stop)
13439 fclose(out);
13440}
13441
13442/*****************************************************************************/
13443
13444void write_vtk(
13445 const char *filename,
13446 const ctl_t *ctl,
13447 const atm_t *atm,
13448 const double t) {
13449
13450 FILE *out;
13451
13452 /* Set timer... */
13453 SELECT_TIMER("WRITE_VTK", "OUTPUT", NVTX_WRITE);
13454
13455 /* Write info... */
13456 LOG(1, "Write VTK data: %s", filename);
13457
13458 /* Set time interval for output... */
13459 const double t0 = t - 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
13460 const double t1 = t + 0.5 * ctl->dt_mod;
13461
13462 /* Create file... */
13463 if (!(out = fopen(filename, "w")))
13464 ERRMSG("Cannot create file!");
13465
13466 /* Count data points... */
13467 int np = 0;
13468 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip += ctl->vtk_stride) {
13469 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
13470 continue;
13471 np++;
13472 }
13473
13474 /* Write header... */
13475 fprintf(out,
13476 "# vtk DataFile Version 3.0\n"
13477 "vtk output\n" "ASCII\n" "DATASET POLYDATA\n");
13478
13479 /* Write point coordinates... */
13480 fprintf(out, "POINTS %d float\n", np);
13481 if (ctl->vtk_sphere) {
13482 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip += ctl->vtk_stride) {
13483 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
13484 continue;
13485 const double radius = (RE + Z(atm->p[ip]) * ctl->vtk_scale
13486 + ctl->vtk_offset) / RE;
13487 const double coslat = cos(DEG2RAD(atm->lat[ip]));
13488 const double x = radius * coslat * cos(DEG2RAD(atm->lon[ip]));
13489 const double y = radius * coslat * sin(DEG2RAD(atm->lon[ip]));
13490 const double z = radius * sin(DEG2RAD(atm->lat[ip]));
13491 fprintf(out, "%g %g %g\n", x, y, z);
13492 }
13493 } else
13494 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip += ctl->vtk_stride) {
13495 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
13496 continue;
13497 fprintf(out, "%g %g %g\n", atm->lon[ip], atm->lat[ip],
13498 Z(atm->p[ip]) * ctl->vtk_scale + ctl->vtk_offset);
13499 }
13500
13501 /* Write point data... */
13502 fprintf(out, "POINT_DATA %d\n", np);
13503 for (int iq = 0; iq < ctl->nq; iq++) {
13504 fprintf(out, "SCALARS %s float 1\n" "LOOKUP_TABLE default\n",
13505 ctl->qnt_name[iq]);
13506 for (int ip = 0; ip < atm->np; ip += ctl->vtk_stride) {
13507 if (atm->time[ip] < t0 || atm->time[ip] > t1)
13508 continue;
13509 fprintf(out, "%g\n", atm->q[iq][ip]);
13510 }
13511 }
13512
13513 /* Close file... */
13514 fclose(out);
13515}
read_met_geopot
void read_met_geopot(const ctl_t *ctl, met_t *met)
Calculates geopotential heights from meteorological data.
Definition: mptrac.c:8135
mptrac_alloc
void mptrac_alloc(ctl_t **ctl, cache_t **cache, clim_t **clim, met_t **met0, met_t **met1, atm_t **atm, dd_t **dd)
Allocates and initializes memory resources for MPTRAC.
Definition: mptrac.c:5188
mptrac_write_atm
void mptrac_write_atm(const char *filename, const ctl_t *ctl, const atm_t *atm, const double t)
Writes air parcel data to a file in various formats.
Definition: mptrac.c:6791
day2doy
void day2doy(const int year, const int mon, const int day, int *doy)
Get day of year from date.
Definition: mptrac.c:1004
read_met_extrapolate
void read_met_extrapolate(met_t *met)
Extrapolates meteorological data.
Definition: mptrac.c:8095
write_atm_clams_traj
